 Document(page_content='A\nl\nt\nhough t\nhe s\ncr\neen s\nhot\n you j\nus\nt\n l\nooked at\n w\nas\n f\nor\n a s\ni\nt\nuat\ni\non w\nher\ne\n \ns\nom\neone had al\nr\neady bet\n, s\nom\net\ni\nm\nes\n no one has\n bet\n. T\nhen one of\n t\nhe pr\ne-\ns\nel\nect\n but\nt\nons\n w\ni\nl\nl\n be t\no check. What\n i\nf\n an opponent\n checks\n i\nns\nt\nant\nl\ny?\n \nC\nhances\n ar\ne, t\nhat\n pl\nayer\n has\n det\ner\nm\ni\nned i\nn advance t\nhat\n he i\ns\n goi\nng t\no check.\n \nA\nt\n D\noyl\ne’\ns\n R\noom\n, he m\nay have s\nel\nect\ned ei\nt\nher\n t\nhe C\nheck/\nFol\nd but\nt\non, w\nhi\nch\n \ni\ns\n a ver\ny f\nr\nequent\n choi\nce, or\n t\nhe l\nes\ns\n l\ni\nkel\ny C\nheck/\nC\nal\nl\n any but\nt\non. I\nf\n \nC\nheck/\nFol\nd i\ns\n t\nhe choi\nce, t\nhen I\n can as\ns\num\ne t\nhat\n t\nhe i\nns\nt\nant\n check m\neans\n t\nhe\n \npl\nayer\n pr\nobabl\ny w\noul\nd have aut\nom\nat\ni\ncal\nl\ny f\nol\nded i\nf\n t\nher\ne had been a bet\n. I\nn\n \nt\nhat\n cas\ne, I\n gi\nve t\nhe pl\nayer\n l\nes\ns\n cr\nedi\nt\n f\nor\n havi\nng a s\nt\nr\nong hand.\nSi\nm\ni\nl\nar\nl\ny, i\nf\n an opponent\n r\nai\ns\nes\n i\nns\nt\nant\nl\ny, I\n’\nm\n pr\net\nt\ny s\nur\ne he i\nnt\nended t\no r\nai\ns\ne\n \nno m\nat\nt\ner\n w\nhat\n, and t\nhat\n us\nual\nl\ny i\nndi\ncat\nes\n a ver\ny s\nt\nr\nong hand.\nT\nher\ne ar\ne ot\nher\n t\nel\nl\ns\n you can di\nvi\nne f\nr\nom\n t\nhes\ne pr\ne-\ns\nel\nect\n but\nt\nons\n, w\nhen you\n \nt\nake t\nhe t\ni\nm\ne t\no t\nhi\nnk about\n w\nhat\n an i\nns\nt\nant\n act\ni\non m\neans\n. I\nf\n an opponent\n \ns\neem\ns\n t\no f\nr\nequent\nl\ny us\ne t\nhe pr\ne-\ns\nel\nect\n but\nt\nons\n, but\n occas\ni\nonal\nl\ny hes\ni\nt\nat\nes\n, you\n \ncan f\ni\ngur\ne hi\nm\n f\nor\n a t\nype of\n hand w\nher\ne t\nhe deci\ns\ni\non i\ns\n not\n obvi\nous\n. So,\n \nal\nw\nays\n cons\ni\nder\n w\nhat\n an i\nns\nt\nant\n act\ni\non—or\n t\nhe l\nack of\n one—m\ni\nght\n m\nean.\nY\nou can, of\n cour\ns\ne, w\nai\nt\n unt\ni\nl\n t\nhe act\ni\non r\neaches\n your\n s\neat\n. Y\nou can put\n your\n nam\ne\n \non ot\nher\n SN\nG\n l\ni\ns\nt\ns\n and t\nhen pl\nay s\never\nal\n of\n t\nhes\ne t\nour\nnam\nent\ns\n at\n a t\ni\nm\ne.\n \nU\ns\nual\nl\ny, t\nhey t\nake l\nes\ns\n t\nhan an hour\n—and a t\nypi\ncal\n pl\nayer\n w\ni\nl\nl\n l\nas\nt\n about\n 20\n \nm\ni\nnut\nes\n, on aver\nage, s\nom\net\ni\nm\nes\n bei\nng el\ni\nm\ni\nnat\ned al\nm\nos\nt\n i\nm\nm\nedi\nat\nel\ny,\n \ns\nom\net\ni\nm\nes\n s\nur\nvi\nvi\nng l\nong enough t\no w\ni\nn. Y\nou can pl\nay t\nhem\n al\nl\n day i\nf\n t\nhi\ns\n i\ns\n \nyour\n f\navor\ni\nt\ne poker\n f\nor\nm\n. J\nus\nt\n t\nake a s\neat\n or\n cl\ni\nck t\no get\n on t\nhe l\ni\ns\nt\n. I\nn ot\nher\n \nw\nor\nds\n, s\ni\nt\n. A\ns\n s\noon as\n t\nher\ne’\ns\n a f\nul\nl\n t\nabl\ne, i\nt\n’\ns\n t\ni\nm\ne f\nor\n t\nhe t\nour\nnam\nent\n t\no\n \nbegi\nn. A\n t\nabl\ne of\nt\nen f\ni\nl\nl\ns\n i\nn a m\nat\nt\ner\n of\n a m\ni\nnut\ne or\n t\nw\no. I\nn ot\nher\n w\nor\nds\n, go.\nSi\nt\n-\nand-\ngoes\n can get\n t\no be a habi\nt\n i\nn a hur\nr\ny—and a ver\ny pr\nof\ni\nt\nabl\ne one f\nor\n \naccom\npl\ni\ns\nhed pl\nayer\ns\n. T\nhe t\nr\ni\nck i\ns\n t\no pl\nay a s\nol\ni\nd gam\ne, t\nr\nyi\nng t\no s\nur\nvi\nve and\n \ns\nhar\ne i\nn one of\n t\nhe t\nhr\nee payout\ns\n f\nor\n f\ni\nr\ns\nt\n, s\necond, and t\nhi\nr\nd. A\ns\n m\nuch as\n m\ny\n \nt\nem\nper\nam\nent\n t\nel\nl\ns\n m\ne t\no al\nw\nays\n go f\nor\n f\ni\nr\ns\nt\n pl\nace, t\nhi\ns\n r\neal\nl\ny i\ns\nn’\nt\n t\nhe bes\nt\n \ns\nt\nr\nat\negy i\nn t\nhes\ne one-\nt\nabl\ne s\nhoot\nout\ns\n, w\nher\ne nobody keeps\n t\nr\nack of\n your\n \n“cham\npi\nons\nhi\nps\n” anyw\nay. I\nt\n’\ns\n bet\nt\ner\n t\no pl\nay a m\nor\ne cons\ner\nvat\ni\nve gam\ne t\nhan\n \nyou w\noul\nd i\nn a r\negul\nar\n r\ni\nng gam\ne. Y\nou s\nhoul\nd pl\nay a l\ni\nt\nt\nl\ne m\nor\ne s\nel\nect\ni\nvel\ny,\n \nt\nr\nyi\nng t\no s\nur\nvi\nve unt\ni\nl\n t\nher\ne ar\ne j\nus\nt\n t\nw\no pl\nayer\ns\n l\nef\nt\n, and t\nhen open up.\nT\nhe s\nam\ne i\ns\n t\nr\nue of\n al\nl\n onl\ni\nne t\nour\nnam\nent\ns\n w\nher\ne you pl\nay dow\nn t\no a f\new\n \npl\nayer\ns\n w\nho s\nhar\ne t\nhe pr\ni\nze m\noney. Y\nou w\non’\nt\n have t\nhe s\nam\ne oppor\nt\nuni\nt\ni\nes\n \nt\no ps\nychol\nogi\ncal\nl\ny conquer\n opponent\ns\n as\n you w\noul\nd i\nn r\neal\n-\nw\nor\nl\nd gam\nes\n, s\no\n \nt\nhe pr\noven bes\nt\n choi\nce i\ns\n t\no pl\nay m\nor\ne s\nol\ni\ndl\ny.\nR\neas\non #16:\n M\nor\ne C\nom\nf\nor\nt\nabl\ne T\nhan at\n a C\nr\now\nded T\nabl\ne\nI\n hat\ne s\ni\nt\nt\ni\nng el\nbow\n t\no el\nbow\n. O\nnl\ni\nne, I\n don’\nt\n w\nor\nr\ny about\n t\nhat\n. For\n s\nom\ne, t\nhes\ne r\neal\n-\nw\nor\nl\nd t\nour\nnam\nent\ns\n cons\nt\ni\nt\nut\ne t\nhei\nr\n f\ni\nr\ns\nt\n expos\nur\ne t\no cas\ni\nno poker\n. T\nhey l\ni\nke\n \nt\nhe advent\nur\ne of\n pl\nayi\nng agai\nns\nt\n l\ni\nve opponent\ns\n t\nhey act\nual\nl\ny can s\nhake hands\n \nw\ni\nt\nh and s\npeak t\no at\n t\nhe t\nabl\nes\n. A\nnd t\nhey enj\noy t\nr\nyi\nng t\no r\nead t\nhem\n and s\npot\n \nt\nel\nl\ns\n—s\nom\net\nhi\nng t\nhat\n i\ns\nn’\nt\n pos\ns\ni\nbl\ne onl\ni\nne.\nC\nount\n t\nhe new\n pl\nayer\ns\n pour\ni\nng i\nnt\no cas\ni\nno poker\n t\nour\nnam\nent\ns\n t\nhr\nough onl\ni\nne\n \nchannel\ns\n, and you’\nl\nl\n be as\n convi\nnced as\n I\n am\n t\nhat\n onl\ni\nne poker\n has\n hel\nped\n \ngr\neat\nl\ny t\no br\ni\nng our\n gam\ne i\nnt\no t\nhe publ\ni\nc s\npot\nl\ni\nght\n, gi\nvi\nng i\nt\n t\nhe r\nes\npect\n i\nt\n \nal\nw\nays\n des\ner\nved, but\n never\n had.\nR\neas\non #20:\n O\npt\ni\nonal\n Four\n-\nC\nol\nor\n D\necks\nI\n’\nve got\n t\no conf\nes\ns\n, I\n’\nve never\n been a f\nan of\n f\nour\n-\ncol\nor\n decks\n. Wi\nt\nh t\nhe\n \nt\nr\nadi\nt\ni\nonal\n deck of\n car\nds\n I\n gr\new\n up w\ni\nt\nh, hear\nt\ns\n and di\nam\nonds\n ar\ne bot\nh r\ned,\n \nand s\npades\n and cl\nubs\n ar\ne bot\nh bl\nack. T\nhey t\nel\nl\n m\ne t\nhat\n f\nour\n-\ncol\nor\n decks\n, w\ni\nt\nh\n \neach s\nui\nt\n havi\nng i\nt\ns\n ow\nn col\nor\n, w\ner\ne t\nr\ni\ned over\n a hundr\ned year\ns\n ago.\n \nA\nppar\nent\nl\ny, i\nt\n w\nas\nn’\nt\n as\n econom\ni\ncal\n t\no pr\ni\nnt\n t\nhem\n t\nhat\n w\nay, and t\nw\no col\nor\ns\n \nbecam\ne t\nhe cus\nt\nom\n.\nI\n pr\nef\ner\n t\nw\no-\ncol\nor\n decks\n, becaus\ne t\nhat\n’\ns\n w\nhat\n I\n’\nm\n us\ned t\no. B\nut\n, t\nher\ne’\ns\n \nobvi\nous\nl\ny a s\nt\nr\nong ar\ngum\nent\n f\nor\n a f\nour\n-\ncol\nor\n deck. I\nt\n m\nakes\n i\nt\n m\nuch eas\ni\ner\n t\no\n \ns\npot\n f\nl\nus\nhes\n and f\nl\nus\nh pos\ns\ni\nbi\nl\ni\nt\ni\nes\n at\n a gl\nance. When M\ni\nke C\nar\no publ\ni\ncl\ny\n \ns\nt\nar\nt\ned m\naki\nng a bi\ng deal\n about\n changi\nng t\no f\nour\n-\ncol\nor\ns\n t\nen year\ns\n ago, I\n \nt\nhought\n he w\nas\n goof\ny. H\ne t\nr\ni\ned uns\nucces\ns\nf\nul\nl\ny t\no i\nnt\nr\noduce f\nour\n-\ncol\nor\n decks\n \nt\no r\neal\n-\nw\nor\nl\nd cas\ni\nnos\n, even goi\nng s\no f\nar\n as\n pr\nom\not\ni\nng a “C\n-\nD\nay” f\nor\n C\nol\nor\n \nD\neck D\nay w\nher\ne t\nhi\ns\n novel\nt\ny w\nas\n i\nnt\nr\noduced t\no s\ni\nxt\ny-\nf\ni\nve cas\ni\nnos\n \ns\ni\nm\nul\nt\naneous\nl\ny.\nT\nhe ef\nf\nor\nt\n f\nel\nl\n f\nl\nat\n, becaus\ne poker\n pl\nayer\ns\n don’\nt\n l\ni\nke change and becaus\ne t\nhe\n \ndi\nf\nf\ner\nences\n i\nn col\nor\ns\n t\nhat\n he chos\ne w\ner\ne t\noo s\nubt\nl\ne t\no be eas\ni\nl\ny di\ns\nt\ni\nngui\ns\nhed\n \nacr\nos\ns\n t\nhe t\nabl\ne. T\nhat\n’\ns\n \nbecaus\ne t\nhe deck you choos\ne i\ns\n onl\ny di\ns\npl\nayed on your\n ow\nn com\nput\ner\n s\ncr\neen.\n \nY\nour\n opponent\n can be l\nooki\nng at\n a di\nf\nf\ner\nent\n deck, and i\nt\n w\non’\nt\n m\nake any\n \ndi\nf\nf\ner\nence t\no you. T\nhat\n’\ns\n w\nhy f\nour\n-\ncol\nor\n decks\n have gai\nned a new\n l\neas\ne on\n \nl\ni\nf\ne onl\ni\nne—and onl\ny onl\ni\nne, s\no f\nar\n.\nR\neas\non #21:\n Sof\nt\nw\nar\ne L\net\ns\n Y\nou K\nnow\n When I\nt\n’\ns\n Y\nour\n T\nur\nn\nY\nou’\nve had t\nhi\ns\n happen bef\nor\ne. A\n pl\nayer\n s\ni\nt\ns\n pat\ni\nent\nl\ny, becaus\ne he does\nn’\nt\n \nr\neal\ni\nze i\nt\n’\ns\n hi\ns\n t\nur\nn. Y\nou s\ni\nt\n pat\ni\nent\nl\ny, t\noo, becaus\ne you don’\nt\n w\nant\n t\no be r\nude\n \nw\nhi\nl\ne, you as\ns\num\ne, he’\ns\n m\naki\nng a deci\ns\ni\non. Y\nes\n, w\ne’\nve al\nl\n s\neen t\nhi\ns\n i\nm\npas\ns\ne\n \nt\ni\nm\ne and agai\nn.\nO\nnl\ni\nne, t\nhi\ns\n aw\nkw\nar\nd m\nom\nent\n never\n happens\n. T\nhe s\nof\nt\nw\nar\ne pr\nods\n pl\nayer\ns\n f\nor\n \na deci\ns\ni\non, l\net\nt\ni\nng t\nhem\n know\n pr\neci\ns\nel\ny w\nhen i\nt\n’\ns\n t\ni\nm\ne t\no act\n. \nR\neas\non #22:\n N\no Soci\nal\n St\ni\ngm\na A\nbout\n L\neavi\nng a G\nam\ne E\nar\nl\ny w\ni\nt\nh Y\nour\n \nWi\nnni\nngs\nI\n bel\ni\neve t\nhat\n a pl\nayer\n s\nhoul\nd never\n need t\no pr\novi\nde a r\neas\non f\nor\n l\neavi\nng a\n \ngam\ne. T\nhe com\nm\non not\ni\non t\nhat\n you’\nr\ne bei\nng unf\nai\nr\n i\nf\n you s\ni\nt\n dow\nn f\nor\n a s\nhor\nt\n \nt\ni\nm\ne and l\neave w\ni\nt\nh a bi\ng pr\nof\ni\nt\n i\ns\n nons\nens\ne. I\nn poker\n, you put\n your\n m\noney at\n \nr\ni\ns\nk. I\nf\n you w\ni\nn, i\nt\n’\ns\n your\n m\noney, and you can get\n up and l\neave anyt\ni\nm\ne you\n \nf\neel\n l\ni\nke i\nt\n.\nSt\ni\nl\nl\n, t\nhi\ns\n i\ns\n s\nom\net\ni\nm\nes\n har\nd t\no do i\nn t\nhe r\neal\n w\nor\nl\nd. I\nf\n you hi\nt\n and r\nun t\noo\n \nof\nt\nen, you’\nr\ne apt\n t\no get\n a r\neput\nat\ni\non as\n t\nhe t\nype of\n pl\nayer\n s\nom\ne don’\nt\n l\ni\nke t\no\n \npl\nay agai\nns\nt\n. I\nt\n never\n bot\nher\ns\n m\ne w\nhen pl\nayer\ns\n w\ni\nn and l\neave qui\nckl\ny, but\n i\nt\n \ndoes\n bot\nher\n ot\nher\ns\n. Per\ns\nonal\nl\ny, I\n us\nual\nl\ny pr\nef\ner\n t\no pl\nay l\nonger\n s\nes\ns\ni\nons\n, but\n I\n \ndon’\nt\n f\nr\now\nn on t\nhos\ne w\nho’\nd r\nat\nher\n pl\nay s\nhor\nt\n ones\n.\nO\nnl\ni\nne, you w\non’\nt\n encount\ner\n any r\nes\ni\ns\nt\nance w\nhen you t\nake t\nhe m\noney and\n \nr\nun. O\npponent\ns\n r\neal\ni\nze t\nhat\n you m\ni\nght\n onl\ny have t\nen m\ni\nnut\nes\n t\no pl\nay r\ni\nght\n \nt\nhen, and you can j\nus\nt\n cl\ni\nck L\neave T\nabl\ne and be out\n of\n t\nhe gam\ne w\ni\nt\nhout\n \nf\nanf\nar\ne or\n m\naki\nng excus\nes\n. T\nhe\n \nt\ni\nps\n w\noul\nd appear\n on “s\ncr\neens\n,” j\nus\nt\n as\n t\nhey do at\n m\ny l\ni\nve per\nf\nor\nm\nances\n. Fi\nne.\n \nI\n don’\nt\n agr\nee t\nhat\n dr\naw\n poker\n i\ns\n dead, but\n l\net\n’\ns\n do t\nhat\n s\nem\ni\nnar\n, anyw\nay.\nI\n’\nve di\nvi\nded t\nhe pr\nes\nent\nat\ni\non i\nnt\no f\nour\n s\nes\ns\ni\nons\n:\n \n(\n1)\n I\nns\ni\nght\ns\n and A\nt\nt\ni\nt\nude;\n \n(\n2)\n St\nr\nat\negy and T\nact\ni\ncs\n;\n \n(\n3)\n Ps\nychol\nogy and T\nel\nl\ns\n;\n and, \n(\n4)\n T\nw\no Fi\nnal\n B\nonus\n T\ni\nps\n.\nI\nf\n you’\nr\ne r\neady, I\n am\n, t\noo, s\no l\net\n t\nhe excl\nus\ni\nve M\nC\nU\nSuper\n/\nSys\nt\nem\n 2 s\nem\ni\nnar\n begi\nn!\nI\nns\ni\nght\n and A\nt\nt\ni\nt\nude\nT\nI\nP 1\nI\n know\n w\nhat\n you’\nr\ne t\nhi\nnki\nng. T\nhe m\nai\nn s\nki\nl\nl\n t\nhat\n w\ni\nnni\nng poker\n pl\nayer\ns\n pos\ns\nes\ns\n i\ns\n t\nhe\n \nabi\nl\ni\nt\ny t\no cl\nos\nel\ny es\nt\ni\nm\nat\ne t\nhei\nr\n chances\n of\n w\ni\nnni\nng a hand or\n m\naki\nng a pr\nof\ni\nt\n \ni\nn a gam\ne. \nH\now\n do you cl\nos\nel\ny es\nt\ni\nm\nat\ne your\n chances\n? I\nt\n’\ns\n a m\nat\nt\ner\n of\n obs\ner\nvi\nng w\nhat\n \ngoes\n on ar\nound you and det\ner\nm\ni\nni\nng how\n l\ni\nkel\ny event\ns\n ar\ne t\no af\nf\nect\n you.\n \nE\nas\ni\ner\n s\nai\nd t\nhan done, r\ni\nght\n? T\nhi\ns\n keeps\n m\ne good-\nnat\nur\ned i\nn a\n \npoker\n gam\ne and m\nakes\n m\ny opponent\ns\n bel\ni\neve I\n genui\nnel\ny car\ne about\n t\nhem\n—\nbecaus\ne i\nt\n’\ns\n t\nr\nue. B\ny r\noot\ni\nng f\nor\n an opponent\n t\no w\ni\nn t\nhe pot\n, onl\ny t\nw\no t\nhi\nngs\n \ncan happen:\n \n(\n1)\n I\nf\n t\nhe opponent\n w\ni\nns\n, I\n’\nm\n happy. \n(\n2)\n I\nf\n t\nhe opponent\n l\nos\nes\n, I\n get\n t\nhe pot\n as\n a cons\nol\nat\ni\non pr\ni\nze.\nI\n’\nm\n al\nw\nays\n aw\nar\ne t\nhat\n t\nhe m\nor\ne t\ni\nm\nes\n m\ny opponent\ns\n go agai\nns\nt\n t\nhe odds\n and\n \nw\ni\nn, t\nhe poor\ner\n t\nhey’\nr\ne pl\nayi\nng, and t\nhe m\nor\ne m\noney I\n’\nl\nl\n ear\nn event\nual\nl\ny—\nes\npeci\nal\nl\ny i\nn l\ni\nm\ni\nt\n gam\nes\n, w\nher\ne aver\nage pl\nayer\ns\n ent\ner\n t\noo m\nany pot\ns\n. T\nhi\ns\n \nat\nt\ni\nt\nude and t\nhi\ns\n s\nucces\ns\n com\ne f\nr\nom\n r\neal\ni\nzi\nng t\nhat\n w\ni\nnni\nng t\nhe pot\n i\ns\n not\n t\nhe\n \nobj\nect\n of\n poker\n. \nT\nI\nP 5\nY\nou w\nant\n t\no be i\nn t\nhe m\nos\nt\n pr\nof\ni\nt\nabl\ne gam\nes\n, r\ni\nght\n? Wel\nl\n, w\nhen you hear\n \nl\naught\ner\n, i\nt\n’\ns\n of\nt\nen an i\nndi\ncat\ni\non t\nhat\n pl\nayer\ns\n ar\ne t\nher\ne t\no enj\noy poker\n, not\n t\no\n \nt\nake i\nt\n s\ner\ni\nous\nl\ny. O\nn aver\nage, f\nr\ni\nendl\ny gam\nes\n, es\npeci\nal\nl\ny t\nhos\ne w\ni\nt\nh l\naught\ner\n,\n \nar\ne t\nhe m\nos\nt\n eas\ni\nl\ny beat\nabl\ne. C\nonver\ns\nel\ny, s\ni\nl\nence i\ns\n us\nual\nl\ny an i\nndi\ncat\ni\non t\nhat\n \nopponent\ns\n ar\ne pl\nayi\nng w\nay t\noo s\ner\ni\nous\nl\ny, and your\n pr\nos\npect\ns\n f\nor\n m\naki\nng a\n \npr\nof\ni\nt\n ar\ne di\nm\ni\nni\ns\nhed. When you have a choi\nce, choos\ne a t\nabl\ne w\nher\ne pl\nayer\ns\n \nar\ne l\naughi\nng.\nT\nI\nP 6\nT\nypi\ncal\n poker\n t\nour\nnam\nent\ns\n cont\ni\nnue unt\ni\nl\n one pl\nayer\n has\n al\nl\n t\nhe chi\nps\n, and\n \never\nyone el\ns\ne goes\n br\noke. B\nut\n i\nf\n t\nhe s\nt\nakes\n j\nus\nt\n s\nt\nayed t\nhe s\nam\ne, a t\nour\nnam\nent\n \nm\ni\nght\n l\nas\nt\n m\nany year\ns\n. I\nt\n w\noul\nd be ver\ny har\nd t\no el\ni\nm\ni\nnat\ne pl\nayer\ns\n. L\net\n’\ns\n s\nay you’\nr\ne heads\n-\nup and\n \nyour\n opponent\n bet\ns\n $400 i\nnt\no a $2,400 pot\n on t\nhe l\nas\nt\n bet\nt\ni\nng r\nound. Y\nour\n bankr\nol\nl\n i\ns\n al\nw\nays\n onl\ny as\n \nbi\ng as\n w\nhen t\nhe pot\n begi\nns\n. Y\nou’\nr\ne never\n w\ni\nnni\nng or\n l\nos\ni\nng w\nhen t\nhe car\nds\n \nar\ne deal\nt\n. Y\nou’\nr\ne al\nw\nays\n even. So i\nt\n m\nakes\n no s\nens\ne t\no t\nr\ny t\no get\n even. Y\nou\n \nal\nr\neady ar\ne. \nT\nI\nP 10\n“I\n’\nve w\non t\nw\nent\ny-\nt\nhr\nee days\n i\nn a r\now\n!\n” \nPet\ner\n w\nas\n pr\noud as\n he t\nol\nd m\ne t\nhi\ns\n. B\nut\n he s\nhoul\ndn’\nt\n have been. E\nar\nl\ni\ner\n \ndur\ni\nng t\nhi\ns\n w\ni\nn s\nt\nr\neak, he’\nd br\nagged about\n havi\nng been bur\ni\ned one day f\nor\n \n$1,100 i\nn t\nhe $10/\n$20 hol\nd’\nem\n gam\ne he pl\nayed as\n an as\npi\nr\ni\nng pr\nof\nes\ns\ni\nonal\n. “I\n \ns\nt\nuck i\nt\n out\n l\ni\nke a w\nor\nl\nd-\ncl\nas\ns\n pr\no,” he’\nd br\nagged. “A\nt\n a quar\nt\ner\n t\no f\ni\nve i\nn t\nhe\n \nm\nor\nni\nng, I\n count\ned dow\nn m\ny s\nt\nack and I\n w\nas\n $8 ahead. I\n di\ndn’\nt\n even bot\nher\n \nt\no pl\nay out\n m\ny f\nr\nee hands\n unt\ni\nl\n t\nhe next\n bl\ni\nnd. I\n j\nus\nt\n cas\nhed out\n i\nm\nm\nedi\nat\nel\ny.\n \nT\nhat\n gi\nves\n m\ne s\nevent\neen w\ni\nns\n i\nn a r\now\n!\n”\nN\now\n, you s\nee t\nhe pr\nobl\nem\n her\ne? Pet\ner\n w\nas\n m\nanuf\nact\nur\ni\nng hi\ns\n w\ni\nn s\nt\nr\neak. I\nt\n’\ns\n \na pr\net\nt\ny eas\ny t\nhi\nng t\no do. Y\nou j\nus\nt\n r\nef\nus\ne t\no t\nake a l\nos\ns\n unt\ni\nl\n i\nt\n get\ns\n s\no bi\ng t\nhat\n \nt\nher\ne’\ns\n har\ndl\ny any hope of\n r\necover\ny. I\nf\n you get\n l\nucky and r\necover\n, you cas\nh\n \nout\n i\nm\nm\nedi\nat\nel\ny w\ni\nt\nh a s\nm\nal\nl\n w\ni\nn. I\nf\n you s\nt\nar\nt\n of\nf\n w\ni\nnni\nng, you’\nr\ne qui\nckl\ny\n \ns\nat\ni\ns\nf\ni\ned, and you al\ns\no s\net\nt\nl\ne f\nor\n a s\nm\nal\nl\n w\ni\nn. T\nhe hal\nl\nm\nar\nk of\n a pl\nayer\n w\nho\n \nm\nanuf\nact\nur\nes\n w\ni\nnni\nng s\nt\nr\neaks\n i\ns\n t\nhat\n hi\ns\n aver\nage w\ni\nns\n ar\ne m\nuch s\nm\nal\nl\ner\n t\nhan\n \nhi\ns\n aver\nage l\nos\ns\nes\n.\nY\nes\n, you t\nend t\no have a l\not\n of\n l\nong w\ni\nnni\nng s\nt\nr\neaks\n, but\n at\n w\nhat\n cos\nt\n? B\ny\n \nt\nr\nyi\nng t\no r\necover\n f\nr\nom\n a deep l\nos\ns\n, you’\nr\ne l\ni\nkel\ny t\no f\ni\nnd your\ns\nel\nf\n pl\nayi\nng i\nn\n \nt\nhe w\nor\ns\nt\n condi\nt\ni\nons\n—w\nhen gam\nes\n yi\nel\nd s\nm\nal\nl\ner\n pr\nof\ni\nt\ns\n, on aver\nage.\n \nA\nl\nt\nhough t\nher\ne ar\ne except\ni\nons\n, al\nw\nays\n keep i\nn m\ni\nnd t\nhat\n gam\nes\n w\nher\ne you’\nr\ne\n \nl\nos\ni\nng ar\ne l\ni\nkel\ny t\no be m\nade up of\n s\nt\nr\nonger\n opponent\ns\n. T\nhes\ne gam\nes\n w\ni\nl\nl\n \nt\nher\nef\nor\ne be l\nes\ns\n pr\nof\ni\nt\nabl\ne t\nhan gam\nes\n w\nher\ne you’\nr\ne w\ni\nnni\nng, w\nhi\nch t\nend t\no\n \ncons\ni\ns\nt\n of\n w\neaker\n opponent\ns\n. A\nl\ns\no, w\nhen you’\nr\ne l\nos\ni\nng, m\nany opponent\ns\n ar\ne\n \naw\nar\ne of\n t\nhi\ns\n and don’\nt\n s\nee you as\n m\nuch of\n a t\nhr\neat\n. When you’\nr\ne w\ni\nnni\nng, gam\nes\n \nar\ne m\nor\ne pr\nof\ni\nt\nabl\ne on aver\nage t\nhan w\nhen you’\nr\ne l\nos\ni\nng. A\nl\nt\nhough, I\n pl\nayed pr\nof\nes\ns\ni\nonal\nl\ny f\nor\n f\nour\nt\neen year\ns\n, I\n t\nhi\nnk I\n \nw\noul\nd have m\nade even m\nor\ne m\noney had I\n concent\nr\nat\ned m\nor\ne on f\ni\nndi\nng\n \nw\neaker\n gam\nes\n, r\nat\nher\n t\nhan gai\nni\nng r\nes\npect\n by beat\ni\nng w\nor\nl\nd-\ncl\nas\ns\n opponent\ns\n.\nT\nI\nP 15\nT\nhe f\nul\nl\n nam\ne of\n M\nC\nU\n i\ns\n M\ni\nke C\nar\no U\nni\nver\ns\ni\nt\ny of\n Poker\n, G\nam\ni\nng, and L\ni\nf\ne\n \nSt\nr\nat\negy. B\nut\n t\nhey\n \ndo i\nncl\nude t\nhe t\nhi\nngs\n I\n cons\ni\nder\n f\ni\nr\ns\nt\n w\nhen deci\ndi\nng w\nhet\nher\n or\n not\n t\no val\nue\n \nbet\n. I\nf\n you do t\nhat\n, t\noo, you’\nl\nl\n m\nake a l\not\n of\n ext\nr\na m\noney. V\nal\nue bet\nt\ni\nng j\nus\nt\n \nf\nor\n i\nt\ns\n ow\nn s\nake does\nn’\nt\n m\nake m\nuch m\noney. V\nal\nue bet\nt\ni\nng f\nor\n t\nhe r\ni\nght\n \nr\neas\non does\n.\nT\nI\nP 20\nWhenever\n you hol\nd an unbeat\nabl\ne hand—or\n one cl\nos\ne t\no i\nt\n—you m\ni\nght\n \ncons\ni\nder\n checki\nng and t\nhen r\nai\ns\ni\nng i\nf\n an opponent\n bet\ns\n, al\ns\no know\nn as\n \ns\nandbaggi\nng. B\nut\n w\nhen t\nw\no or\n m\nor\ne opponent\ns\n ar\ne i\nnvol\nved i\nn t\nhe pot\n w\ni\nt\nh\n \nyou, t\nher\ne’\ns\n an i\nm\npor\nt\nant\n f\nact\nor\n you’\nl\nl\n need t\no cons\ni\nder\n bef\nor\ne deci\ndi\nng\n \nw\nhet\nher\n t\no bet\n or\n t\no s\nandbag.\nH\ner\ne i\nt\n i\ns\n:\n Y\nou s\nhoul\nd s\nandbag your\n s\nt\nr\nonges\nt\n hands\n w\nhen t\nhe pl\nayer\n \ni\nm\nm\nedi\nat\nel\ny t\no your\n l\nef\nt\n i\ns\n t\nhe one m\nos\nt\n l\ni\nkel\ny t\no m\nake t\nhe f\ni\nr\ns\nt\n bet\n, and\n \nus\nual\nl\ny not\n ot\nher\nw\ni\ns\ne. Why i\ns\n t\nhat\n? B\necaus\ne by s\nandbaggi\nng w\ni\nt\nh a pow\ner\nf\nul\n \nhand, you’\nr\ne t\nr\nyi\nng t\no w\ni\nn m\nor\ne m\noney. Y\nou’\nr\ne decl\ni\nni\nng t\no bet\n, r\ni\ns\nki\nng\n \ndi\nr\nect\n m\noney t\nhr\nough cal\nl\ns\n, i\nn t\nhe hopes\n t\nhat\n s\nom\neone el\ns\ne w\ni\nl\nl\n do your\n \nbet\nt\ni\nng f\nor\n you, and t\nhen you can r\nai\ns\ne and w\ni\nn ext\nr\na.\nWel\nl\n, s\nuppos\ne t\nher\ne ar\ne t\nhr\nee pl\nayer\ns\n i\nn t\nhe pot\n. T\nhe t\ner\nm\n r\nef\ner\ns\n t\no el\ni\nm\ni\nnat\ni\nng\n \ns\nom\ne of\n t\nhe pl\nayer\ns\n t\nhat\n ar\ne i\nn com\npet\ni\nt\ni\non f\nor\n t\nhe pot\n. T\nhi\nnni\nng t\nhe f\ni\nel\nd i\ns\n \ns\nom\net\ni\nm\nes\n an i\nm\npor\nt\nant\n w\neapon. I\nndeed, t\nher\ne ar\ne hands\n t\nhat\n can be pl\nayed\n \nm\nor\ne pr\nof\ni\nt\nabl\ny agai\nns\nt\n one or\n t\nw\no opponent\ns\n t\nhan agai\nns\nt\n a w\nhol\ne her\nd of\n \nt\nhem\n.\nI\n’\nm\n on r\necor\nd as\n not\n bei\nng a f\nan of\n t\nhi\nn-\nt\nhe-\nf\ni\nel\nd s\nt\nr\nat\negy, becaus\ne I\n bel\ni\neve\n \nt\nhat\n pl\nayer\ns\n us\nual\nl\ny at\nt\nem\npt\n i\nt\n at\n t\ni\nm\nes\n w\nhen t\nhey w\noul\nd m\nake m\nor\ne m\noney\n \nby al\nl\now\ni\nng ext\nr\na opponent\ns\n i\nn. T\nhe r\neal\nl\ny bi\ng i\ns\ns\nue I\n have w\ni\nt\nh t\nhi\ns\n s\nt\nr\nat\negy\n \ni\ns\n t\nhat\n, i\nf\n you s\nucceed i\nn t\nhi\nnni\nng t\nhe f\ni\nel\nd, you ver\ny l\ni\nkel\ny have chas\ned aw\nay\n \nt\nhe w\neakes\nt\n hands\n, w\nhi\nch m\ni\nght\n have pr\novi\nded pr\nof\ni\nt\n t\no you had t\nhey s\nt\nayed\n \ni\nn t\nhe pot\n. I\nns\nt\nead, you’\nve l\nef\nt\n your\ns\nel\nf\n s\nt\nr\nanded agai\nns\nt\n onl\ny t\nhe s\nt\nr\nonger\n \nhands\n t\nhat\n you w\nant\ned t\no chas\ne f\nr\nom\n t\nhe pot\n, but\n di\ndn’\nt\n.\nO\nkay, now\n t\nhat\n I\n’\nve s\nhar\ned m\ny i\nnner\nm\nos\nt\n t\nhought\ns\n about\n t\nhi\nnni\nng t\nhe f\ni\nel\nd,\n \nher\ne’\ns\n w\nhen t\no t\nr\ny i\nt\n and w\nhen not\n t\no t\nr\ny i\nt\n. T\nhe m\nos\nt\n advant\nageous\n t\ni\nm\ne t\no\n \nt\nhi\nn t\nhe f\ni\nel\nd i\ns\n w\nhen w\neak pl\nayer\ns\n ar\ne al\nr\neady com\nm\ni\nt\nt\ned t\no t\nhe pot\n and\n \ns\nt\nr\nong pl\nayer\ns\n ar\ne w\nai\nt\ni\nng t\no act\n behi\nnd you. I\nf\n you r\nai\ns\ne, you’\nr\ne l\ni\nkel\ny t\no\n \nchas\ne s\nt\nr\nong pl\nayer\ns\n out\n and pl\nay agai\nns\nt\n w\neak opponent\ns\n and w\neak hands\n.\n \nT\nhe w\nor\ns\nt\n t\ni\nm\ne t\no us\ne t\nhi\ns\n s\nt\nr\nat\negy i\ns\n w\nhen s\nt\nr\nong pl\nayer\ns\n ar\ne com\nm\ni\nt\nt\ned t\no\n \nt\nhe pot\n and w\neak pl\nayer\ns\n r\nem\nai\nn t\no act\n behi\nnd you. I\nf\n you r\nai\ns\ne, you’\nr\ne l\ni\nkel\ny\n \nt\no chas\ne w\neak pl\nayer\ns\n out\n and pl\nay agai\nns\nt\n j\nus\nt\n t\nhe s\nt\nr\nong pl\nayer\ns\n w\ni\nt\nh s\nt\nr\nong\n \nhands\n.\nN\next\n t\ni\nm\ne you at\nt\nem\npt\n t\no t\nhi\nn t\nhe f\ni\nel\nd, don’\nt\n j\nus\nt\n t\nhi\nnk about\n t\nhe num\nber\n of\n \nopponent\ns\n you’\nd l\ni\nke t\no t\nhi\nn, t\nhi\nnk about\n w\nhi\nch pl\nayer\ns\n you’\nr\ne goi\nng t\no t\nhi\nn. \nT\nE\nL\nL\nS A\nN\nD\n PSY\nC\nH\nO\nL\nO\nG\nY\nT\nI\nP 24\n87', metadata={'source': 'players/doyle_brunson/brunson_pdfs/super_system_2.pdf', 'page': 86}),
 Document(page_content='Y\nou w\nant\n w\neak pl\nayer\ns\n i\nn your\n gam\ne. U\ns\nual\nl\ny, t\nhey’\nr\ne pl\nayi\nng r\necr\neat\ni\nonal\nl\ny,\n \nnot\n s\ner\ni\nous\nl\ny. T\nhey’\nr\ne apt\n t\no pl\nay hands\n f\nor\n t\nhe s\nheer\n f\nun of\n i\nt\n. T\nhey m\nay\n \neven enj\noy goi\nng up agai\nns\nt\n t\nhe odds\n. When you i\nns\nul\nt\n t\nhem\n f\nor\n t\nhei\nr\n “bad”\n \npl\nays\n, you’\nr\ne m\naki\nng t\nhem\n uncom\nf\nor\nt\nabl\ne and m\not\ni\nvat\ni\nng t\nhem\n t\no pl\nay bet\nt\ner\n \ni\nn t\nhe f\nut\nur\ne. D\non’\nt\n do t\nhat\n.\nC\noncl\nudi\nng hi\ns\n s\neven-\ncar\nd s\nt\nud hi\ngh-\nl\now\n chapt\ner\n, T\nodd B\nr\nuns\non gi\nves\n \nf\nur\nt\nher\n i\nns\ni\nght\n about\n t\nhe di\ns\nas\nt\nr\nous\n m\ni\ns\nt\nake s\nom\ne pr\nof\nes\ns\ni\nonal\ns\n m\nake by\n \nr\nudel\ny cr\ni\nt\ni\nci\nzi\nng w\neak opponent\ns\n. I\n f\neel\n s\no s\nt\nr\nongl\ny about\n t\nhi\ns\n t\nhat\n I\n of\nt\nen\n \ngi\nve encour\nagem\nent\n t\no pl\nayer\ns\n w\nho go up agai\nns\nt\n heavy odds\n t\no w\ni\nn a pot\n \nf\nr\nom\n m\ne. I\n’\nl\nl\n s\nay, “Wow\n!\n M\nos\nt\n peopl\ne don’\nt\n even pl\nay 4-\n3 of\nf\ns\nui\nt\n, and\n \nus\nual\nl\ny I\n don’\nt\n, ei\nt\nher\n. B\nut\n I\n w\non w\ni\nt\nh i\nt\n t\nhr\nee t\ni\nm\nes\n yes\nt\ner\nday. M\naybe you\n \nand I\n ar\ne on t\no s\nom\net\nhi\nng!\n”\nD\no you under\ns\nt\nand w\nhy I\n s\nay t\nhat\n? I\n’\nm\n m\naki\nng t\nhe w\neak pl\nayer\n f\neel\n good\n \nabout\n get\nt\ni\nng l\nucky. I\n’\nm\n pr\nact\ni\ncal\nl\ny m\naki\nng hi\nm\n i\nnt\no a her\no. A\nt\n t\nhe s\nam\ne\n \nt\ni\nm\ne, I\n’\nm\n t\nel\nl\ni\nng hi\nm\n t\nhat\n I\n “us\nual\nl\ny” don’\nt\n pl\nay t\nhat\n hand, m\naki\nng m\ne s\nound\n \ns\ni\nncer\ne and bel\ni\nevabl\ne. (\nA\nt\n a poker\n t\nabl\ne, i\nt\n’\ns\n per\nf\nect\nl\ny per\nm\ni\ns\ns\ni\nbl\ne t\no l\ni\ne\n \nabout\n your\n hands\n and about\n t\nhe w\nay you pl\nay t\nhem\n. I\nn f\nact\n, i\nt\n’\ns\n par\nt\n of\n t\nhe\n \nps\nychol\nogy of\n w\ni\nnni\nng. A\nnd once i\nn a w\nhi\nl\ne, you s\nhoul\nd t\nhr\now\n i\nn t\nhe t\nr\nut\nh,\n \nj\nus\nt\n t\no keep opponent\ns\n of\nf\n bal\nance.)\n B\nut\n, I\n’\nm\n s\nayi\nng m\nor\ne. I\n’\nm\n cl\nai\nm\ni\nng t\nhat\n I\n \npl\nayed t\nhe s\nam\ne hand s\nucces\ns\nf\nul\nl\ny, even t\nhough I\n s\nugges\nt\n t\nhat\n I\n know\n bet\nt\ner\n.\n \nT\nhi\ns\n gi\nves\n hi\nm\n “per\nm\ni\ns\ns\ni\non” t\no pl\nay badl\ny agai\nn i\nn t\nhe f\nut\nur\ne. I\nf\n I\n do i\nt\n, s\no\n \ncan he. I\nt\n w\ni\nl\nl\n be f\nun f\nor\n hi\nm\n t\no t\nr\ny t\no s\nucceed agai\nn and be r\new\nar\nded w\ni\nt\nh\n \nm\nor\ne pr\nai\ns\ne. When pl\nayer\ns\n m\nake hi\nm\n f\neel\n badl\ny about\n w\neak pl\nays\n, t\nhey’\nr\ne\n \npr\noddi\nng hi\nm\n t\no pl\nay bet\nt\ner\n. T\nhat\n’\ns\n exact\nl\ny t\nhe oppos\ni\nt\ne of\n w\nhat\n t\nhey s\nhoul\nd\n \nw\nant\n. A\nnd i\nt\n i\ns\nn’\nt\n f\nai\nr\n t\no ot\nher\n com\npet\ni\nt\nor\ns\n t\no m\nake t\nhei\nr\n m\noney s\nuppl\ni\ner\ns\n \nuncom\nf\nor\nt\nabl\ne about\n s\nuppl\nyi\nng m\noney.\nT\nI\nP 25\nWhi\nl\ne I\n of\nt\nen pr\nai\ns\ne w\neak opponent\ns\n f\nor\n bad pl\nays\n, I\n never\n pr\nai\ns\ne t\nhem\n f\nor\n \ngood pl\nays\n.  Document(page_content='T\nI\nP 26\nI\n’\nve s\neen even s\nom\ne of\n t\nhe bes\nt\n pl\nayer\ns\n i\nn t\nhe w\nor\nl\nd vi\nol\nat\ne t\nhe advi\nce s\nhow\nn\n \nabove. N\never\n f\nor\nget\n t\nhat\n r\necr\neat\ni\nonal\n pl\nayer\ns\n s\nuppl\ny m\nos\nt\n of\n your\n pr\nof\ni\nt\n. T\nhey\n \ncam\ne f\nor\n t\nhe f\nun of\n poker\n, not\n t\no anal\nyze i\nt\n t\no deat\nh or\n t\no t\nake i\nt\n s\ner\ni\nous\nl\ny.\n \nWhen you s\ni\nt\n at\n t\nhe t\nabl\ne di\ns\ncus\ns\ni\nng t\nhe f\ni\nner\n poi\nnt\ns\n of\n poker\n s\nt\nr\nat\negy, you’\nr\ne\n \nal\ner\nt\ni\nng t\nhe pl\nayer\ns\n w\nho s\nuppl\ny your\n pr\nof\ni\nt\n t\nhat\n t\nhey m\ni\nght\n be com\npet\ni\nng\n \nabove t\nhei\nr\n l\neague. Y\nou’\nr\ne m\naki\nng t\nhem\n uncom\nf\nor\nt\nabl\ne, and i\nt\n’\ns\n qui\nt\ne\n \npos\ns\ni\nbl\ne t\nhat\n t\nhey’\nl\nl\n ei\nt\nher\n deci\nde t\no s\ni\nt\n i\nn your\n gam\nes\n l\nes\ns\n of\nt\nen or\n t\no pl\nay\n \nbet\nt\ner\n. Y\nou don’\nt\n w\nant\n ei\nt\nher\n of\n t\nhos\ne t\nhi\nngs\n t\no happen.\nI\n of\nt\nen hear\n s\nophi\ns\nt\ni\ncat\ned pl\nayer\ns\n debat\ni\nng t\nhe t\nechni\ncal\n m\ner\ni\nt\ns\n of\n how\n a hand\n \nw\nas\n j\nus\nt\n pl\nayed i\nn t\nhe pr\nes\nence of\n w\neak opponent\ns\n. Ser\ni\nous\n di\ns\ncus\ns\ni\nons\n of\n \ns\nt\nr\nat\negy can al\ner\nt\n t\nhes\ne r\necr\neat\ni\nonal\n pl\nayer\ns\n t\no t\nhe not\ni\non t\nhat\n t\nher\ne i\ns\n s\nt\nr\nat\negy.\n \nY\nou don’\nt\n w\nant\n t\no do t\nhat\n. A\nnd, even m\nor\ne pecul\ni\nar\n t\no m\ne, t\nhe debat\nes\n ar\ne\n \nus\nual\nl\ny over\n s\nom\net\nhi\nng as\n i\nncons\nequent\ni\nal\n as\n w\nhet\nher\n a cal\nl\n or\n a r\nai\ns\ne i\nn a\n \nbor\nder\nl\ni\nne s\ni\nt\nuat\ni\non w\nas\n t\nhe bet\nt\ner\n choi\nce. T\nhes\ne w\nay-\nt\noo-\nt\nechni\ncal\n \nar\ngum\nent\ns\n can never\n r\neal\nl\ny be r\nes\nol\nved (\nexcept\n, pos\ns\ni\nbl\ny, by m\ne)\n, becaus\ne\n \nt\nher\ne ar\ne t\noo m\nany s\ni\nde f\nact\nor\ns\n i\nnvol\nved, s\nuch as\n how\n opponent\ns\n w\ner\ne l\ni\nkel\ny\n \nt\no r\nes\npond em\not\ni\nonal\nl\ny at\n t\nhe m\nom\nent\n and w\nhat\n t\nhe bet\nt\nor\n’\ns\n i\nm\nage w\nas\n.\nT\nhe t\nr\nut\nh i\ns\n, t\nhe di\ns\ncus\ns\ni\non i\ns\n of\nt\nen about\n w\nhi\nch choi\nce i\ns\n 37¢ bet\nt\ner\n, w\nhen\n \nj\nus\nt\n by t\nal\nki\nng about\n i\nt\n i\nn f\nr\nont\n of\n a r\necr\neat\ni\nonal\n pl\nayer\n, t\nhe debat\ner\ns\n \npot\nent\ni\nal\nl\ny ar\ne cos\nt\ni\nng t\nhem\ns\nel\nves\n t\nhous\nands\n of\n dol\nl\nar\ns\n. L\net\n m\ne put\n i\nn gent\nl\ny,\n \nw\ni\nt\nhout\n i\nns\nul\nt\ni\nng s\nom\ne of\n m\ny poker\n-\npl\nayi\nng f\nr\ni\nends\n w\nho’\nve m\nade t\nhi\ns\n \nm\ni\ns\nt\nake:\n T\nhe econom\ni\nc advi\ns\nabi\nl\ni\nt\ny of\n di\ns\ncus\ns\ni\nng advanced s\nt\nr\nat\negy at\n a\n \npoker\n t\nabl\ne popul\nat\ned w\ni\nt\nh w\neak opponent\ns\n i\ns\n her\neby br\nought\n i\nnt\no ques\nt\ni\non.\nT\nI\nP 27\nN\now\n I\n’\nm\n goi\nng t\no t\nel\nl\n you a s\nt\nor\ny. I\n’\nve t\nol\nd i\nt\n m\nany t\ni\nm\nes\n, but\n I\n t\nhi\nnk i\nt\n \ni\nl\nl\nus\nt\nr\nat\nes\n t\nhi\ns\n poi\nnt\n s\no w\nel\nl\n t\nhat\n I\n’\nve chos\nen t\no i\nm\nm\nor\nt\nal\ni\nze i\nt\n by i\nncl\nudi\nng i\nt\n \ni\nn Super\n/\nSys\nt\nem\n 2.\nI\n’\nm\n not\n s\nur\ne w\nhat\n year\n i\nt\n w\nas\n—1985, I\n t\nhi\nnk. Wel\nl\n, act\nual\nl\ny, i\nt\n w\nas\n bot\nh 1985\n \nand 1986, becaus\ne t\nhi\ns\n happened on N\new\n Y\near\n’\ns\n E\nve and s\nhor\nt\nl\ny t\nher\neaf\nt\ner\n.\n \nO\nkay, I\n’\nm\n pl\nayi\nng poker\n at\n t\nhe B\ni\ncycl\ne C\nas\ni\nno near\n L\nos\n A\nngel\nes\n, not\n becaus\ne\n \n89', metadata={'source': 'players/doyle_brunson/brunson_pdfs/super_system_2.pdf', 'page': 88}),
 Document(page_content='I\n’\nm\n a poker\n j\nunki\ne, but\n becaus\ne m\ny w\ni\nf\ne Phyl\nl\ni\ns\n C\nar\no i\ns\n i\nn char\nge of\n t\nhe\n \ndeal\ner\ns\n and i\ns\n w\nor\nki\nng t\nhat\n ni\nght\n. \nA\nnyw\nay, as\n t\nhe hour\n appr\noaches\n m\ni\ndni\nght\n, gam\nes\n s\nt\nar\nt\n t\no br\neak as\n pl\nayer\ns\n \nhead hom\ne t\no t\nhei\nr\n f\nam\ni\nl\ni\nes\n. Pr\net\nt\ny s\noon t\nher\ne ar\ne s\nadl\ny no gam\nes\n w\ni\nt\nh m\nuch\n \ns\ni\nze t\no t\nhem\n. D\non’\nt\n you hat\ne i\nt\n w\nhen pl\nayer\ns\n get\n t\nhei\nr\n pr\ni\nor\ni\nt\ni\nes\n conf\nus\ned? So\n \nI\n s\net\nt\nl\ne f\nor\n ki\nl\nl\ni\nng s\nom\ne t\ni\nm\ne pl\nayi\nng a t\ni\nny no-\nl\ni\nm\ni\nt\n gam\ne w\ni\nt\nh $1 and $2\n \nbl\ni\nnds\n. A\ns\n you’\nr\ne pr\nobabl\ny aw\nar\ne, no-\nl\ni\nm\ni\nt\n i\ns\nn’\nt\n about\n t\nhe s\ni\nze of\n a poker\n \ngam\ne;\n no-\nl\ni\nm\ni\nt\n i\ns\n a m\net\nhod of\n bet\nt\ni\nng i\nn a poker\n gam\ne. Si\nnce t\nhe f\nor\nced-\nbl\ni\nnd\n \nbet\ns\n ar\ne t\nhe i\nni\nt\ni\nal\n t\nar\nget\ns\n, al\nl\n w\nager\ni\nng s\nhoul\nd be i\nn pr\nopor\nt\ni\non t\no t\nhe s\ni\nze of\n \nt\nhos\ne bl\ni\nnds\n. T\nheor\net\ni\ncal\nl\ny, no-\nl\ni\nm\ni\nt\n gam\nes\n w\ni\nt\nh $100 and $200 bl\ni\nnds\n s\nhoul\nd\n \nr\nes\nul\nt\n i\nn pot\ns\n t\nhat\n ar\ne, on aver\nage, 100 t\ni\nm\nes\n as\n l\nar\nge as\n t\nhe pot\ns\n i\nn t\nhe gam\ne\n \nw\nher\ne I\n now\n s\ni\nt\n, w\ni\nt\nh pal\nt\nr\ny $1 and $2 bl\ni\nnds\n. A\nct\nual\nl\ny, I\n coul\nd have s\nat\n i\nn\n \nt\nhat\n gam\ne f\nor\n t\nhat\n hour\n bef\nor\ne m\ni\ndni\nght\n, s\neen about\n t\nw\nent\ny deal\ns\n, f\nol\nded\n \never\ny hand, and i\nt\n w\noul\nd have onl\ny cos\nt\n m\ne $6 i\nn bl\ni\nnds\n. T\nhat\n’\ns\n how\n s\nm\nal\nl\n \nt\nhe gam\ne s\nhoul\nd have been.\nN\not\ni\nce t\nhat\n I\n s\nai\nd, “s\nhoul\nd have been.” Y\nou s\nee, s\nom\net\nhi\nng s\nt\nr\nange w\nas\n \nhappeni\nng. I\n’\nm\n s\nur\ne t\nhe aver\nage pot\n w\nas\n over\n $700, and m\nany pot\ns\n w\ner\ne\n \nt\nhous\nands\n of\n dol\nl\nar\ns\n l\nar\nge. I\n w\nas\n s\nuddenl\ny w\ni\nnni\nng a gr\neat\n deal\n of\n m\noney i\nn a\n \ngam\ne I\n hadn’\nt\n even cons\ni\nder\ned t\no be a pr\nof\ni\nt\n-\nm\naki\nng oppor\nt\nuni\nt\ny. I\n m\nean,\n \nher\ne w\nas\n t\nhe l\noos\nes\nt\n, w\ni\nl\ndes\nt\n gam\ne of\n poker\n I\n’\nd ever\n s\neen i\nn m\ny l\ni\nf\ne!\nM\ni\ndni\nght\n appr\noaches\n. T\nhe B\ni\ncycl\ne C\nas\ni\nno s\nt\naf\nf\n pas\ns\nes\n out\n t\nhos\ne annoyi\nng\n \nnoi\ns\ne m\naker\ns\n and goof\ny hat\ns\n. T\nhey al\ns\no gi\nve aw\nay s\nt\nr\neam\ner\ns\n you’\nr\ne s\nuppos\ned\n \nt\no t\nhr\now\n i\nn t\nhe ai\nr\n t\no s\nhow\n how\n t\nhr\ni\nl\nl\ned you ar\ne t\nhat\n t\ni\nm\ne m\noved f\nor\nw\nar\nd\n \ns\nm\noot\nhl\ny t\no t\nhe next\n year\n, j\nus\nt\n as\n m\nos\nt\n s\nci\nent\ni\ns\nt\ns\n pr\nedi\nct\ned i\nt\n w\noul\nd. I\n know\n I\n \ns\nound gr\num\npy, but\n l\nucr\nat\ni\nve poker\n gam\nes\n s\nhoul\nd not\n be i\nnt\ner\nr\nupt\ned f\nor\n t\nhi\ns\n \ns\nor\nt\n of\n s\ni\nl\nl\ni\nnes\ns\n.\nI\nt\n get\ns\n t\no be a coupl\ne m\ni\nnut\nes\n t\no t\nhe hour\n. T\nhat\n hour\n. A\n s\necond-\nby-\ns\necond\n \ncount\ndow\nn begi\nns\n. E\nver\nyone has\n l\nef\nt\n t\nhe t\nabl\ne, get\nt\ni\nng r\neady t\no ki\ns\ns\n t\nhei\nr\n \ngi\nr\nl\nf\nr\ni\nends\n, boyf\nr\ni\nends\n, or\n s\npous\nes\n. M\ne t\noo. I\n f\ni\ngur\ne, “Why not\n?” N\nobody’\ns\n \ns\ni\nt\nt\ni\nng at\n t\nhe s\nt\nupi\nd t\nabl\ne anyw\nay. Pl\neas\ne pay at\nt\nent\ni\non t\no w\nhat\n I\n j\nus\nt\n \ns\nai\nd—a “s\nuddenl\ny” s\nhaki\nng hand. I\nf\n your\n opponent\n’\ns\n hands\n t\nend t\no be\n \nuns\nt\neady m\nos\nt\n of\n t\nhe t\ni\nm\ne, t\nhi\ns\n t\nel\nl\n w\non’\nt\n hel\np you m\nuch. B\nut\n, f\nor\nt\nunat\nel\ny,\n \nf\new\n pl\nayer\ns\n exhi\nbi\nt\n cons\nt\nant\n t\nr\nem\nbl\ni\nng. So, w\nhat\n happens\n w\nhen—al\nl\n of\n a\n \ns\nudden—t\nhe opponent\n bet\ns\n and hi\ns\n hand begi\nns\n t\no t\nr\nem\nbl\ne.\nI\n’\nl\nl\n t\nel\nl\n you w\nhat\n happens\n i\nn a l\not\n of\n oppos\ni\nng pl\nayer\ns\n’\n m\ni\nnds\n. T\nhey t\nhi\nnk,\n \n“L\nook at\n t\nhat\n hand s\nhake. T\nhat\n guy’\ns\n ner\nvous\n. I\n’\nl\nl\n bet\n he’\ns\n bl\nuf\nf\ni\nng, s\no I\n’\nm\n \ngoi\nng t\no cal\nl\n” N\now\n, t\nher\ne’\ns\n a t\nhought\n t\nhat\n’\ns\n guar\nant\need t\no cos\nt\n you m\noney!\n \nT\nypi\ncal\nl\ny, pl\nayer\ns\n w\nho bl\nuf\nf\n bol\ns\nt\ner\n t\nhem\ns\nel\nves\n and of\nt\nen becom\ne r\ni\ngi\nd. T\nhey\n \ndon’\nt\n al\nl\now\n t\nhem\ns\nel\nves\n t\no s\nhake, becaus\ne t\nhey’\nr\ne af\nr\nai\nd t\nhe s\nhaki\nng w\noul\nd\n \nm\nake you s\nus\npi\nci\nous\n and pr\nom\npt\n you t\no cal\nl\n.\nWhen you s\nee an opponent\n s\nhaki\nng, i\nt\n’\ns\n a r\nel\neas\ne of\n t\nens\ni\non t\nhat\n com\nes\n \naut\nom\nat\ni\ncal\nl\ny w\nhen t\nhe s\nus\npens\ne ends\n. T\nhat\n opponent\n has\n m\nade a bi\ng hand—\nof\nt\nen a t\nr\nul\ny m\nonum\nent\nal\n one—and expect\ns\n t\no w\ni\nn. I\nf\n t\nhi\ns\n s\neem\ns\n count\ner\n-\ni\nnt\nui\nt\ni\nve t\no you, s\nt\nar\nt\n w\nat\nchi\nng. A\n s\nuddenl\ny s\nhaki\nng hand s\ni\ngnal\ns\n t\nhe happy\n \nendi\nng t\no a dr\nam\na. I\nt\n i\nndi\ncat\nes\n t\nhat\n t\nhe pl\nayer\n has\n got\nt\nen l\nucky and i\ns\n \nm\nent\nal\nl\ny al\nr\neady s\nt\nacki\nng t\nhos\ne chi\nps\n. T\nhe t\nr\nem\nbl\ni\nng m\neans\n a s\nt\nr\nong hand,\n \nand you s\nhoul\nd al\nm\nos\nt\n al\nw\nays\n f\nol\nd—unl\nes\ns\n your\n ow\nn hand i\ns\n al\ns\no ver\ny\n \npow\ner\nf\nul\n.\n94', metadata={'source': 'players/doyle_brunson/brunson_pdfs/super_system_2.pdf', 'page': 93}),

T\nhey’\nr\ne not\n aw\nar\ne t\no t\nhe ext\nent\n t\nhat\n t\nhey’\nr\ne abl\ne t\no\n \nhar\nnes\ns\n t\nhei\nr\n ow\nn cal\nl\ni\nng r\nef\nl\nex, but\n s\nubcons\nci\nous\nl\ny t\nhey’\nr\ne aw\nar\ne t\nhat\n t\nhe\n \not\nher\n pl\nayer\ns\n have one—al\nt\nhough t\nhey’\nve pr\nobabl\ny never\n put\n i\nt\n i\nn w\nor\nds\n.\nB\necaus\ne of\n t\nhi\ns\n vague aw\nar\nenes\ns\n, your\n opponent\ns\n ar\ne af\nr\nai\nd of\n t\nr\ni\ngger\ni\nng\n \nyour\n cal\nl\ni\nng r\nef\nl\nex af\nt\ner\n t\nhey bet\n w\neak hands\n. Whenever\n you\n \nhear\n, “I\n bet\n” s\npoken i\nn a s\ni\nngs\nong, dr\naw\nn-\nout\n m\nanner\n t\nhat\n s\nugges\nt\ns\n, “G\nos\nh, I\n \nw\ni\ns\nh I\n di\ndn’\nt\n have t\no do t\nhi\ns\n,” t\nhat\n’\ns\n al\nm\nos\nt\n cer\nt\nai\nnl\ny an i\nndi\ncat\ni\non of\n a\n \npow\ner\nf\nul\n hand. Suppos\ne an opponent\n t\nr\ni\nes\n t\no bet\n a s\nt\nack of\n chi\nps\n, but\n s\nom\ne s\npi\nl\nl\n of\nf\n \nt\nhe t\nop as\n he pos\ni\nt\ni\nons\n t\nhem\n i\nn t\nhe pot\n.\nWhat\n does\n t\nhat\n i\nm\npl\ny? I\nf\n t\nhat\n happens\n, you s\nhoul\nd be m\nuch m\nor\ne w\ni\nl\nl\ni\nng t\no cal\nl\n.\nB\nut\n, i\nf\n t\nher\ne i\ns\n no at\nt\nem\npt\n t\no cor\nr\nect\n t\nhe f\num\nbl\ned bet\n, you’\nr\ne l\ni\nkel\ny t\no be\n \nagai\nns\nt\n an opponent\n w\nho i\ns\nn’\nt\n w\nor\nr\ni\ned, and you s\nhoul\nd be r\nel\nuct\nant\n t\no cal\nl\n.\nT\nI\nP 38\nO\nne of\n t\nhe s\nt\nr\nonges\nt\n t\ni\nps\n f\nor\n hol\nd’\nem\n or\n O\nm\naha pl\nayer\ns\n i\ns\n t\no avoi\nd w\nat\nchi\nng\n \nt\nhe f\nl\nop. I\nt\n m\neans\n I\n can pr\nof\ni\nt\n f\nr\nom\n hands\n I\n w\noul\ndn’\nt\n have been\n \nabl\ne t\no pl\nay i\nf\n I\n w\ner\nen’\nt\n obs\ner\nvant\n, and, at\n t\nhe s\nam\ne t\ni\nm\ne, i\nt\n does\n w\nonder\ns\n f\nor\n \nes\nt\nabl\ni\ns\nhi\nng m\ny car\nef\nr\nee i\nm\nage.\nT\nI\nP 40\nB\nut\n, i\nf\n I\n s\nee t\nhes\ne i\nndi\ncat\nor\ns\n w\nhen I\n exam\ni\nne pl\nayer\ns\n w\nho w\ni\nl\nl\n act\n af\nt\ner\n I\n do,\n \nt\nhen I\n’\nm\n i\nn t\nr\noubl\ne w\ni\nt\nh a w\neak or\n m\nedi\num\n hand. I\n need r\neal\n s\nt\nr\nengt\nh t\no\n \nj\nus\nt\ni\nf\ny a bet\n. A\nnd I\n’\nl\nl\n be m\nor\ne w\ni\nl\nl\ni\nng t\no s\nandbag a s\nuper\n-\ns\nt\nr\nong hand on l\nat\ner\n \nbet\nt\ni\nng r\nounds\n, becaus\ne i\nt\n l\nooks\n l\ni\nke s\nom\neone w\ni\nl\nl\n do m\ny bet\nt\ni\nng f\nor\n m\ne, i\nf\n I\n \ncheck.\nT\nI\nP 41\nN\now\n t\nhat\n w\ne’\nve di\ns\ncus\ns\ned s\nom\ne key t\nel\nl\ns\n, I\n need you t\no under\ns\nt\nand\n \ns\nom\net\nhi\nng. V\ner\ny f\new\n t\nel\nl\ns\n ar\ne 100%\n accur\nat\ne. Y\nou need t\no us\ne t\nhem\n l\ni\nke you\n \nw\noul\nd any ot\nher\n bi\nt\n of\n i\nnf\nor\nm\nat\ni\non.\nFor\n i\nns\nt\nance, i\nf\n you’\nr\ne pl\nayi\nng s\neven-\ncar\nd s\nt\nud and you r\nai\ns\ne w\ni\nt\nh a queen\n \ns\nhow\ni\nng on t\nhe f\ni\nr\ns\nt\n bet\nt\ni\nng r\nound, a r\ner\nai\ns\ne f\nr\nom\n an opponent\n w\ni\nt\nh a ki\nng\n \ns\nhow\ni\nng ver\ny l\ni\nkel\ny i\nndi\ncat\nes\n a pai\nr\n of\n ki\nngs\n. B\nut\n i\nt\n m\ni\nght\n not\n—t\nhe cl\nue i\ns\nn’\nt\n \nper\nf\nect\n. Y\nou need t\no adj\nus\nt\n your\n t\nact\ni\ncs\n s\no t\nhat\n you gi\nve m\nor\ne cons\ni\nder\nat\ni\non\n \nt\no a pai\nr\n of\n ki\nngs\n t\nhan you w\noul\nd have, w\nhi\nl\ne keepi\nng open t\nhe pos\ns\ni\nbi\nl\ni\nt\ny\n \nt\nhat\n you’\nr\ne f\naci\nng a pai\nr\n of\n bur\ni\ned aces\n, a s\nm\nal\nl\ner\n bur\ni\ned pai\nr\n, t\nhr\nee s\nui\nt\ned\n \ncar\nds\n, or\n an out\nr\ni\nght\n bl\nuf\nf\n. T\nhe r\nai\ns\ne i\ns\n an i\nndi\ncat\nor\n t\nhat\n m\nakes\n you r\neeval\nuat\ne\n \nt\nhe l\ni\nkel\ny hands\n your\n opponent\n has\n. A\n pai\nr\n of\n ki\nngs\n becom\nes\n m\nor\ne l\ni\nkel\ny,\n \not\nher\n hands\n l\nes\ns\n l\ni\nkel\ny, but\n s\nt\ni\nl\nl\n pos\ns\ni\nbl\ne.\nI\nt\n’\ns\n t\nhe s\nam\ne w\ni\nt\nh a t\nel\nl\n. I\nt\n’\ns\n j\nus\nt\n anot\nher\n f\nact\nor\n, j\nus\nt\n an i\nndi\ncat\nor\n. T\nhe\n \ns\nt\nr\nonger\n i\nt\n i\ns\n, t\nhe m\nor\ne i\nt\n s\nhoul\nd i\nnf\nl\nuence your\n deci\ns\ni\non. Y\nou s\nhoul\nd al\ns\no s\nt\nr\ni\nve t\no l\near\nn al\nl\n t\nhe m\nos\nt\n popul\nar\n \ngam\nes\n, i\nncl\nudi\nng hol\nd’\nem\n, s\neven-\ns\nt\nud, O\nm\naha hi\ngh, O\nm\naha hi\ngh-\nl\now\n, s\neven-\ns\nt\nud hi\ngh-\nl\now\n, deuce-\nt\no-\ns\neven t\nr\ni\npl\ne-\ndr\naw\n, r\nazz, and l\now\nbal\nl\n dr\naw\n—bot\nh ace-\nt\no-\nf\ni\nve, us\nual\nl\ny pl\nayed l\ni\nm\ni\nt\n, and deuce-\nt\no-\ns\neven, us\nual\nl\ny pl\nayed no-\nl\ni\nm\ni\nt\n.\n \nT\nhe t\nop pl\nayer\ns\n know\n and pl\nay al\nl\n of\n t\nhem\n. Why s\nhoul\ndn’\nt\n you? \nI\n w\noul\nd even r\necom\nm\nend t\nhe s\nt\nudy of\n cer\nt\nai\nn academ\ni\nc di\ns\nci\npl\ni\nnes\n,\n \nes\npeci\nal\nl\ny m\nat\nhem\nat\ni\ncs\n and ps\nychol\nogy. H\navi\nng pl\nayed hi\ngh-\ns\nt\nakes\n poker\n \nw\ni\nt\nh J\nenni\nf\ner\n t\nhe pas\nt\n f\new\n year\ns\n, I\n’\nm\n convi\nnced t\nhat\n s\nhe’\ns\n not\n onl\ny t\nhe bes\nt\n \nal\nl\n-\nar\nound f\nem\nal\ne pl\nayer\n al\ni\nve, but\n al\ns\no r\nanks\n am\nong t\nhe el\ni\nt\ne poker\n pl\nayer\ns\n \nof\n t\nhe w\nor\nl\nd. \nH\ner\n aggr\nes\ns\ni\nve pl\nay, a s\nt\nyl\ne t\nhat\n f\ni\nt\ns\n r\ni\nght\n i\nnt\no t\nhe pow\ner\n poker\n I\n have al\nw\nays\n \nr\necom\nm\nended, has\n i\nm\npr\nes\ns\ned m\ne f\nor\n year\ns\n.  Document(page_content='B\nL\nI\nN\nD\nS A\nN\nD\n A\nN\nT\nE\nS\nI\n w\noul\nd l\ni\nke t\no s\nt\nar\nt\n w\ni\nt\nh a di\ns\ncus\ns\ni\non of\n bl\ni\nnd s\nt\nr\nuct\nur\nes\n. A\nf\nt\ner\n al\nl\n, pos\nt\ni\nng\n \nt\nhe bl\ni\nnds\n i\ns\n t\nhe f\ni\nr\ns\nt\n s\nt\nep i\nn any hol\nd’\nem\n gam\ne. I\nn t\nhi\ns\n chapt\ner\n w\ne ar\ne goi\nng\n \nt\no cover\n t\nhe di\nf\nf\ner\nent\n appr\noaches\n t\nhat\n s\nhoul\nd be cons\ni\nder\ned bas\ned on t\nhe bl\ni\nnd\n \ns\nt\nr\nuct\nur\ne .\nA\n f\nul\nl\n-\nl\ni\nm\ni\nt\n hol\nd’\nem\n gam\ne has\n ei\nt\nher\n ni\nne or\n t\nen pl\nayer\ns\n s\neat\ned at\n t\nhe t\nabl\ne.\n \nT\nhes\ne gam\nes\n ar\ne of\nt\nen r\nef\ner\nr\ned t\no as\n r\ni\nng gam\nes\n. T\nypi\ncal\n l\now\ner\n l\ni\nm\ni\nt\n gam\nes\n \nar\ne pl\nayed t\nen-\nhanded, but\n as\n t\nhe l\ni\nm\ni\nt\ns\n go up, ei\nght\n-\n and ni\nne-\nhanded gam\nes\n \nar\ne m\nor\ne com\nm\non. G\nam\nes\n w\ni\nt\nh t\nhr\nee t\no s\ni\nx pl\nayer\ns\n ar\ne cal\nl\ned s\nhor\nt\nhanded\n \ngam\nes\n, and t\nhos\ne pl\nayed w\ni\nt\nh j\nus\nt\n t\nw\no pl\nayer\ns\n ar\ne cal\nl\ned heads\n-\nup gam\nes\n.\nH\nol\nd’\nem\n i\ns\n a pos\ni\nt\ni\nonal\n gam\ne. A\n l\ni\nt\nt\nl\ne puck or\n but\nt\non m\noves\n cl\nockw\ni\ns\ne\n \nar\nound t\nhe t\nabl\ne r\nepr\nes\nent\ni\nng t\nhe deal\ner\n. I\nn hom\ne gam\nes\n, t\nhe deal\n s\ni\nm\npl\ny\n \nm\noves\n t\no t\nhe l\nef\nt\n each hand, but\n cas\ni\nno gam\nes\n us\ne a pr\nof\nes\ns\ni\nonal\n deal\ner\n. T\nhe\n \npos\ni\nt\ni\non of\n t\nhe but\nt\non on t\nhe t\nabl\ne det\ner\nm\ni\nnes\n t\nhe or\nder\n of\n act\ni\non. A\nf\nt\ner\n t\nhe\n \nf\ni\nr\ns\nt\n r\nound of\n bet\nt\ni\nng, t\nhe but\nt\non al\nw\nays\n act\ns\n l\nas\nt\n, w\nhi\nch i\ns\n a gr\neat\n advant\nage.\n \nA\ns\n t\nhe l\nas\nt\n pl\nayer\n t\no act\n, t\nhe but\nt\non i\ns\n abl\ne t\no w\nat\nch hi\ns\n opponent\ns\n act\n on t\nhei\nr\n \nhands\n, r\neveal\ni\nng pos\ns\ni\nbl\ne s\nt\nr\nengt\nhs\n and w\neaknes\ns\nes\n, bef\nor\ne he m\nakes\n hi\ns\n ow\nn\n \ndeci\ns\ni\non.\nT\nw\no pl\nayer\ns\n, t\nhe bl\ni\nnds\n, ar\ne f\nor\nced t\no put\n m\noney i\nnt\no t\nhe pot\n bef\nor\ne t\nhe hand\n \ni\ns\n deal\nt\n. T\nhe s\nm\nal\nl\n bl\ni\nnd s\ni\nt\ns\n di\nr\nect\nl\ny t\no t\nhe l\nef\nt\n of\n t\nhe but\nt\non, and t\nhe bi\ng\n \nbl\ni\nnd s\ni\nt\ns\n di\nr\nect\nl\ny t\no t\nhe l\nef\nt\n of\n t\nhe s\nm\nal\nl\n bl\ni\nnd. T\nher\ne ar\ne t\nw\no bas\ni\nc t\nypes\n of\n \nbl\ni\nnd s\nt\nr\nuct\nur\nes\n:\n a t\nw\no-\nand-\nt\nhr\nee chi\np and a t\nw\no-\nand-\nf\nour\n chi\np. I\nn a t\nw\no-\nand-\nt\nhr\nee chi\np bl\ni\nnd s\nt\nr\nuct\nur\ne, t\nhe s\nm\nal\nl\n bl\ni\nnd put\ns\n i\nn t\nw\no chi\nps\n, w\nhi\nl\ne t\nhe bi\ng\n \nbl\ni\nnd put\ns\n i\nn t\nhr\nee chi\nps\n. For\n exam\npl\ne i\nn a $15/\n$30 l\ni\nm\ni\nt\n hol\nd’\nem\n gam\ne, t\nhe\n \ns\nm\nal\nl\n bl\ni\nnd m\nus\nt\n bet\n $10 w\nhi\nl\ne t\nhe bi\ng bl\ni\nnd m\nus\nt\n bet\n $15.\nI\nn a t\nw\no-\nand-\nf\nour\n chi\np bl\ni\nnd s\nt\nr\nuct\nur\ne (\na one-\nand-\nt\nw\no chi\np s\nt\nr\nuct\nur\ne i\ns\n \ni\ndent\ni\ncal\n)\n, t\nhe bi\ng bl\ni\nnd pos\nt\ns\n doubl\ne t\nhe am\nount\n of\n t\nhe s\nm\nal\nl\n bl\ni\nnd. So i\nn a\n \n$20/\n$40 l\ni\nm\ni\nt\n hol\nd’\nem\n gam\ne, t\nhe s\nm\nal\nl\n bl\ni\nnd w\noul\nd be $10 and t\nhe bi\ng bl\ni\nnd\n \nw\noul\nd be $20.\nO\npt\ni\nm\nal\n l\ni\nm\ni\nt\n hol\nd’\nem\n s\nt\nr\nat\negy di\nf\nf\ner\ns\n dependi\nng on w\nhi\nch bl\ni\nnd s\nt\nr\nuct\nur\ne\n \nyou ar\ne pl\nayi\nng. A\ns\n a\n \nr\nes\nul\nt\n, t\nw\no-\nand-\nt\nhr\nee chi\np gam\nes\n ar\ne l\noos\ner\n t\nhan t\nw\no-\nand-\nf\nour\n chi\np gam\nes\n,\n \n105', metadata={'source': 'players/doyle_brunson/brunson_pdfs/super_system_2.pdf', 'page': 104}),
 Document(page_content='and you w\ni\nl\nl\n need t\no com\npens\nat\ne f\nor\n t\nhi\ns\n by pl\nayi\nng m\nor\ne hands\n. \nT\nhe di\nf\nf\ner\nence bet\nw\neen t\nhe t\nw\no s\nt\nr\nuct\nur\nes\n s\neem\ns\n pr\net\nt\ny i\nns\ni\ngni\nf\ni\ncant\n, s\no w\nhy\n \nt\nhe need t\no adj\nus\nt\n your\n pl\nay?\nT\nw\no-\nand-\nT\nhr\nee C\nhi\np St\nr\nuct\nur\ne\nI\nn t\nhe t\nw\no-\nand-\nt\nhr\nee chi\np s\nt\nr\nuct\nur\ne, t\nhe s\nm\nal\nl\n bl\ni\nnd al\nr\neady has\n 2/\n3 of\n a bet\n i\nn\n \nt\nhe pot\n. I\nf\n t\nher\ne i\ns\n no r\nai\ns\ne bef\nor\ne t\nhe f\nl\nop, i\nt\n’\ns\n hi\nghl\ny l\ni\nkel\ny t\nhat\n t\nhe s\nm\nal\nl\n \nbl\ni\nnd w\ni\nl\nl\n com\npl\net\ne t\nhe bet\n and s\nee t\nhe f\nl\nop. T\nher\ne ar\ne f\new\n, i\nf\n any, s\ni\nt\nuat\ni\nons\n \ni\nn w\nhi\nch t\nhe pl\nayer\n i\nn t\nhe s\nm\nal\nl\n bl\ni\nnd s\nhoul\nd f\nol\nd a hand r\nat\nher\n t\nhan ki\nck i\nn\n \none m\nor\ne chi\np. For\n exam\npl\ne, l\net\n’\ns\n s\nay you ar\ne i\nn t\nhe s\nm\nal\nl\n bl\ni\nnd i\nn a\n$30/\n$60 hol\nd’\nem\n gam\ne. A\n pl\nayer\n f\nr\nom\n m\ni\nddl\ne pos\ni\nt\ni\non cal\nl\ns\n $30, as\n does\n t\nhe\n \nbut\nt\non. A\ns\n t\nhe pl\nayer\n i\nn t\nhe s\nm\nal\nl\n bl\ni\nnd, you al\nr\neady have $20 i\nnves\nt\ned, and\n \ni\nncl\nudi\nng t\nhe bi\ng bl\ni\nnd’\ns\n $30, t\nhe pot\n al\nr\neady s\nt\nands\n at\n $110. Si\nnce cal\nl\ni\nng\n \nw\ni\nl\nl\n onl\ny cos\nt\n you $10, you ar\ne get\nt\ni\nng 11 t\no 1 odds\n on your\n i\nnves\nt\nm\nent\n. A\nnd\n \ns\ni\nnce t\nher\ne ar\ne ver\ny f\new\n hands\n t\nhat\n w\noul\nd be w\nor\ns\ne t\nhan an 11 t\no 1 under\ndog\n \nt\no w\ni\nn, i\nt\n’\ns\n bas\ni\ncal\nl\ny an aut\nom\nat\ni\nc cal\nl\n no m\nat\nt\ner\n w\nhat\n you ar\ne hol\ndi\nng. \nI\nf\n onl\ny you and t\nhe bi\ng bl\ni\nnd r\nem\nai\nn, r\nem\nem\nber\n t\nhat\n t\nher\ne i\ns\n al\nr\neady $50 i\nn\n \nt\nhe pot\n and you have t\no t\nhr\now\n i\nn j\nus\nt\n one m\nor\ne chi\np t\no cal\nl\n. I\nn t\nhi\ns\n cas\ne, you\n \nar\ne get\nt\ni\nng 5 t\no 1 on your\n m\noney, and you onl\ny have t\no beat\n one pl\nayer\n. E\nven\n \ni\nf\n you l\ni\nm\np i\nn w\ni\nt\nh a m\nar\ngi\nnal\n hand and t\nhe bi\ng bl\ni\nnd r\nai\ns\nes\n you, i\nt\n’\ns\n not\n t\nhe\n \nend of\n t\nhe w\nor\nl\nd;\n you’\nve s\nt\ni\nl\nl\n m\nade t\nhe r\ni\nght\n pl\nay.\nI\nn a t\nw\no-\nand-\nf\nour\n chi\np bl\ni\nnd s\nt\nr\nuct\nur\ne, t\nhe gam\ne s\nhoul\nd be pl\nayed a bi\nt\n m\nor\ne\n \ncons\ner\nvat\ni\nvel\ny. A\ns\n t\nhe s\nm\nal\nl\n bl\ni\nnd, you’\nl\nl\n have t\no put\n i\nn one-\nhal\nf\n m\nor\ne bet\n t\no\n \ns\nee t\nhe f\nl\nop, as\n oppos\ned t\no t\nhe 1/\n3 bet\n i\nn t\nhe t\nw\no-\nand-\nt\nhr\nee chi\np s\nt\nr\nuct\nur\ne. \nL\net\n’\ns\n appl\ny t\nhe s\ncenar\ni\no above t\no a t\nw\no-\nand-\nf\nour\n chi\np s\nt\nr\nuct\nur\ne. O\nnce agai\nn,\n \nyou ar\ne i\nn t\nhe s\nm\nal\nl\n bl\ni\nnd, t\nhi\ns\n t\ni\nm\ne w\ni\nt\nh a $10 bet\n i\nnves\nt\ned. A\n m\ni\nddl\ne\n \npos\ni\nt\ni\non pl\nayer\n l\ni\nm\nps\n i\nn f\nor\n $20, as\n does\n t\nhe but\nt\non. T\nher\ne i\ns\n $70 i\nn t\nhe pot\n,\n \nand you have t\no cal\nl\n $10 m\nor\ne t\no s\nee t\nhe f\nl\nop. I\nn t\nhi\ns\n s\ncenar\ni\no, you ar\ne get\nt\ni\nng\n \n7 t\no 1 on your\n m\noney, w\nhi\nch i\ns\nn’\nt\n bad. Y\nou s\nhoul\nd s\nt\ni\nl\nl\n pl\nay a m\naj\nor\ni\nt\ny of\n \nyour\n hands\n, but\n not\n as\n m\nany as\n you w\noul\nd have i\nn t\nhe t\nw\no-\nand-\nf\nour\n chi\np\n \ns\nt\nr\nuct\nur\ne. A\ns\n you r\nead on t\nhr\nough t\nhi\ns\n chapt\ner\n,\n \nyou’\nl\nl\n f\ni\nnd a r\necur\nr\ni\nng t\nhem\ne:\n aggr\nes\ns\ni\non!\n \nSom\net\ni\nm\nes\n, you m\ni\nght\n w\nant\n t\no pr\nact\ni\nce a l\ni\nt\nt\nl\ne bi\nt\n of\n decept\ni\non by cal\nl\ni\nng a\n \nr\nai\ns\ne w\ni\nt\nh a hand l\ni\nke A\n-\nK\n s\nui\nt\ned, t\nhe bes\nt\n dr\naw\ni\nng hand of\n t\nhem\n al\nl\n. I\nf\n \nyou ar\ne up agai\nns\nt\n anot\nher\n unpai\nr\ned hand, you’\nd have t\nhe bes\nt\n hand, as\n w\nel\nl\n \nas\n t\nhe bes\nt\n dr\naw\n. \nT\nher\ne ar\ne ot\nher\n r\neas\nons\n w\nhy you m\ni\nght\n j\nus\nt\n w\nant\n t\no cal\nl\n a r\nai\ns\ne w\ni\nt\nh A\n-\nK\n \ns\nui\nt\ned. Say you ar\ne hol\ndi\nng A\n? K\n? i\nn a l\noos\ne gam\ne w\ni\nt\nh l\not\ns\n of\n act\ni\non. B\ny\n \ns\nm\noot\nh cal\nl\ni\nng, you m\ni\nght\n per\ns\nuade ot\nher\ns\n t\no s\nt\nay i\nn t\nhe pot\n. B\nei\nng heads\n-\nup\n \nw\ni\nt\nh t\nhe i\nni\nt\ni\nal\n r\nai\ns\ner\n w\noul\ndn’\nt\n be hor\nr\ni\nbl\ne, but\n i\nt\n m\ni\nght\n be even m\nor\ne\n \npr\nof\ni\nt\nabl\ne t\no l\net\n ot\nher\ns\n i\nn. So l\net\n’\ns\n s\nay you cal\nl\n, as\n do t\nhr\nee ot\nher\ns\n, and t\nhe\n \nf\nl\nop com\nes\n bad f\nor\n your\n hand—7-\n8-\n9 w\ni\nt\nh t\nw\no hear\nt\ns\n, f\nor\n exam\npl\ne. N\no\n \npr\nobl\nem\n—j\nus\nt\n check-\nm\nuck i\nt\n, t\nhus\n s\navi\nng one bet\n.\nPl\nayi\nng M\ni\nddl\ne Pai\nr\ns\n f\nr\nom\n M\ni\nddl\ne Pos\ni\nt\ni\non (\nJ\n-\nJ\n, 10-\n10, 9-\n9)\nI\nf\n you ar\ne t\nhe f\ni\nr\ns\nt\n t\no ent\ner\n t\nhe pot\n, you s\nhoul\nd r\nai\ns\ne com\ni\nng i\nn. D\non’\nt\n w\nor\nr\ny, I\n’\nl\nl\n expl\nai\nn.\nSt\neal\ni\nng f\nr\nom\n L\nat\ne Pos\ni\nt\ni\non\nWhen I\n s\nay s\nt\neal\ni\nng, I\n’\nm\n r\nef\ner\nr\ni\nng t\no a l\nat\ne pos\ni\nt\ni\non pl\nayer\n’\ns\n at\nt\nem\npt\n t\no gr\nab\n \nt\nhe bl\ni\nnds\n w\ni\nt\nh a l\nes\ns\n t\nhan pr\nem\ni\num\n hand. I\nf\n one of\n your\n \nopponent\ns\n bet\n af\nt\ner\n you s\nhow\ned w\neaknes\ns\n by checki\nng, he coul\nd have a\n \nnum\nber\n of\n hands\n. H\ne m\nay deci\nde t\no bet\n w\ni\nt\nh anyt\nhi\nng f\nr\nom\n K\n-\nQ\n, 9-\n9, Q\n-\n10,\n \nA\n-\nJ\n, or\n J\n-\n10. Fi\ngur\ni\nng out\n w\nhi\nch hand i\ns\n bei\nng bet\n i\ns\n a di\nf\nf\ni\ncul\nt\n t\nas\nk. A\ngai\nn, you ar\ne i\nn ear\nl\ny pos\ni\nt\ni\non\n \nw\ni\nt\nh t\nhe A\n-\nQ\n on a K\n-\nQ\n-\n2 f\nl\nop. T\nhi\ns\n t\ni\nm\ne, t\nhe bi\ng bl\ni\nnd bet\ns\n i\nnt\no you. What\n \nnow\n? T\nhat\n w\noul\ndn’\nt\n be good, but\n i\nt\n does\nn’\nt\n happen of\nt\nen\n \nenough t\no negat\ne t\nhe val\nue of\n t\nhe r\nai\ns\ne. H\neads\n-\nup poker\n i\ns\n l\ni\nke a pow\ner\n \ns\nt\nr\nuggl\ne, each pl\nayer\n t\nr\nyi\nng t\no get\n l\nas\nt\n act\ni\non and f\nor\nce t\nhe ot\nher\n pl\nayer\n t\no\n \nback dow\nn. I\nf\n you can cal\nl\n, r\nai\ns\ne. Wi\nt\nh a bi\nt\n of\n pr\nact\ni\nce, t\nhough, r\neadi\nng your\n hand w\ni\nl\nl\n becom\ne\n \ns\necond nat\nur\ne.\nH\nand R\neadi\nng E\nxam\npl\nes\nT\nhe f\nol\nl\now\ni\nng ar\ne exam\npl\nes\n of\n s\nom\ne com\nm\non s\ni\nt\nuat\ni\nons\n t\nhat\n ar\ni\ns\ne i\nn O\nm\naha\n \nei\nght\n-\nor\n-\nbet\nt\ner\n—and s\nom\ne t\nhat\n ar\ne a l\ni\nt\nt\nl\ne t\nr\ni\ncky. I\nf\n you have t\nr\noubl\ne\n \nf\nol\nl\now\ni\nng s\nom\ne of\n t\nhem\n, t\nr\ny deal\ni\nng out\n s\nom\ne s\nam\npl\ne hands\n and pr\nact\ni\nce\n \ni\ndent\ni\nf\nyi\nng each pl\nayer\n’\ns\n bes\nt\n hi\ngh and l\now\n hands\n. O\nnce you have s\nhar\npened\n \nyour\n hand r\neadi\nng s\nki\nl\nl\ns\n, you w\ni\nl\nl\n be r\neady t\no m\nove on t\no s\nt\nr\nat\negy. \nE\nxam\npl\ne O\nne \nY\nour\n hand:\n A\n-\n3-\nK\n-\nK\nO\npponent\n:\n 2-\n3-\n5-\n9\nB\noar\nd:\n 6-\n7-\n8-\nJ\n-\nQ\nT\nhi\ns\n i\ns\n a s\npl\ni\nt\n pot\n, as\n your\n 8-\n7-\n6-\n3-\nA\n l\now\n edges\n out\n your\n opponent\n’\ns\n 8-\n7-\n6-\n3-\n2, and hi\ns\n hi\ngh hand, a 9-\nhi\ngh s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n, beat\ns\n your\n pai\nr\n of\n ki\nngs\n.\nE\nxam\npl\ne T\nw\no\nY\nour\n hand:\n A\n-\n6-\nK\n-\nK\nO\npponent\n:\n A\n-\n4-\n8-\n8\nB\noar\nd:\n 2-\n3-\n4-\n5-\nJ\nWi\nt\nh a w\nheel\n (\n5-\n4-\n3-\n2-\nA\n)\n f\nor\n bot\nh hi\ngh and l\now\n, your\n opponent\n s\ncoops\n. Y\nou\n \ncannot\n m\nake t\nhe nut\n l\now\n, becaus\ne you m\nus\nt\n pl\nay bot\nh t\nhe ace and 6 i\nn your\n \nhand, l\neavi\nng you w\ni\nt\nh onl\ny a 6-\n4-\n3-\n2-\nA\n f\nor\n l\now\n. T\nhes\ne car\nds\n don’\nt\n s\nt\nr\net\nch t\no\n \nm\nake a s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n, ei\nt\nher\n, s\no you’\nr\ne s\nt\nuck w\ni\nt\nh j\nus\nt\n a pai\nr\n of\n ki\nngs\n f\nor\n hi\ngh. \nT\nhi\ns\n m\nay s\neem\n conf\nus\ni\nng, par\nt\ni\ncul\nar\nl\ny i\nf\n hol\nd’\nem\n has\n been your\n pr\ni\nm\nar\ny\n \ngam\ne. I\nt\n m\nakes\n \nf\nor\n ext\nr\nem\nel\ny cheap and pot\nent\ni\nal\nl\ny pr\nof\ni\nt\nabl\ne l\nes\ns\nons\n. A\ns\n t\nhe l\ni\nm\ni\nt\ns\n get\n \nhi\ngher\n, i\nt\n becom\nes\n m\nor\ne i\nm\npor\nt\nant\n t\nhat\n you have a m\nas\nt\ner\ny of\n al\nl\n as\npect\ns\n of\n \nt\nhe gam\ne, as\n you w\ni\nl\nl\n be f\naci\nng m\nor\ne hi\nghl\ny s\nki\nl\nl\ned opponent\ns\n. I\nt\n i\ns\n of\n par\nam\nount\n i\nm\npor\nt\nance t\nhat\n you r\nem\nem\nber\n t\nhi\ns\n f\nact\n:\n \nA\nl\nt\nhough O\nm\naha ei\nght\n-\nor\n-\nbet\nt\ner\n i\ns\n a s\npl\ni\nt\n-\npot\n gam\ne, t\nhe key t\no t\nhe gam\ne i\ns\n \nw\ni\nnni\nng t\nhe ent\ni\nr\ne pot\n or\n s\ncoopi\nng. Wi\nt\nh t\nhi\ns\n i\nn m\ni\nnd, you s\nhoul\nd s\nel\nect\n \nhands\n t\nhat\n s\nt\nand a good chance of\n w\ni\nnni\nng t\nhe w\nhol\ne pot\n. T\nhe key car\nd i\ns\n an\n \nace, and f\new\n hands\n ar\ne pl\nayabl\ne w\ni\nt\nhout\n one. I\nn f\nact\n, i\nf\n you’\nr\ne j\nus\nt\n s\nt\nar\nt\ni\nng\n \nout\n, i\nt\n’\ns\n not\n a bad i\ndea t\no r\nout\ni\nnel\ny f\nol\nd ever\ny hand w\ni\nt\nhout\n an ace i\nn i\nt\n. I\nn\n \ndoi\nng s\no, you’\nr\ne not\n gi\nvi\nng up m\nuch pot\nent\ni\nal\n pr\nof\ni\nt\n. A\n num\nber\n of\n \nexper\ni\nenced pl\nayer\ns\n cl\ni\nng t\no t\nhe “D\non’\nt\n l\neave hom\ne w\ni\nt\nhout\n i\nt\n” phi\nl\nos\nophy,\n \nand i\nt\n s\ner\nves\n t\nhem\n w\nel\nl\n.\nWhy ar\ne aces\n s\no s\ni\ngni\nf\ni\ncant\n? N\not\n onl\ny ar\ne t\nhey r\nequi\nr\ned f\nor\n t\nhe bes\nt\n l\now\n \ns\nt\nar\nt\ni\nng hands\n, t\nhey ar\ne al\ns\no t\nhe hi\nghes\nt\n car\nd i\nn t\nhe deck, pr\novi\ndi\nng t\nhe\n \nhi\nghes\nt\n pai\nr\n, t\nw\no pai\nr\n, t\nhr\nee of\n a ki\nnd, f\nl\nus\nh, and s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n hands\n. Why w\noul\nd\n \nyou w\nant\n t\no s\npot\n your\n opponent\ns\n a car\nd t\nhi\ns\n pow\ner\nf\nul\n and ver\ns\nat\ni\nl\ne?\nM\ni\nddl\ne C\nar\nds\n. H\nands\n dom\ni\nnat\ned by m\ni\nddl\ne car\nds\n—s\nevens\n,\n \nei\nght\ns\n, and ni\nnes\n, and t\no a l\nes\ns\ner\n ext\nent\n f\ni\nves\n, s\ni\nxes\n, and t\nens\n—s\nt\nand vi\nr\nt\nual\nl\ny\n \nno chance of\n s\ncoopi\nng, unl\nes\ns\n t\nher\ne’\ns\n no l\now\n hand.\nD\nes\npi\nt\ne t\nhe f\nact\n t\nhat\n hands\n s\nuch as\n 6-\n7-\n8-\n9 pr\noduce m\nany s\nt\nr\nai\nght\ns\n, t\nhe\n \npr\nes\nence of\n t\nhes\ne s\nt\nr\nai\nght\ns\n m\neans\n t\nhat\n a l\now\n w\ni\nl\nl\n be pos\ns\ni\nbl\ne, and t\nhe pot\n i\ns\n \nl\ni\nkel\ny t\no be s\npl\ni\nt\n. H\now\never\n, t\nhes\ne hands\n don’\nt\n hi\nt\n \nof\nt\nen, and s\nom\net\ni\nm\nes\n t\nhe pot\n s\nt\ni\nl\nl\n get\ns\n chopped bet\nw\neen you and an opponent\n \nw\ni\nt\nh a l\now\n hand or\n t\nhe s\nam\ne hi\ngh hand, t\nypi\ncal\nl\ny a s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n or\n t\nw\no pai\nr\n.\n \nA\nl\nt\nhough t\nhi\ns\n t\nype of\n hand can be pl\nayed at\n t\ni\nm\nes\n, i\nt\n i\ns\n i\nm\npor\nt\nant\n t\no\n \nr\nem\nem\nber\n t\nhat\n i\nt\n i\ns\n a dr\naw\ni\nng hand t\nhat\n w\ni\nl\nl\n us\nual\nl\ny m\ni\ns\ns\n and be f\nol\nded on t\nhe\n \nf\nl\nop. \nSo w\ni\nt\nh hi\ngh-\nonl\ny hands\n, you s\nhoul\nd l\nook f\nor\n cer\nt\nai\nn s\ni\nt\nuat\ni\nons\n, s\nuch as\n \nm\nul\nt\ni\nw\nay pot\ns\n, w\nhen you can get\n i\nn f\nor\n one bet\n and r\necei\nve a good pr\ni\nce on\n \nyour\n i\nnves\nt\nm\nent\n. T\nhi\ns\n as\ns\num\npt\ni\non i\ns\n bas\ned on t\nhe t\nendency of\n \nO\nm\naha ei\nght\n-\nor\n-\nbet\nt\ner\n pl\nayer\ns\n t\no pl\nay hands\n w\ni\nt\nh an ace i\nn t\nhem\n. I\nf\n bot\nh you\n \nand your\n opponent\n ar\ne hol\ndi\nng an ace and an ace f\nl\nops\n, your\n ki\nng m\nay w\ni\nnd\n \nup pl\nayi\nng as\n a ki\ncker\n, enabl\ni\nng you t\no w\ni\nn t\nhe hi\ngh s\ni\nde of\n t\nhe pot\n w\ni\nt\nh A\n-\nK\n.\n \nA\nl\ns\no, you gener\nal\nl\ny w\non’\nt\n need as\n s\nt\nr\nong of\n a hand t\no w\ni\nn a heads\n-\nup pot\n, s\no\n \nf\nl\noppi\nng a ki\nng or\n ki\nngs\n up has\n def\ni\nni\nt\ne val\nue. N\not\n unl\ni\nke hol\nd’\nem\n, t\nhe val\nue\n \nof\n t\nhe A\n-\nK\n com\nbi\nnat\ni\non decl\ni\nnes\n as\n m\nor\ne pl\nayer\ns\n cont\nes\nt\n t\nhe pot\n, s\ni\nnce\n \ns\nt\nr\nonger\n hands\n—s\nuch as\n s\nt\nr\nai\nght\ns\n, f\nl\nus\nhes\n, or\n f\nul\nl\n hous\nes\n—w\ni\nl\nl\n t\nypi\ncal\nl\ny be\n \nneeded t\no w\ni\nn t\nhe hi\ngh por\nt\ni\non of\n t\nhe pot\n.\nG\nr\neat\n O\nm\naha ei\nght\n-\nor\n-\nbet\nt\ner\n hands\n l\ni\nke A\n-\n2-\n3-\n4 can be r\nai\ns\ni\nng hands\n bef\nor\ne\n \nt\nhe f\nl\nop as\n w\nel\nl\n, but\n f\nor\n anot\nher\n r\neas\non. R\nai\ns\ni\nng i\nn s\npot\ns\n t\nhat\n ar\ne l\ni\nkel\ny t\no\n \npr\noduce a s\nhor\nt\n f\ni\nel\nd i\ns\n a m\ni\ns\nt\nake w\ni\nt\nh t\nhi\ns\n s\nor\nt\n of\n hand, due t\no i\nt\ns\n l\nack of\n \nhi\ngh-\nhand pot\nent\ni\nal\n. H\now\never\n, i\nn a pot\n cont\nes\nt\ned by s\never\nal\n pl\nayer\ns\n, t\nhi\ns\n hand\n \ni\ns\n excel\nl\nent\n. I\nf\n a l\now\n hand i\ns\n pos\ns\ni\nbl\ne—and a l\now\n hand w\ni\nl\nl\n be pos\ns\ni\nbl\ne m\nos\nt\n \nof\n t\nhe t\ni\nm\ne—you w\ni\nl\nl\n m\nos\nt\n l\ni\nkel\ny be hol\ndi\nng t\nhe nut\ns\n. D\nue t\no t\nhi\ns\n hand’\ns\n hi\ngh\n \npr\nobabi\nl\ni\nt\ny of\n m\naki\nng t\nhe nut\n l\now\n, go ahead and r\nai\ns\ne t\no bui\nl\nd a bi\ng pot\n i\nf\n \ns\never\nal\n pl\nayer\ns\n have al\nr\neady ent\ner\ned t\nhe hand. Y\nou s\nhoul\nd s\nt\ni\nl\nl\n get\n pl\nent\ny of\n act\ni\non.\nO\nt\nher\n good hands\n t\no r\nai\ns\ne w\ni\nt\nh i\nn m\nul\nt\ni\nw\nay pot\ns\n i\nncl\nude A\n-\nA\n-\n2-\nx, A\n-\n2-\n3-\nx,\n \nand A\n-\n2-\n4-\nx, es\npeci\nal\nl\ny i\nf\n your\n ace i\ns\n s\nui\nt\ned. B\nei\nng s\nui\nt\ned adds\n s\ni\ngni\nf\ni\ncant\n \nval\nue t\no your\n hi\ngh pr\nos\npect\ns\n, and nut\n f\nl\nus\nh car\nds\n pl\nay ver\ny w\nel\nl\n i\nn m\nul\nt\ni\nw\nay\n \ns\ni\nt\nuat\ni\nons\n. Whet\nher\n t\nhe gam\ne i\ns\n m\nos\nt\nl\ny l\noos\ne (\nw\ni\nt\nh f\ni\nve or\n m\nor\ne pl\nayer\ns\n \nt\nypi\ncal\nl\ny s\neei\nng t\nhe f\nl\nop)\n, or\n t\ni\nght\n (\nt\nhr\nee or\n f\new\ner\n)\n, s\nhoul\nd have a s\ni\ngni\nf\ni\ncant\n \ni\nm\npact\n on your\n hand s\nel\nect\ni\non. I\nn l\noos\ne gam\nes\n, hands\n goi\nng hi\ngh-\nonl\ny or\n \nl\now\n-\nonl\ny i\nncr\neas\ne i\nn val\nue. Wi\nt\nh l\now\n hands\n s\nuch as\n A\n-\n2-\n3-\n8, s\ncoopi\nng\n \nagai\nns\nt\n any num\nber\n of\n opponent\ns\n w\ni\nl\nl\n be a di\nf\nf\ni\ncul\nt\n t\nas\nk, al\nt\nhough get\nt\ni\nng hal\nf\n \nt\nhe pot\n i\ns\n ver\ny l\ni\nkel\ny w\nhen a l\now\n com\nes\n. When a pl\nayer\n t\no your\n r\ni\nght\n has\n opened f\nor\n a r\nai\ns\ne, you can m\nake i\nt\n \nt\nhr\nee bet\ns\n w\ni\nt\nh hands\n l\ni\nke A\n-\nA\n-\n6-\n8, hopi\nng t\no m\nake i\nt\n heads\n-\nup. I\nf\n i\nt\n w\nor\nks\n,\n \nyou w\ni\nl\nl\n be i\nn a good s\ni\nt\nuat\ni\non, hol\ndi\nng bot\nh t\nhe bes\nt\n hand and pos\ni\nt\ni\non. E\nven\n \nf\nai\nr\nl\ny l\noos\ne pl\nayer\ns\n w\ni\nl\nl\n t\ni\nght\nen up a bi\nt\n w\nhen f\naced w\ni\nt\nh cal\nl\ni\nng t\nw\no r\nai\ns\nes\n \ncol\nd. \nH\now\never\n, i\nn t\nhe s\nam\ne gam\ne, i\nf\n you ar\ne f\ni\nr\ns\nt\n t\no act\n w\ni\nt\nh t\nhe s\nam\ne A\n-\nA\n-\n6-\n8, i\nt\n \ni\ns\n nor\nm\nal\nl\ny bet\nt\ner\n t\no f\nol\nd t\nhan open f\nor\n t\nw\no bet\ns\n, becaus\ne i\nt\n’\ns\n m\nuch eas\ni\ner\n f\nor\n \not\nher\n pl\nayer\ns\n t\no cal\nl\n one r\nai\ns\ne t\nhan t\nw\no. T\nher\nef\nor\ne you w\ni\nl\nl\n l\ni\nkel\ny have t\no pl\nay\n \nt\nhi\ns\n hand out\n of\n pos\ni\nt\ni\non agai\nns\nt\n m\nul\nt\ni\npl\ne opponent\ns\n. O\nuch!\nT\nher\ne ar\ne t\ni\nm\nes\n t\no r\nai\ns\ne or\n r\ner\nai\ns\ne w\ni\nt\nh aces\n i\nn or\nder\n t\no bui\nl\nd a bi\ngger\n pot\n,\n \nr\nat\nher\n t\nhan t\no nar\nr\now\n t\nhe f\ni\nel\nd. When your\n hand i\nncl\nudes\n a s\nt\nr\nong s\nuppor\nt\ni\nng\n \ncas\nt\n, m\nos\nt\n s\ni\ngni\nf\ni\ncant\nl\ny a deuce w\ni\nt\nh any ot\nher\n w\nheel\n car\nd, r\nai\ns\ni\nng f\nor\n val\nue i\ns\n \na good pl\nay. T\nhi\ns\n i\ns\n par\nt\ni\ncul\nar\nl\ny t\nr\nue i\nf\n one or\n bot\nh of\n t\nhe aces\n ar\ne s\nui\nt\ned.\n \nH\nands\n l\ni\nke A\n-\nA\n-\n3-\n4 or\n A\n-\nA\n-\n2-\n5 doubl\ne-\ns\nui\nt\ned ar\ne gr\neat\n s\nt\nar\nt\ni\nng hands\n,\n \nw\nor\nt\nhy of\n cappi\nng t\nhe bet\nt\ni\nng bef\nor\ne t\nhe f\nl\nop. U\nnf\nor\nt\nunat\nel\ny, t\nhi\ns\n t\nype of\n \nhand i\ns\n r\nar\ne. I\nn f\nact\n, you ar\ne m\nor\ne l\ni\nkel\ny t\no be deal\nt\n f\nour\n of\n a ki\nnd t\nhan t\nhe\n \ndr\neam\n hand of\n A\n-\nA\n-\n2-\n3 doubl\ne-\ns\nui\nt\ned. T\nher\ne ar\ne onl\ny t\nw\nel\nve com\nbi\nnat\ni\nons\n of\n \nA\n-\nA\n-\n2-\n3 doubl\ne s\nui\nt\ned avai\nl\nabl\ne, ver\ns\nus\n t\nhi\nr\nt\neen w\nays\n t\no be deal\nt\n quads\n.\nM\nor\ne R\ner\nai\ns\ni\nng Si\nt\nuat\ni\nons\nT\nhe goal\ns\n of\n a r\ner\nai\ns\ne ar\ne es\ns\nent\ni\nal\nl\ny t\nhe s\nam\ne as\n t\nhos\ne of\n a r\nai\ns\ne—you ei\nt\nher\n \nw\nant\n t\no nar\nr\now\n t\nhe f\ni\nel\nd or\n i\nncr\neas\ne t\nhe s\ni\nze of\n t\nhe pot\n. H\now\never\n, put\nt\ni\nng i\nn a\n \nt\nhi\nr\nd bet\n of\nt\nen t\nends\n t\no be an even m\nor\ne ef\nf\nect\ni\nve m\neans\n of\n el\ni\nm\ni\nnat\ni\nng t\nhe\n \not\nher\n pl\nayer\ns\n. H\nands\n t\nhat\n m\nany pl\nayer\ns\n w\noul\nd happi\nl\ny cal\nl\n t\nw\no bet\ns\n w\ni\nt\nh,\n \ns\nuch as\n A\n-\n3-\n6-\n9 or\n A\n-\n4-\n5-\nJ\n, now\n go s\nai\nl\ni\nng i\nnt\no t\nhe m\nuck. E\nven l\noos\ne pl\nayer\ns\n \nm\nay bal\nk at\n t\nhe pr\nos\npect\n of\n cal\nl\ni\nng t\nhr\nee bet\ns\n w\ni\nt\nh gar\nbage. So, i\nf\n you f\neel\n \nyour\n hand m\nat\nches\n up bes\nt\n agai\nns\nt\n onl\ny one or\n t\nw\no ot\nher\n hands\n, a r\ner\nai\ns\ne m\nay\n \nbe us\ned t\no s\net\n up t\nhi\ns\n s\ncenar\ni\no. Si\nnce you w\ni\nl\nl\n be get\nt\ni\nng a good pr\ni\nce t\no\n \ncal\nl\n, i\nt\n i\ns\n accept\nabl\ne t\no al\nl\now\n your\n hand s\nel\nect\ni\non s\nt\nandar\nds\n t\no di\np a bi\nt\n,\n \npr\novi\nded you pl\nay hands\n capabl\ne of\n beat\ni\nng a l\nar\nge f\ni\nel\nd. Y\nou w\non’\nt\n \nel\ni\nm\ni\nnat\ne t\nhe nut\n f\nl\nus\nh dr\naw\n or\n a l\now\n s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n dr\naw\n s\nuch as\n A\n-\n4-\n5, but\n you\n \nm\ni\nght\n i\nnduce s\nm\nal\nl\ner\n f\nl\nus\nh dr\naw\ns\n t\no f\nol\nd, enabl\ni\nng your\n hand t\no hol\nd up as\n \nl\nong as\n none of\n your\n opponent\ns\n w\nas\n dr\naw\ni\nng t\no t\nhe nut\n f\nl\nus\nh.\n(\n5)\n T\nhe bes\nt\n t\ni\nm\ne t\no f\nl\nop a s\net\n i\ns\n w\nhen t\nhe boar\nd com\nes\n w\ni\nt\nh ei\nt\nher\n t\nw\no or\n \nt\nhr\nee hi\ngh car\nds\n, becaus\ne hi\ngh boar\nds\n m\nean t\nhat\n no l\now\n i\ns\n pos\ns\ni\nbl\ne;\n t\nher\nef\nor\ne,\n \nyou’\nr\ne pl\nayi\nng f\nor\n t\nhe w\nhol\ne pot\n. T\nhi\ns\n has\n a s\ni\ngni\nf\ni\ncant\n i\nm\npact\n on your\n pot\n \nodds\n, as\n t\nhe pot\n i\ns\n es\ns\nent\ni\nal\nl\ny l\nayi\nng you doubl\ne t\nhe pr\ni\nce as\n w\nhen t\nhe boar\nd\n \ncont\nai\nns\n a l\now\n hand. A\ns\n a r\nes\nul\nt\n, i\nt\n i\ns\n gener\nal\nl\ny cor\nr\nect\n t\no go t\no t\nhe r\ni\nver\n w\nhen\n \nyou f\nl\nop a s\net\n w\ni\nt\nh a hi\ngh boar\nd. \n(\n6)\n T\nhe dr\naw\nback w\ni\nt\nh hands\n s\nuch as\n A\n-\n3-\nK\n-\nK\n w\nhen t\nhe f\nl\nop com\nes\n K\n-\nQ\n-\nJ\n i\ns\n \nt\nhat\n you f\nr\nequent\nl\ny need t\no f\ni\nl\nl\n up t\no w\ni\nn t\nhe pot\n. I\nn O\nm\naha ei\nght\n-\nor\n-\nbet\nt\ner\n,\n \nw\ni\nt\nh s\never\nal\n pl\nayer\ns\n i\nn t\nhe hand, s\nom\neone w\ni\nl\nl\n have A\n-\n10 m\nor\ne of\nt\nen t\nhan\n \nyou m\ni\nght\n t\nhi\nnk. A\nl\nt\nhough i\nt\n’\ns\n danger\nous\n t\no pl\nay f\nl\nus\nh and s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n dr\naw\ns\n, you w\ni\nl\nl\n be\n \npl\nayi\nng f\nar\n t\noo t\ni\nght\nl\ny i\nf\n you aut\nom\nat\ni\ncal\nl\ny f\nol\nd ever\ny t\ni\nm\ne t\nhe f\nl\nop br\ni\nngs\n a\n \npai\nr\n. H\ne m\nay have\n \ns\nom\net\nhi\nng l\ni\nke A\n-\n3-\n10-\n10, i\nn w\nhi\nch cas\ne you have hi\nm\n beat\n. Y\nou f\ni\ngur\ne t\no have t\nhe bes\nt\n hi\ngh hand,\n \nw\nhi\nch m\nay be good f\nor\n a s\ncoop. A\nnot\nher\n poi\nnt\n w\nor\nt\nh not\ni\nng i\ns\n t\nhat\n your\n \naggr\nes\ns\ni\nve pl\nay m\nay encour\nage a s\ni\nngl\ne opponent\n t\no r\nel\ni\nnqui\ns\nh a hand w\ni\nt\nh a\n \nm\nade, al\nbei\nt\n r\nough, l\now\n s\nuch as\n A\n-\n3-\n7-\nK\n. T\nhi\ns\n m\naj\nor\n vi\nct\nor\ny coul\nd not\n have\n \nbeen w\non by checki\nng. I\nf\n your\n opponent\n r\nai\ns\nes\n you, t\nhen you can r\never\nt\n t\no\n \ncal\nl\ni\nng m\node f\nor\n t\nhe r\nes\nt\n of\n t\nhe hand, as\n hi\ns\n r\nai\ns\ne pr\nobabl\ny s\ni\ngni\nf\ni\nes\n a m\nade\n \nl\now\n.\nM\nani\npul\nat\ni\nng t\nhe Si\nze of\n t\nhe Pot\nO\nne of\n t\nhe m\nos\nt\n com\nm\non and aggr\navat\ni\nng per\ni\nl\ns\n of\n O\nm\naha ei\nght\n-\nor\n-\nbet\nt\ner\n \ncom\nes\n w\nhen you f\nl\nop a ni\nce hi\ngh hand or\n hi\ngh dr\naw\n and pl\nay i\nt\n aggr\nes\ns\ni\nvel\ny,\n \nonl\ny t\no s\nee t\nw\no opponent\ns\n m\nake t\nhei\nr\n l\now\n hands\n on t\nhe t\nur\nn and pr\nom\npt\nl\ny go\n \nt\no w\nar\n. Wi\nt\nh t\nhat\n i\nn m\ni\nnd, i\nt\n i\ns\n \nnor\nm\nal\nl\ny bes\nt\n t\no j\nus\nt\n cal\nl\n w\ni\nt\nh a l\nes\ns\ner\n nut\n hand, hopi\nng you don’\nt\n get\n beat\nen,\n \nr\nat\nher\n t\nhan m\nake a f\nut\ni\nl\ne at\nt\nem\npt\n t\no nar\nr\now\n t\nhe f\ni\nel\nd.\nWhen Y\nou O\nnl\ny H\nave t\nhe N\nut\n L\now\nI\nt\n i\ns\n com\nm\non i\nn l\noos\ne, pas\ns\ni\nve O\nm\naha ei\nght\n-\nor\n-\nbet\nt\ner\n gam\nes\n t\nypi\ncal\n at\n t\nhe\n \nl\now\ner\n l\ni\nm\ni\nt\ns\n f\nor\n pl\nayer\ns\n t\no m\nake t\nhe nut\n l\now\n and t\nhen check i\nf\n t\nhei\nr\n hand\n \nl\nacks\n hi\ngh pot\nent\ni\nal\n. B\nut\n t\nhat\n’\ns\n t\nhe w\nr\nong pl\nay. For\n one t\nhi\nng, i\nf\n s\never\nal\n \npl\nayer\ns\n ar\ne i\nn t\nhe pot\n, t\nher\ne i\ns\n val\nue i\nn bet\nt\ni\nng t\nhe hand. Wi\nnni\nng hal\nf\n t\nhe pot\n \nw\ni\nl\nl\n s\nt\ni\nl\nl\n be pr\nof\ni\nt\nabl\ne, and s\no w\ni\nl\nl\n r\necei\nvi\nng a quar\nt\ner\n i\nf\n f\ni\nve or\n m\nor\ne pl\nayer\ns\n \nar\ne i\nn. \nPer\nhaps\n m\nor\ne s\ni\ngni\nf\ni\ncant\n i\ns\n t\nhe pos\ns\ni\nbi\nl\ni\nt\ny of\n w\ni\nnni\nng t\nhe pot\n w\ni\nt\nh a bet\n. E\nven i\nf\n you don’\nt\n have a\n \npai\nr\n, i\nt\n’\ns\n a good i\ndea t\no bet\n your\n nut\n l\now\n. I\nn 1989 af\nt\ner\n t\nhr\nee year\ns\n of\n col\nl\nege,\n \ns\nt\nudyi\nng t\no be a l\naw\nyer\n, T\nodd s\nt\nunned m\ne by announci\nng t\nhat\n he w\nas\nn’\nt\n \ngoi\nng back t\no s\nchool\n f\nor\n hi\ns\n s\neni\nor\n year\n. “I\n w\nant\n t\no be a pr\nof\nes\ns\ni\nonal\n poker\n \npl\nayer\n,” he expl\nai\nned. We had never\n t\nal\nked m\nuch about\n gam\nbl\ni\nng i\nn m\ny\n \nhous\nehol\nd, and I\n di\ndn’\nt\n even know\n t\nhat\n T\nodd knew\n how\n t\no pl\nay poker\n. I\nt\n \nt\nur\nned out\n he had been pl\nayi\nng i\nn t\nhe ar\nea ar\nound hi\ns\n col\nl\nege, T\nexas\n T\nech i\nn\n \nL\nubbock. H\ne had got\nt\nen f\nai\nr\nl\ny pr\nof\ni\nci\nent\n and deci\nded he l\ni\nked i\nt\n m\nor\ne t\nhan\n \nhi\ns\n s\nt\nudi\nes\n. So at\n t\nhe age of\n 20, T\nodd s\nt\nar\nt\ned hi\ns\n car\neer\n as\n a pr\no.\nI\nt\n s\noon becam\ne appar\nent\n t\nhat\n he had t\nhe s\nki\nl\nl\ns\n t\no w\ni\nn. When he w\nas\n 21, T\nodd\n \nw\non f\ni\nr\ns\nt\n-\npl\nace at\n t\nhe $200,000 m\nai\nn-\nevent\n i\nn t\nhe D\ni\nam\nond J\ni\nm\n B\nr\nady\n \nt\nour\nnam\nent\n at\n t\nhe B\ni\ncycl\ne C\nl\nub i\nn L\nos\n A\nngel\nes\n. I\nt\n w\nas\n t\nhe f\ni\nr\ns\nt\n of\n ni\nne car\neer\n \nw\ni\nns\n i\nn bi\ng t\nour\nnam\nent\ns\n.\nT\nodd had an uncanny abi\nl\ni\nt\ny t\no r\nem\nem\nber\n t\nhi\nngs\n, even as\n a young chi\nl\nd. I\n’\nve\n \nal\nw\nays\n t\nhought\n t\nhat\n a poker\n pl\nayer\n’\ns\n gr\neat\nes\nt\n gi\nf\nt\n i\ns\n t\nhe abi\nl\ni\nt\ny t\no r\necal\nl\n pas\nt\n \nhands\n and event\ns\n, and I\n’\nm\n s\nur\ne t\nhat\n hi\ns\n am\nazi\nng knack f\nor\n vi\nvi\ndl\ny\n \nr\nem\nem\nber\ni\nng t\nhe pas\nt\n has\n hel\nped hi\nm\n a l\not\n. \nA\nl\nl\now\n m\ne t\no exer\nci\ns\ne m\ny br\naggi\nng r\ni\nght\ns\n by t\nel\nl\ni\nng you a l\ni\nt\nt\nl\ne s\nt\nor\ny about\n \nT\nodd. I\n al\nw\nays\n knew\n t\nhat\n he w\nas\n a gr\neat\n hol\nd’\nem\n pl\nayer\n, but\n he s\nuppor\nt\ned m\ny\n \nbel\ni\nef\n i\nn s\npades\n t\nhi\ns\n pas\nt\n year\n i\nn t\nhe t\nw\no bi\ngges\nt\n gam\nes\n I\n’\nve ever\n hear\nd of\n. A\n \nbr\ni\nl\nl\ni\nant\n bus\ni\nnes\ns\nm\nan cam\ne t\no V\negas\n t\no chal\nl\nenge t\nhe w\nor\nl\nd’\ns\n bes\nt\n poker\n \npl\nayer\ns\n. I\nt\n w\nas\n cl\near\n t\no m\ne t\nhat\n hi\ns\n s\nt\nr\nat\negi\nc capabi\nl\ni\nt\ni\nes\n ext\nended beyond\n \nbus\ni\nnes\ns\n and i\nnt\no poker\n. H\ne w\nant\ned t\no pl\nay s\no hi\ngh t\nhat\n hi\ns\n poker\n chal\nl\nenger\ns\n \nneeded t\no pool\n t\nhei\nr\n m\noney j\nus\nt\n t\no accom\nm\nodat\ne hi\nm\n. We w\ner\ne al\nl\n i\nm\npr\nes\ns\ned.\nT\nhen T\nodd s\nat\n dow\nn t\no pl\nay hi\nm\n heads\n-\nup i\nn a “f\nr\ni\nendl\ny l\ni\nt\nt\nl\ne gam\ne” of\n \n$50,000-\n$100,000 T\nexas\n hol\nd’\nem\n. I\nf\n \nyou have i\nm\npr\noved t\no t\nr\ni\nps\n or\n ki\nngs\n-\nup, you w\ni\nl\nl\n j\nus\nt\n have t\no hol\nd your\n br\neat\nh\n \nand\ncheck-\ncal\nl\n on s\ni\nxt\nh and s\nevent\nh s\nt\nr\neet\ns\n, hopi\nng f\nor\n t\nhe bes\nt\n. Y\nou’\nr\ne not\n \nbr\neaki\nng t\nhe Pl\nat\ni\nnum\n R\nul\ne her\ne becaus\ne at\n t\nhi\ns\n poi\nnt\n, t\nhe bes\nt\n i\ns\n s\nt\ni\nl\nl\n a s\ncoop,\n \nas\n Pl\nayer\n O\nne coul\nd have m\nade t\nw\no pai\nr\n and m\ni\ns\ns\ned hi\ns\n l\now\n, or\n he coul\nd have\n \ns\nt\nar\nt\ned w\ni\nt\nh a bur\ni\ned pai\nr\n or\n a t\nhr\nee-\nf\nl\nus\nh.\nA\ngai\nns\nt\n M\nul\nt\ni\npl\ne O\npponent\ns\nL\net\n’\ns\n m\nove on t\no t\nhe s\necond and t\nr\ni\ncki\ner\n hal\nf\n of\n t\nhi\ns\n concept\n:\n Pl\nayi\nng t\nhe bi\ng\n \npai\nr\n agai\nns\nt\n m\nul\nt\ni\npl\ne opponent\ns\n goi\nng l\now\n.\nWhen hol\ndi\nng a hi\ngh pai\nr\n agai\nns\nt\n m\nul\nt\ni\npl\ne opponent\ns\n goi\nng l\now\n, don’\nt\n put\n \next\nr\na bet\ns\n i\nn on t\nhi\nr\nd s\nt\nr\neet\n unl\nes\ns\n you f\neel\n t\nhat\n you can nar\nr\now\n t\nhe f\ni\nel\nd by\n \ndoi\nng s\no. I\nt\n’\ns\n onl\ny 4.55 t\no 1 agai\nns\nt\n t\nhat\n happeni\nng, m\naki\nng t\nhe t\nhr\neat\n gr\neat\ner\n t\nhan\n \nw\nhen you f\nace a s\ni\nngl\ne ace. \nO\nkay, enough w\ni\nt\nh t\nhi\ns\n com\npl\ni\ncat\ned s\nt\nuf\nf\n, j\nus\nt\n r\nem\nem\nber\n:\n I\nf\n t\nher\ne ar\ne t\nw\no\n \naces\n out\n, i\nt\n i\ns\n about\n 24 per\ncent\n m\nor\ne l\ni\nkel\ny t\nhat\n s\nom\neone has\n s\npl\ni\nt\n or\n r\nol\nl\ned up\n \naces\n t\nhan i\nf\n t\nher\ne i\ns\n onl\ny one\nace-\nup.\nC\nO\nN\nC\nE\nPT\n 10:\nR\nE\nC\nO\nG\nN\nI\nZ\nI\nN\nG\n T\nH\nE\n N\nU\nT\n L\nO\nW\nI\nn al\nl\n f\nor\nm\ns\n of\n poker\n, es\npeci\nal\nl\ny i\nn ei\nght\n-\nor\n-\nbet\nt\ner\n, i\nt\n i\ns\n ver\ny i\nm\npor\nt\nant\n t\no\n \nknow\n w\nhen you have a boar\nd l\nock, m\neani\nng t\nhat\n i\nt\n i\ns\n i\nm\npos\ns\ni\nbl\ne f\nor\n any\n \nopponent\n t\no have your\n hand beat\n at\n t\nhat\n poi\nnt\n. A\nl\nt\nhough you m\ni\nght\n be t\nem\npt\ned t\no f\nol\nd, you s\nhoul\ndn’\nt\n.\n \nY\nou s\nhoul\nd t\nake a car\nd her\ne. Y\nour\n hand s\nt\ni\nl\nl\n has\n s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n pot\nent\ni\nal\n and you\n \nm\nay out\n-\ndr\naw\n hi\nm\n f\nor\n l\now\n anyw\nay. A\nn ace w\ni\nl\nl\n gi\nve you a ver\ny good l\now\n and\n \na 3 or\n a 6 w\ni\nl\nl\n gi\nve you a decent\n l\now\n w\ni\nt\nh a gut\ns\nhot\n s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n dr\naw\n f\nor\n des\ns\ner\nt\n.\n \nPl\nayer\n T\nw\no m\nay al\ns\no have an 8 or\n a w\nor\ns\ne 7 (\n7-\n6)\n i\nn t\nhe hol\ne, s\no keep t\nhe\n \nf\nai\nt\nh. \nC\nO\nN\nC\nE\nPT\n 11:\n PL\nA\nY\nI\nN\nG\n L\nO\nW H\nA\nN\nD\nS\nI\nn ei\nght\n-\nor\n-\nbet\nt\ner\n, how\n l\now\n hands\n ar\ne pl\nayed i\ns\n m\nuch of\n w\nhat\n s\nepar\nat\nes\n t\nhe\n \nexper\nt\ns\n f\nr\nom\n t\nhe m\ner\nel\ny good pl\nayer\ns\n. M\nuch of\n ei\nght\n-\nor\n-\nbet\nt\ner\n i\ns\n f\nai\nr\nl\ny\n \nobvi\nous\n t\no an exper\ni\nenced pl\nayer\n, and m\nany of\n t\nhe s\ni\nt\nuat\ni\nons\n t\nhat\n cal\nl\n f\nor\n t\nhe\n \nexper\nt\n pl\nays\n I\n’\nve cover\ned, and w\ni\nl\nl\n cover\n l\nat\ner\n, r\nar\nel\ny ar\ni\ns\ne. Y\nou’\nr\ne t\nhi\nnki\nng, “I\n have t\nhe bes\nt\n l\now\n dr\naw\n, m\naybe I\n s\nhoul\nd l\net\n hi\nm\n hang\n \nar\nound.” N\no, abs\nol\nut\nel\ny not\n!\n I\nt\n w\noul\nd be eas\ny f\nor\n hi\nm\n t\no cat\nch good w\nhi\nl\ne\n \nyou caught\n bad, and t\nhen you m\ni\nght\n w\ni\nnd up w\ni\nt\nh t\nhe w\nor\ns\nt\n l\now\n dr\naw\n.\nI\n s\nee f\nai\nr\nl\ny good pl\nayer\ns\n j\nus\nt\n cal\nl\n her\ne on a r\negul\nar\n bas\ni\ns\n. T\nhi\ns\n i\ns\n a hor\nr\ni\nbl\ne\n \npl\nay. T\nhes\ne ar\ne t\nhe s\npot\ns\n you’\nr\ne w\nai\nt\ni\nng f\nor\n. T\nhi\ns\n i\ns\n t\nhe t\ni\nm\ne t\no di\nvi\nde and\n \nconquer\n!\n \nC\nO\nN\nC\nE\nPT\n 15:\n ST\nE\nA\nL\nI\nN\nG\n T\nH\nE\n A\nN\nT\nE\nS\nA\nnt\ne s\nt\neal\ni\nng i\ns\n not\n as\n i\nnt\nr\ni\ncat\ne a par\nt\n i\nn s\nt\nud ei\nght\n-\nor\n-\nbet\nt\ner\n gam\nes\n as\n i\nt\n i\ns\n i\nn\n \nm\nany ot\nher\n f\nor\nm\ns\n of\n poker\n, es\npeci\nal\nl\ny i\nn f\nul\nl\n gam\nes\n, m\nos\nt\nl\ny becaus\ne t\nhe l\now\n \ncar\nd i\ns\n al\nm\nos\nt\n al\nw\nays\n bel\now\n an 8, s\no any pl\nayer\n w\ni\nt\nh s\nuch a car\nd has\n one-\nt\nhi\nr\nd of\n a pl\nayabl\ne hand s\nhow\ni\nng.\nA\ns\n i\nn ot\nher\n gam\nes\n, i\nf\n you’\nr\ne goi\nng t\no t\nr\ny t\no s\nt\neal\n t\nhe ant\nes\n, you obvi\nous\nl\ny\n \nneed t\no be i\nn l\nat\ne pos\ni\nt\ni\non. I\nf\n t\nher\ne i\ns\n an ace or\n m\nul\nt\ni\npl\ne l\now\n car\nds\n behi\nnd you,\n \ndon’\nt\n even t\nhi\nnk of\n t\nr\nyi\nng i\nt\n. Y\nour\n bes\nt\n chance i\ns\n w\nhen you have an ace-\nup,\n \nand t\nher\ne’\ns\n not\nhi\nng but\n m\ni\nddl\ne car\nds\n behi\nnd you. B\not\nh pl\nayer\ns\n w\ni\nl\nl\n put\n you on a hi\ngh hand, and t\nhe opponent\n \nt\nhat\n’\ns\n goi\nng hi\ngh w\ni\nl\nl\n be s\ncar\ned t\no put\n a bet\n i\nn t\nhe pot\n t\nhr\noughout\n t\nhe hand.\n \nM\neanw\nhi\nl\ne, s\ni\nnce you’\nve put\n i\nn s\no m\nany bet\ns\n, your\n opponent\n goi\nng l\now\n w\ni\nl\nl\n \nnever\n gi\nve you cr\nedi\nt\n w\nhen you m\nake your\n l\now\n, of\nt\nen put\nt\ni\nng t\noo m\nany bi\ng\n \nbet\ns\n i\nn on t\nhe end. I\n’\nve of\nt\nen us\ned t\nhi\ns\n pl\nay and had bot\nh pl\nayer\ns\n s\no conf\nus\ned\n \nt\nhat\n t\nhey checked al\nl\n t\nhe w\nay t\no t\nhe r\ni\nver\n. Wi\nt\nh t\nhes\ne f\nr\nee car\nds\n you can\n \nbackdoor\n al\nl\n ki\nnds\n of\n hands\n, s\nuch as\n s\nt\nr\nai\nght\ns\n, f\nl\nus\nhes\n, l\now\ns\n, and even t\nw\no\n \npai\nr\ns\n or\n t\nr\ni\nps\n.\nB\nef\nor\ne w\ne m\nove on, I\n w\nant\n t\no once agai\nn em\nphas\ni\nze t\nhat\n t\nhi\ns\n pl\nay s\nhoul\nd not\n \nbe us\ned on a r\negul\nar\n bas\ni\ns\n. I\nt\n s\nhoul\nd onl\ny be us\ned af\nt\ner\n a l\not\n of\n bet\ns\n have gone\n \ni\nn on t\nhi\nr\nd s\nt\nr\neet\n, addi\nng t\nhe equi\nt\ny r\nequi\nr\ned t\no m\nake t\nhi\ns\n s\nucces\ns\nf\nul\n.\nC\nO\nN\nC\nE\nPT\n 18:\n PA\nR\nT\nI\nN\nG\n T\nH\nO\nU\nG\nH\nT\nS\nI\nn concl\nus\ni\non, I\n w\nant\n t\no t\nel\nl\n a s\nhor\nt\n anecdot\ne. T\nhi\ns\n f\ni\nnal\n s\nt\nor\ny has\n t\no do w\ni\nt\nh\n \nal\nl\n f\nor\nm\ns\n of\n poker\n, not\n j\nus\nt\n ei\nght\n-\nor\n-\nbet\nt\ner\n—even al\nl\n of\n l\ni\nf\ne f\nor\n t\nhat\n m\nat\nt\ner\n.\n \nA\nl\nt\nhough i\nt\n does\nn’\nt\n per\nt\nai\nn onl\ny t\no t\nhe gam\ne t\nhat\n I\n cover\ned i\nn t\nhi\ns\n chapt\ner\n, I\n \nw\nant\ned t\no i\nncl\nude i\nt\n i\nn a book as\n gr\neat\n as\n Super\n/\nSys\nt\nem\n 2 f\nor\n pos\nt\ner\ni\nt\ny’\ns\n s\nake.\nL\net\n’\ns\n s\nay you w\nent\n t\no a pet\n s\nt\nor\ne and s\naw\n a dog you f\nel\nl\n i\nn l\nove w\ni\nt\nh becaus\ne\n \nof\n i\nt\ns\n bar\nk. Woul\nd you t\nhen t\nake t\nhe dog hom\ne and yel\nl\n at\n i\nt\n and t\nel\nl\n i\nt\n t\nhat\n i\nt\n \n260', metadata={'source': 'players/doyle_brunson/brunson_pdfs/super_system_2.pdf', 'page': 259}),
 Document(page_content='w\nas\n s\nt\nupi\nd f\nor\n bar\nki\nng? Woul\nd you t\nr\ny t\no t\neach t\nhe dog how\n t\no m\neow\n or\n m\noo\n \ni\nns\nt\nead? N\no, of\n cour\ns\ne not\n. D\noi\nng s\no w\noul\nd be unr\neas\nonabl\ne and r\ni\ndi\ncul\nous\n.\nY\nou w\noul\nd pr\nobabl\ny s\nay a per\ns\non w\nho di\nd t\nhi\ns\n w\nas\n i\nr\nr\nat\ni\nonal\n or\n even cr\nazy.\n \nH\now\never\n, i\nf\n you l\nook f\nor\n gam\nes\n w\ni\nt\nh bad pl\nayer\ns\n, t\nhen get\n i\nn t\nhe gam\ne and\n \nyel\nl\n at\n t\nhem\n and t\nel\nl\n t\nhem\n t\nhat\n t\nhey’\nr\ne s\nt\nupi\nd w\nhen t\nhey pl\nay badl\ny and beat\n \nyou, i\ns\nn’\nt\n t\nhat\n t\nhe s\nam\ne t\nhi\nng? I\ns\nn’\nt\n t\nhat\n cr\nazy? D\nogs\n bar\nk. T\nhat\n’\ns\n w\nhat\n t\nhey\n \ndo. \nT\nhi\ns\n i\ns\n t\nant\nam\nount\n t\no w\nhat\n bad pl\nayer\ns\n do—t\nhey l\nay bad beat\ns\n on peopl\ne.\n \nY\nou w\nant\ned t\no pl\nay w\ni\nt\nh t\nhem\n becaus\ne t\nhey pl\nay bad. So, you have no r\ni\nght\n \nt\no get\n m\nad or\n m\nake s\npeeches\n w\nhen t\nhey do pl\nay bad and w\ni\nnd up beat\ni\nng\n \nyou.\nD\non’\nt\n t\nr\ny t\no t\neach a dog t\no m\neow\n and don’\nt\n t\nr\ny t\no t\neach bad pl\nayer\ns\n how\n t\no\n \npl\nay good. I\nt\n’\ns\n t\nhei\nr\n m\noney and t\nhey can pl\nay i\nt\n as\n t\nhey l\ni\nke. A\nl\ns\no, t\nhi\nnk about\n \nhow\n f\nus\ns\ni\nng at\n bad pl\nayer\ns\n m\nakes\n you l\nook. I\nf\n t\nhi\ns\n bad pl\nayer\n has\n enough\n \nm\noney t\no pl\nay cr\nazy and l\noos\ne i\nn t\nhe s\nam\ne gam\ne you’\nr\ne t\nr\nyi\nng t\no w\ni\nn i\nn, how\n \ncan you cal\nl\n hi\nm\n a s\nucker\n? (\nA\n f\new\n year\ns\n ago, I\n hear\nd Phi\nl\n H\nel\nl\nm\nut\nh, w\nho di\ndn’\nt\n have a l\not\n of\n \nm\noney at\n t\nhe t\ni\nm\ne, t\nel\nl\n L\nar\nr\ny Fl\nynt\n t\nhat\n i\nf\n he kept\n pl\nayi\nng t\nhat\n w\nay he’\nd go\n \nbr\noke.)\nA\ns\n t\nhe ol\nd s\nayi\nng goes\n, i\nf\n you can’\nt\n handl\ne t\nhe heat\n, s\nt\nay out\n of\n t\nhe ki\nt\nchen.\n \nFi\nnd a ki\nnder\n, gent\nl\ner\n poker\n gam\ne w\ni\nt\nh l\nes\ns\n m\nani\nacs\n and m\nor\ne s\nt\nabl\ne pl\nayer\ns\n.\n \nY\nou w\ni\nl\nl\n pr\nobabl\ny w\ni\nn l\nes\ns\n, but\n you m\ni\nght\n m\nanage t\no hol\nd on t\no your\n s\nani\nt\ny a\n \nl\ni\nt\nt\nl\ne l\nonger\n.\nK\neep i\nn m\ni\nnd t\nhat\n I\n’\nm\n r\nef\ner\nr\ni\nng t\no com\nm\nent\ns\n t\nhat\n w\ni\nl\nl\n be t\naken s\ner\ni\nous\nl\ny.\n \nG\nood-\nnat\nur\ned j\noki\nng and r\ni\nbbi\nng—or\n gi\nvi\nng t\nhe needl\ne, as\n w\ne s\nay i\nn poker\n—\ni\ns\n par\nt\n of\n t\nhe gam\ne.
