Whi\nl\ne hi\ns\n gam\ne i\ns\n gear\ned f\nor\n ul\nt\nr\na hi\ngh-\ns\nt\nakes\n poker\n, L\nyl\ne w\nas\n t\nhe f\ni\nr\ns\nt\n pl\nayer\n t\no r\neal\nl\ny cr\nunch t\nhe num\nber\ns\n of\n t\nhe\n \ngam\ne and has\n cal\ncul\nat\ned s\nt\nat\ni\ns\nt\ni\ncal\n char\nt\ns\n t\nhat\n w\ner\ne t\nhe f\ni\nr\ns\nt\n of\n t\nhei\nr\n ki\nnd.\nA\nn al\nl\n-\nar\nound poker\n pl\nayer\n, L\nyl\ne has\n w\non t\nhr\nee gol\nd br\nacel\net\ns\n at\n t\nhe Wor\nl\nd\n \nSer\ni\nes\n of\n Poker\n:\n one each i\nn l\ni\nm\ni\nt\n O\nm\naha, no-\nl\ni\nm\ni\nt\n T\nexas\n hol\nd’\nem\n, and\n \ndeuce-\nt\no-\ns\neven l\now\nbal\nl\n. When Super\n/\nSys\nt\nem\n f\ni\nr\ns\nt\n cam\ne out\n i\nn 1978, L\nyl\ne\n \nbought\n a copy and l\net\n i\nt\n gat\nher\n cobw\nebs\n unt\ni\nl\n 1983, w\nhen he f\ni\nnal\nl\ny r\nead i\nt\n.\n \nT\nhat\n year\n he w\non $10,000—not\n i\nn poker\n, but\n i\nn a cr\naps\n gam\ne—and deci\nded\n \nt\no ki\nck back by ent\ner\ni\nng a $100 buy-\ni\nn poker\n t\nour\nnam\nent\n at\n t\nhe St\nar\ndus\nt\n. \n“I\n di\ndn’\nt\n w\ni\nn t\nhe t\nour\nnam\nent\n, but\n I\n f\nound t\nhat\n I\n enj\noyed pl\nayi\nng poker\n m\nor\ne\n \nt\nhan s\nhoot\ni\nng cr\naps\n,” he t\nol\nd m\ne. “A\nnd f\nr\nom\n t\nhat\n poi\nnt\n on, I\n w\nas\n hooked.” \nA\nl\nw\nays\n a qui\nck s\nt\nudy, he w\non t\nhe pot\n-\nl\ni\nm\ni\nt\n O\nm\naha event\n at\n t\nhe Super\n B\now\nl\n \nof\n Poker\n at\n L\nake T\nahoe t\nhe ver\ny next\n year\n. I\nn 2002 L\nyl\ne w\nas\n aw\nar\nded\n \npoker\n’\ns\n hi\nghes\nt\n honor\n w\nhen he w\nas\n i\nnduct\ned i\nnt\no t\nhe Poker\n H\nal\nl\n of\n Fam\ne.\nI\nr\noni\ncal\nl\ny, as\n gr\neat\n a pl\nayer\n as\n he i\ns\n, L\nyl\ne’\ns\n l\negacy t\no t\nhe poker\n w\nor\nl\nd w\ni\nl\nl\n not\n \nbe hi\ns\n expl\noi\nt\ns\n at\n t\nhe t\nabl\ne, but\n r\nat\nher\n t\nhe popul\nar\ni\nt\ny expl\nos\ni\non poker\n has\n \nenj\noyed t\nhanks\n t\no t\nhe Wor\nl\nd Poker\n T\nour\n on t\nel\nevi\ns\ni\non. M\ni\nl\nl\ni\nons\n w\nat\nch t\nhe i\nnnovat\ni\nve and exci\nt\ni\nng poker\n pr\nogr\nam\n t\nhat\n \nof\nf\ner\ns\n peeks\n at\n t\nhe pl\nayer\ns\n’\n hol\ne car\nds\n and f\nol\nl\now\ns\n t\nhe act\ni\non t\nhr\nough exper\nt\n \npl\nay-\nby-\npl\nay com\nm\nent\nar\ny. T\nhat\n al\none s\nhoul\nd m\nake t\nhi\ns\n chapt\ner\n t\nhe m\nos\nt\n col\nor\nf\nul\n and exci\nt\ni\nng\n \ni\nn t\nhi\ns\n book!\n \nB\ni\ng O\nm\naha gam\nes\n pl\nayed at\n f\ni\nxed l\ni\nm\ni\nt\ns\n ar\ne r\nar\ne, but\n w\nhen pot\n-\nl\ni\nm\ni\nt\n poker\n i\ns\n \npl\nayed, O\nm\naha hi\ngh—of\nt\nen r\nef\ner\nr\ned t\no s\ni\nm\npl\ny as\n O\nm\naha—i\ns\n w\nher\ne t\nhe\n \nact\ni\non i\ns\n. I\nt\n’\ns\n t\nhe pr\nof\nes\ns\ni\nonal\n’\ns\n choi\nce. Pr\nof\nes\ns\ni\nonal\ns\n of\nt\nen choos\ne t\no pl\nay at\n \nt\nabl\nes\n w\nher\ne a var\ni\net\ny of\n di\nf\nf\ner\nent\n poker\n gam\nes\n ar\ne deal\nt\n. I\nn t\nhi\ns\n envi\nr\nonm\nent\n,\n \nyou m\ni\nght\n s\nee f\ni\nxed-\nl\ni\nm\ni\nt\n O\nm\naha pl\nayed w\ni\nt\nh $1,500/\n$3,000 bl\ni\nnds\n dur\ni\nng\n \nt\nhe bi\ng t\nour\nnam\nent\ns\n. T\nhes\ne can be bi\ngger\n t\nhan t\nhe $100/\n$200 pot\n-\nl\ni\nm\ni\nt\n \nO\nm\naha gam\nes\n, becaus\ne m\nor\ne m\noney w\ni\nl\nl\n t\nr\nade hands\n. \nY\near\ns\n ago I\n r\nead a char\nt\n of\n s\nt\nar\nt\ni\nng hands\n and I\n as\ns\ni\ngned poi\nnt\ns\n t\no t\nhem\n \naccor\ndi\nng t\no t\nhe f\nl\nop. What\n m\ny poi\nnt\n-\ncount\n s\nhow\ned i\ns\n t\nhat\n at\n t\nhe end of\n t\nhe\n \nday, t\nher\ne ar\ne no m\nons\nt\ner\n f\navor\ni\nt\nes\n i\nn O\nm\naha l\ni\nke t\nher\ne ar\ne i\nn ot\nher\n gam\nes\n.\n \nFor\n exam\npl\ne, i\nn hol\nd’\nem\n, i\nf\n you have t\nw\no aces\n and s\nom\neone i\ns\n pl\nayi\nng a pai\nr\n \nagai\nns\nt\n you, your\n aces\n ar\ne a 4 t\no 1 f\navor\ni\nt\ne. I\nn O\nm\naha, no hand i\ns\n a 4 t\no 1\n \nf\navor\ni\nt\ne. T\nhat\n’\ns\n w\nhy t\nher\ne i\ns\n s\no m\nuch act\ni\non t\no t\nhe gam\ne and w\nhy you can\n \nt\nake a l\not\n m\nor\ne f\nl\nops\n t\nhan you can i\nn hol\nd’\nem\n. I\nn s\ni\nm\npl\ne t\ner\nm\ns\n, you’\nr\ne not\n \nal\nw\nays\n get\nt\ni\nng t\nhe w\nor\ns\nt\n of\n i\nt\n. I\nf\n t\nw\no r\neas\nonabl\ne hands\n ar\ne deal\nt\n, i\nt\n i\ns\n r\nar\ne f\nor\n \none t\no be a 60-\n40 f\navor\ni\nt\ne over\n t\nhe ot\nher\n.\nT\nH\nE\n G\nA\nM\nE\nS I\n PL\nA\nY\nT\nhe bi\ng pot\n-\nl\ni\nm\ni\nt\n O\nm\naha gam\nes\n I\n pl\nay w\ni\nt\nh m\ny f\nr\ni\nends\n occupy a uni\nque ni\nche\n \ni\nn poker\n. We pl\nay hi\ngh-\ns\nt\nakes\n gam\nes\n w\ni\nt\nh bl\ni\nnds\n f\nr\nom\n $50/\n$100 up t\no\n \n$1,000/\n$2,000, w\ni\nt\nh or\n w\ni\nt\nhout\n a cap, w\nhi\nch i\ns\n a pr\nedet\ner\nm\ni\nned am\nount\n of\n \nm\noney t\nhat\n a pl\nayer\n can l\nos\ne i\nn one hand. Fr\nequent\nl\ny i\nn O\nm\naha, gr\neat\n hands\n \ncom\ne up and pl\nayer\ns\n have t\no put\n i\nn al\nl\n t\nhei\nr\n chi\nps\n. So know\ni\nng w\nhet\nher\n or\n not\n \nyour\n gam\ne has\n a cap w\ni\nl\nl\n af\nf\nect\n your\n s\nt\nr\nat\negy. \nFor\n exam\npl\ne, i\nf\n you have a s\nubs\nt\nant\ni\nal\n am\nount\n of\n m\noney on t\nhe t\nabl\ne i\nn a\n \ngam\ne w\ni\nt\nh no cap, you have t\no pl\nay m\nor\ne caut\ni\nous\nl\ny. Y\nou can’\nt\n af\nf\nor\nd t\no t\nake\n \nt\nhe t\nur\nn w\ni\nt\nh a bot\nt\nom\n or\n m\ni\nddl\ne s\net\n, s\no you don’\nt\n w\nant\n t\no pl\nay t\nhe l\now\n or\n \ns\nom\net\ni\nm\nes\n even t\nhe m\ni\nddl\ne pai\nr\ns\n. We don’\nt\n of\nt\nen pl\nay t\nhi\ns\n w\nay, becaus\ne\n \npl\nayer\ns\n t\nend t\no qui\nt\n t\nhe gam\ne w\nhen t\nhey’\nr\ne w\ni\nnni\nng and have a pi\nl\ne of\n m\noney\n \ni\nn f\nr\nont\n of\n t\nhem\n. A\nnd bel\ni\neve m\ne, w\ne don’\nt\n w\nant\n peopl\ne qui\nt\nt\ni\nng, becaus\ne at\n \nt\nhe s\nt\nakes\n t\nhat\n w\ne pl\nay, t\nhe pool\n of\n pl\nayer\ns\n i\ns\nn’\nt\n ver\ny l\nar\nge. O\nn t\nhe ot\nher\n \nhand, i\nf\n t\nher\ne i\ns\n a cap, bot\nt\nom\n or\n m\ni\nddl\ne s\net\ns\n m\nay be w\nor\nt\nh t\nhe r\ni\ns\nk t\no pl\nay.\n \n263', metadata={'source': 'players/doyle_brunson/brunson_pdfs/super_system_2.pdf', 'page': 262}),

We don’\nt\n w\nant\n s\nom\neone t\no l\nos\ne al\nl\n of\n hi\ns\n m\noney on one hand, s\no w\ne\n \nal\nm\nos\nt\n al\nw\nays\n pl\nay t\nhi\ns\n w\nay. \nWi\nt\nhout\n t\nhe E\nur\nopeans\n, w\nho j\noi\nn us\n dur\ni\nng t\nhe Wor\nl\nd Ser\ni\nes\n of\n Poker\n and t\nhe\n \nbi\ng t\nour\nnam\nent\ns\n at\n B\nel\nl\nagi\no, pot\n-\nl\ni\nm\ni\nt\n O\nm\naha gam\nes\n w\ni\nt\nh $50/\n$100 bl\ni\nnds\n \nand hi\ngher\n ar\ne r\nar\ne. A\nnd t\nw\no s\nm\nal\nl\n pai\nr\n becom\nes\n a m\nons\nt\ner\n w\nhen your\n \nopponent\n i\nndi\ncat\nes\n t\nhat\n he has\n t\nw\no aces\n or\n t\nw\no ki\nngs\n and di\ndn’\nt\n hi\nt\n t\nhe f\nl\nop. \nD\non’\nt\n R\nai\ns\ne f\nr\nom\n U\np Fr\nont\nN\never\n r\nai\ns\ne bef\nor\ne t\nhe f\nl\nop f\nr\nom\n a f\nr\nont\n pos\ni\nt\ni\non. T\nhi\ns\n i\ns\n a car\ndi\nnal\n r\nul\ne of\n \nO\nm\naha. When you have t\no act\n f\ni\nr\ns\nt\n on s\nubs\nequent\n s\nt\nr\neet\ns\n, you’\nr\ne at\n a\n \nt\nr\nem\nendous\n di\ns\nadvant\nage. T\nhe bet\nt\ner\n your\n hand, t\nhe bi\ngger\n t\nhe di\ns\nadvant\nage,\n \nbecaus\ne you’\nl\nl\n w\nant\n t\no pr\not\nect\n i\nt\n. Suppos\ne you r\nai\ns\ne f\nr\nom\n up f\nr\nont\n w\ni\nt\nh a ver\ny\n \ngood hand t\nhat\n cont\nai\nns\n a pai\nr\n of\n aces\n or\n ki\nngs\n. Y\nou don’\nt\n hi\nt\n t\nhe f\nl\nop, but\n i\nt\n \nl\nooks\n i\nnnocent\n. B\ne car\nef\nul\n her\ne—t\nher\ne s\nt\ni\nl\nl\n ar\ne m\nany pos\ns\ni\nbl\ne dr\naw\ns\n t\no even\n \nt\nhe m\nos\nt\n i\nnnocent\n of\n f\nl\nops\n. Y\nou’\nr\ne f\ni\nr\ns\nt\n t\no act\n and you w\nant\n t\no w\ni\nn t\nhe pot\n, s\no\n \nyou m\nake a bet\n at\n i\nt\n. T\nhen s\nom\nebody com\nes\n over\n t\nhe t\nop w\ni\nt\nh a r\nai\ns\ne. Y\nou’\nve\n \nput\n enough m\noney i\nn t\nhe pot\n t\nhat\n you al\nm\nos\nt\n have t\no cal\nl\n. See t\nhe pr\nobl\nem\n?\nPot\n-\nl\ni\nm\ni\nt\n O\nm\naha i\ns\n a gam\ne t\nhat\n you don’\nt\n l\ni\nke t\no pl\nay f\nr\nom\n up f\nr\nont\n. Y\nou’\nr\ne\n \ngoi\nng t\no t\nake f\nl\nops\n w\ni\nt\nh good hands\n, but\n you don’\nt\n w\nant\n t\no r\nai\ns\ne w\ni\nt\nh t\nhem\n \nf\nr\nom\n a f\nr\nont\n pos\ni\nt\ni\non. O\nne pr\nobl\nem\n w\ni\nt\nh r\nai\ns\ni\nng i\ns\n t\nhat\n you’\nr\ne adver\nt\ni\ns\ni\nng t\nhat\n \nyou have a good hand. T\nypi\ncal\nl\ny, pl\nayer\ns\n don’\nt\n w\nant\n t\no r\nai\ns\ne w\ni\nt\nh a l\now\n hand,\n \ns\no your\n opponent\ns\n w\ni\nl\nl\n have t\nhe t\nendency t\no put\n you on a hi\ngh hand. O\nf\n \ncour\ns\ne, you can be s\nom\new\nhat\n decept\ni\nve and r\nai\ns\ne w\ni\nt\nh a dr\naw\ni\nng hand, but\n \nyou m\nus\nt\n be pr\nepar\ned t\no cal\nl\n a r\ner\nai\ns\ne behi\nnd you. A\nl\ns\no, w\nhen you r\nai\ns\ne f\nr\nom\n \nup f\nr\nont\n i\nn pot\n-\nl\ni\nm\ni\nt\n gam\nes\n, you’\nr\ne gi\nvi\nng t\nhe ot\nher\n guy t\nw\ni\nce t\nhe\n \nam\nm\nuni\nt\ni\non t\no f\ni\nr\ne back at\n you. T\nhi\ns\n can be par\nt\ni\ncul\nar\nl\ny danger\nous\n i\nf\n you\n \ndon’\nt\n have a r\neal\nl\ny t\nop hand. \nSo her\ne i\ns\n a gener\nal\n r\nul\ne:\n do not\n r\nai\ns\ne bef\nor\ne t\nhe f\nl\nop f\nr\nom\n under\n t\nhe gun or\n \nf\nr\nom\n t\nhe t\nw\no bl\ni\nnd pos\ni\nt\ni\nons\n, becaus\ne you’\nl\nl\n be over\n-\ncom\nm\ni\nt\nt\ni\nng your\ns\nel\nf\n t\no\n \nyour\n hand. I\nt\n’\ns\n m\nuch bet\nt\ner\n t\no be com\nm\ni\nt\nt\ned f\nr\nom\n t\nhe backs\ni\nde, becaus\ne\n \npl\nayer\ns\n t\nend t\no check t\no t\nhe r\nai\ns\ner\n on t\nhe f\nl\nop. M\nor\ne of\nt\nen t\nhan not\n, w\nhen you\n \nhave a bi\ng hand up f\nr\nont\n, you s\nhoul\nd l\ni\nm\np. M\nos\nt\n of\n t\nhe r\nai\ns\ni\nng i\nn pot\n-\nl\ni\nm\ni\nt\n \nO\nm\naha i\ns\n done f\nr\nom\n t\nhe l\nat\ne s\neat\ns\n. T\nhe bot\nt\nom\n l\ni\nne i\ns\n t\nhat\n you’\nr\ne s\ni\nm\npl\ny put\nt\ni\nng t\noo m\nuch m\noney at\n \nr\ni\ns\nk w\nhen you r\nai\ns\ne f\nr\nom\n up f\nr\nont\n.\nH\ner\ne’\ns\n a s\ni\nt\nuat\ni\non w\nher\ne you m\ni\nght\n t\nhi\nnk about\n m\naki\nng an except\ni\non and\n \nr\nai\ns\ne f\nr\nom\n up f\nr\nont\n. Say you’\nr\ne pl\nayi\nng $50/\n$100 bl\ni\nnds\n and each pl\nayer\n has\n \n$100,000 i\nn f\nr\nont\n of\n hi\nm\n. Y\nou r\nai\ns\ne and s\nom\neone r\ner\nai\ns\nes\n. M\nos\nt\n peopl\ne w\noul\nd not\n \nr\ner\nai\ns\ne you w\ni\nt\nh an i\nns\ni\nde s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n dr\naw\n s\nuch as\n 10-\n9-\n8-\nx or\n 6-\n5-\n4-\nx. T\nhe pot\n w\nas\n r\nai\ns\ned and r\ner\nai\ns\ned bef\nor\ne t\nhe\n \nf\nl\nop. Fi\nve pl\nayer\ns\n—D\navi\nd G\nr\ney, C\nhi\np R\nees\ne, J\nohnny C\nhan, J\nay H\nei\nm\now\ni\nt\nz,\n \nand I\n—put\n i\nn $15,000 each t\no s\nee t\nhe f\nl\nop, a ver\ny r\nar\ne occur\nr\nence.\nT\nhe f\nl\nop cam\ne Q\n-\n7-\n5 r\nai\nnbow\n. C\nhi\np w\nas\n next\n and\n \nhe cal\nl\ned w\ni\nt\nh t\nhe 9-\n8-\n6-\nx, t\nhe hi\ngh w\nr\nap, m\nuch bet\nt\ner\n t\nhan m\ni\nne. H\ne had pocket\n queens\n and m\nade t\nop s\net\n on t\nhe f\nl\nop.\n \nN\now\n he has\n al\nl\n t\nhes\ne guys\n i\nn t\nhe pot\n w\ni\nt\nh hi\nm\n and he’\ns\n s\ni\nt\nt\ni\nng t\nher\ne w\ni\nt\nh t\nr\ni\np\n \nqueens\n!\n T\nhe next\n car\nd of\nf\n w\nas\n a 6, w\nhi\nch gave D\navi\nd and m\ne t\nhe bot\nt\nom\n end\n \nof\n t\nhe s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n and C\nhi\np t\nhe t\nop end. U\ns\nual\nl\ny i\nt\n’\ns\n an aut\nom\nat\ni\nc\n \ncheck w\nhen you f\nl\nop f\nour\n of\n a ki\nnd, becaus\ne you w\nant\n t\no l\net\n s\nom\nebody cat\nch\n \nup. I\nt\n’\ns\n us\nual\nl\ny eas\ni\ner\n t\no pi\nck up t\nhe pot\n on t\nhe f\nl\nop f\nr\nom\n behi\nnd—\nt\nhat\n i\ns\n, f\nr\nom\n l\nat\ne pos\ni\nt\ni\non—al\nt\nhough you can al\ns\no pi\nck i\nt\n up w\nhen you’\nr\ne i\nn\n \nt\nhe l\nead or\n ear\nl\ny pos\ni\nt\ni\non. I\nn f\nact\n, i\nt\n i\ns\n even eas\ni\ner\n t\no bl\nuf\nf\n on t\nhe f\nl\nop f\nr\nom\n \nl\nat\ne pos\ni\nt\ni\non i\nn O\nm\naha t\nhan i\nt\n i\ns\n i\nn ot\nher\n gam\nes\n becaus\ne w\ni\nt\nh f\nour\n car\nds\n i\nn\n \nyour\n hand, you’\nr\ne m\nor\ne l\ni\nkel\ny t\no f\nl\nop s\nom\net\nhi\nng. When t\nher\ne ar\ne f\new\n \npos\ns\ni\nbi\nl\ni\nt\ni\nes\n on t\nhe boar\nd—t\nhat\n i\ns\n, no f\nl\nus\nh dr\naw\ns\n and no w\nr\nap s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n dr\naw\ns\n—i\nt\n i\ns\n eas\ni\ner\n t\no bl\nuf\nf\n t\nhan i\nf\n t\nhe boar\nd w\ner\ne coor\ndi\nnat\ned i\nn s\nom\ne w\nay. Fl\nops\n \nl\ni\nke J\n-\n7-\n3 and Q\n-\n5-\n2 m\nake i\nt\n eas\ny t\no pi\nck up t\nhe pot\n.\nB\nut\n s\nom\net\ni\nm\nes\n t\nhe oppos\ni\nt\ne i\ns\n t\nr\nue. When t\nher\ne’\ns\n a ver\ny s\ncar\ny boar\nd, you can\n \ns\nom\net\ni\nm\nes\n pi\nck up t\nhe pot\n becaus\ne nobody w\nant\ns\n t\no com\nm\ni\nt\n. L\net\n’\ns\n s\nay t\nhat\n \nt\nhe boar\nd com\nes\n w\ni\nt\nh t\nhr\nee di\nam\nonds\n, and ever\nybody checks\n t\no you. Y\nou\n \nm\ni\nght\n t\nake a s\nt\nab at\n i\nt\n, r\nepr\nes\nent\ni\nng a m\nade f\nl\nus\nh. B\nut\n not\n J\noe—he r\nai\ns\ned t\nhe $50,000 cap.\n \nO\nf\nf\n cam\ne a cl\nub on t\nhe t\nur\nn, and J\noe l\nos\nt\n hi\ns\n $50,000. T\nhi\ns\n i\ns\n anot\nher\n \nexam\npl\ne of\n how\n a pr\nevi\nous\n hand can af\nf\nect\n your\n pl\nay as\n t\nhe gam\ne goes\n \nf\nor\nw\nar\nd, and agai\nn w\nhy you s\nhoul\nd be ver\ny obs\ner\nvant\n of\n your\n opponent\n’\ns\n \npl\nay at\n al\nl\n t\ni\nm\nes\n.\nO\nne i\nnt\ner\nes\nt\ni\nng poi\nnt\n t\no m\nake about\n t\nhe pl\nay of\n t\nhi\ns\n hand i\ns\n t\nhat\n i\nt\n s\nhow\ns\n how\n \na ver\ny good pl\nayer\n can m\nake m\noney agai\nns\nt\n a m\nedi\nocr\ne pl\nayer\n. I\n w\noul\nd have\n \nl\nos\nt\n $4,000 pl\nayi\nng t\nhi\ns\n hand, but\n J\noe l\nos\nt\n $50,000 and t\nhought\n he had been\n \nver\ny unl\nucky. T\nhi\ns\n i\ns\n m\nuch bet\nt\ner\n t\nhan f\nl\noppi\nng t\nop t\nw\no pai\nr\n on a boar\nd of\n 10? 9?\n \n2?, becaus\ne you ar\ne vul\nner\nabl\ne t\no s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n and f\nl\nus\nh dr\naw\ns\n. \nO\nr\n s\nuppos\ne t\nhe f\nl\nop com\nes\n K\n-\nJ\n-\n8, as\n i\nt\n di\nd i\nn an ear\nl\ni\ner\n exam\npl\ne. I\nf\n you have\n \nki\nngs\n and j\nacks\n, you have a vul\nner\nabl\ne hand becaus\ne t\nhe next\n car\nd of\nf\n coul\nd\n \ncom\npl\net\ne a s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n f\nor\n an opponent\n. A\n l\not\n of\n peopl\ne w\ni\nl\nl\n cal\nl\n a bet\n on t\nhe f\nl\nop\n \nw\ni\nt\nh a s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n or\n f\nl\nus\nh dr\naw\n, s\no t\nw\no pai\nr\n m\nus\nt\n be pl\nayed ver\ny car\nef\nul\nl\ny.\nA\n t\nw\no-\npai\nr\n hand pl\nays\n bet\nt\ner\n f\nr\nom\n a l\nat\ne pos\ni\nt\ni\non becaus\ne af\nt\ner\n t\nhe car\nds\n \ncom\ne of\nf\n, you s\nee w\nhat\n your\n opponent\n does\n i\nn f\nr\nont\n of\n you w\ni\nt\nhout\n havi\nng t\no\n \ncom\nm\ni\nt\n your\ns\nel\nf\n. So you can duck a s\ncar\ne car\nd i\nf\n you w\nant\n. O\nn t\nhe f\nl\nop, your\n \nopponent\n w\non’\nt\n know\n w\nher\ne you’\nr\ne at\n i\nn t\nhe hand, s\no i\nf\n he checks\n, you can\n \ncheck behi\nnd hi\nm\n. O\nr\n you coul\nd get\n m\nos\nt\n of\n your\n m\noney i\nn bef\nor\ne t\nhe t\nur\nn\n \ncar\nd com\nes\n s\no t\nhat\n you don’\nt\n have t\no m\nake any gues\ns\nes\n. \nPl\nayi\nng D\noubl\ne Pai\nr\ns\n:\n M\ny 25 Per\ncent\n R\nul\ne\nI\n m\nent\ni\noned ear\nl\ni\ner\n t\nhat\n I\n l\ni\nke t\no pl\nay hands\n s\nuch as\n A\n? 9? 8? 7?, w\ni\nt\nh t\nhe ace\n \ns\nui\nt\ned, becaus\ne t\nhey don’\nt\n get\n m\ne i\nnt\no a l\not\n of\n t\nr\noubl\ne. I\n al\ns\no l\ni\nke t\no pl\nay t\nw\no-\npai\nr\n hands\n, and s\nom\net\ni\nm\nes\n I\n’\nl\nl\n r\nai\ns\ne w\ni\nt\nh t\nhem\n, even i\nf\n t\nhey’\nr\ne s\nm\nal\nl\ner\n pai\nr\ns\n \nl\ni\nke ni\nnes\n and s\ni\nxes\n or\n ei\nght\ns\n and f\ni\nves\n. T\nhe r\nat\ni\nonal\ne behi\nnd r\nai\ns\ni\nng bef\nor\ne\n \nt\nhe f\nl\nop w\ni\nt\nh t\nw\no s\nm\nal\nl\n pai\nr\n i\ns\n t\nhat\n you have a l\not\n of\n decept\ni\non goi\nng f\nor\n you.\n \nWhen you r\nai\ns\ne, peopl\ne put\n you on bi\ng pai\nr\ns\n or\n bi\ng car\nds\n. I\nf\n t\nhe f\nl\nop com\nes\n \ns\nom\net\nhi\nng l\ni\nke J\n-\n8-\n5 and you have pocket\n f\ni\nves\n, t\nhey don’\nt\n put\n you on t\nr\ni\np\n \nf\ni\nves\n becaus\ne you r\nai\ns\ned bef\nor\ne t\nhe f\nl\nop, s\no t\nhey’\nr\ne goi\nng t\no pl\nay t\nhei\nr\n t\nw\no-\npai\nr\n hands\n. \nN\not\n onl\ny i\ns\n t\nhi\ns\n t\nype of\n hand decept\ni\nve, i\nt\n has\n t\nhe pot\nent\ni\nal\n f\nor\n m\naki\nng a l\ni\nt\nt\nl\ne\n \nm\nor\ne m\noney i\nf\n you m\nake your\n s\net\n. O\nbvi\nous\nl\ny, i\nt\n’\ns\n eas\ni\ner\n t\no m\nake m\noney w\ni\nt\nh\n \ngood hands\n i\nn r\nai\ns\ned pot\ns\n t\nhan i\nn unr\nai\ns\ned pot\ns\n. I\nn O\nm\naha you r\nar\nel\ny w\nant\n t\no gi\nve your\n \nopponent\n a chance t\no i\nm\npr\nove and cat\nch up w\ni\nt\nh you. For\n exam\npl\ne, i\nf\n t\nhe f\nl\nop\n \ni\ns\n A\n-\n7-\n7 and I\n have pocket\n aces\n, I\n w\noul\nd bet\n becaus\ne I\n’\nm\n t\nr\nol\nl\ni\nng f\nor\n a 7. I\nf\n none of\n m\ny opponent\ns\n has\n a 7, I\n’\nm\n not\n goi\nng t\no m\nake any m\noney. B\nut\n \ni\nf\n s\nom\nebody has\n one and t\nakes\n t\nhe bai\nt\n, I\n s\nt\nand t\no m\nake s\nom\ne pr\net\nt\ny good\n \nm\noney.\nWhen you gi\nve f\nr\nee car\nds\n, t\nher\ne’\ns\n a chance t\nhat\n an opponent\n w\ni\nt\nh a pai\nr\n w\ni\nl\nl\n \ncat\nch a t\nw\no-\nout\ner\n t\no beat\n you or\n t\nhat\n he’\nl\nl\n m\nake a gut\ns\nhot\n s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n, w\nhi\nch\n \nhappens\n of\nt\nen. A\nl\ns\no, r\nem\nem\nber\n t\nhat\n a l\not\n of\n backdoor\n hands\n ar\ne pos\ns\ni\nbl\ne i\nn\n \nO\nm\naha. B\nackdoor\n f\nl\nus\nhes\n, i\nn par\nt\ni\ncul\nar\n, don’\nt\n al\nw\nays\n have t\no be t\nhe nut\ns\n t\no\n \nw\ni\nn t\nhe pot\n. So, i\nf\n you have a hand on t\nhe f\nl\nop, you s\nhoul\nd us\nual\nl\ny bet\n i\nt\n. \nA\nl\ns\no, s\nom\net\ni\nm\nes\n you have t\no be pr\nepar\ned t\no t\nhr\now\n t\nhe hand aw\nay. L\net\n’\ns\n s\nay\n \nt\nhat\n t\nhe f\nl\nop com\nes\n J\n-\n8-\n2 and you have t\nop and bot\nt\nom\n pai\nr\n. E\nver\nybody\n \nchecks\n ar\nound t\no you, and you bet\n i\nt\n, m\nai\nnl\ny becaus\ne you don’\nt\n w\nant\n t\no gi\nve\n \na f\nr\nee car\nd. T\nhi\ns\n hand\n \ncl\near\nl\ny s\nhow\ns\n how\n good pl\nayer\ns\n ar\ne abl\ne t\no deci\npher\n an opponent\n’\ns\n hand. \nA\nl\nt\nhough not\n as\n cut\n-\nand-\ndr\ni\ned as\n t\nhi\ns\n exam\npl\ne, a s\ni\nm\ni\nl\nar\n hand cam\ne up i\nn a\n \nr\necent\n Wor\nl\nd Poker\n T\nour\n no-\nl\ni\nm\ni\nt\n hol\nd’\nem\n t\nour\nnam\nent\n. I\n pl\nayed m\ny A\n-\n10\n \nbadl\ny, but\n t\nhi\ns\n t\ni\nm\ne I\n w\non a bi\ng pot\n w\ni\nt\nh i\nt\n. Si\nt\nt\ni\nng i\nn m\ni\nddl\ne pos\ni\nt\ni\non, I\n r\nai\ns\ned\n \nbef\nor\ne t\nhe f\nl\nop w\ni\nt\nh an A\n-\n10, B\ni\nl\nl\ny G\nr\ney cal\nl\ned on t\nhe but\nt\non, and an el\nder\nl\ny\n \npl\nayer\n w\nho w\nas\n s\nhor\nt\n-\nchi\npped cal\nl\ned f\nr\nom\n t\nhe bi\ng bl\ni\nnd. T\nhe f\nl\nop cam\ne A\n-\nA\n-\n3. I\n bet\n $1,500, and B\ni\nl\nl\ny r\nai\ns\ned $3,500 m\nor\ne. I\n t\nhought\n t\nhat\n m\naybe B\ni\nl\nl\ny had\n \nan A\n-\n8 or\n A\n-\n9 and w\nas\n t\nes\nt\ni\nng m\ne t\no f\ni\nnd out\n w\nher\ne he w\nas\n at\n i\nn t\nhe hand.\n \nB\nut\n t\nhen t\nhe s\neni\nor\n m\noved i\nn w\ni\nt\nh hi\ns\n l\nas\nt\n $7,000. A\nt\n t\nhat\n poi\nnt\n, I\n s\nhoul\nd have\n \ngi\nven cr\nedi\nt\n t\no ei\nt\nher\n pl\nayer\n and t\nhr\now\nn m\ny hand aw\nay. What\n coul\nd I\n beat\n?\n \nM\naybe I\n w\nas\n j\nus\nt\n bei\nng nai\nve i\nn t\nhi\nnki\nng t\nhat\n B\ni\nl\nl\ny had an A\n-\n8 and w\nas\n \npr\nobi\nng t\nhe s\nt\nr\nengt\nh of\n m\ny hand, and t\nhat\n t\nhe el\nder\nl\ny gent\nl\nem\nan had t\nw\no\n \nki\nngs\n. O\nf\n cour\ns\ne, i\nt\n j\nus\nt\n w\nas\nn’\nt\n pos\ns\ni\nbl\ne t\nhat\n t\nhe s\neni\nor\n had m\noved i\nn w\ni\nt\nh hi\ns\n \ncas\ne m\noney i\nf\n he di\ndn’\nt\n have at\n l\neas\nt\n A\n-\nK\n or\n A\n-\nQ\n. I\n cal\nl\ned anyw\nay.\nB\nut\n as\n badl\ny as\n I\n pl\nayed i\nt\n on t\nhe f\nl\nop, B\ni\nl\nl\ny pl\nayed i\nt\n even w\nor\ns\ne on t\nhe t\nur\nn\n \nw\nhen a 10 s\nl\ni\nd of\nf\n t\nhe deck. I\n bet\n $10,000 w\ni\nt\nh m\ny f\nul\nl\n hous\ne, and he m\noved\n \ni\nn $15,000 m\nor\ne. What\n di\nd he t\nhi\nnk I\n w\nas\n bet\nt\ni\nng? D\ni\nd he t\nhi\nnk t\nhat\n I\n w\noul\nd\n \nbet\n an A\n-\nK\n or\n A\n-\nQ\n at\n t\nhat\n poi\nnt\n? G\ni\nve m\ne a br\neak—t\nhi\ns\n w\nas\n a dr\ny pot\n!\n T\nhe\n \nt\nhi\nr\nd m\nan w\nas\n al\nl\n-\ni\nn, and i\nt\n w\nas\n obvi\nous\n t\nhat\n he had s\nent\n al\nl\n hi\ns\n chi\nps\n i\nn w\ni\nt\nh\n \na good hand, s\no t\nher\ne w\nas\n no poi\nnt\n i\nn m\ny bl\nuf\nf\ni\nng at\n t\nhe pot\n. What\n w\nas\n I\n \ngoi\nng t\no do, t\nr\ny t\no get\n B\ni\nl\nl\ny out\n s\no t\nhat\n I\n can l\nos\ne t\no t\nhe t\nhi\nr\nd guy? B\ni\nl\nl\ny\n \ns\nhoul\nd have f\ni\ngur\ned out\n pr\net\nt\ny qui\nckl\ny t\nhat\n he had t\nhe w\nor\ns\nt\n hand. \nA\ns\n i\nt\n t\nur\nned out\n, B\ni\nl\nl\ny had 3-\n3 and t\nhe s\neni\nor\n gent\nl\nem\nan had A\n-\n3. T\nr\nue, I\n \npl\nayed i\nt\n badl\ny w\nhen I\n cal\nl\ned on t\nhe f\nl\nop, but\n t\nhey s\nhoul\nd have know\nn t\nhat\n I\n \nw\noul\ndn’\nt\n put\n $10,000 i\nn on t\nhe t\nur\nn i\nf\n I\n di\ndn’\nt\n have s\nom\net\nhi\nng. I\nf\n I\n hadn’\nt\n hi\nt\n \nm\ny ki\ncker\n, I\n w\noul\nd have checked and B\ni\nl\nl\ny w\noul\nd have bet\n. I\n’\nve f\nound t\nhat\n w\nhen I\n get\n t\ni\nr\ned, I\n don’\nt\n pl\nay car\nds\n w\nel\nl\n, I\n \nl\net\n t\nhe car\nds\n pl\nay m\ne. I\nf\n I\n’\nm\n j\nus\nt\n l\nooki\nng f\nor\n a good hand, not\n out\n t\nher\ne\n \nt\nhi\nnki\nng about\n ever\nyt\nhi\nng, i\nt\n’\ns\n t\ni\nm\ne t\no go t\no bed. Fi\nnal\nl\ny, af\nt\ner\n t\nhe t\nhi\nr\nd dr\naw\n, t\nhe bet\n i\ns\n once agai\nn $400. \nSo t\nher\ne ar\ne f\nour\n bet\nt\ni\nng r\nounds\n i\nn t\not\nal\n. B\net\n and r\nai\ns\ne at\n ever\ny oppor\nt\nuni\nt\ny bef\nor\ne t\nhe dr\naw\n and\n \naf\nt\ner\n t\nhe f\ni\nr\ns\nt\n dr\naw\n. Wi\nt\nh a pat\n hand, s\nm\noot\nh cal\nl\ni\nng bef\nor\ne t\nhe dr\naw\n i\ns\n \npoi\nnt\nl\nes\ns\n, s\ni\nnce your\n s\necr\net\n w\ni\nl\nl\n be out\n as\n s\noon as\n t\nhe deal\ner\n as\nks\n you how\n \nm\nany car\nds\n you w\nant\n. O\nnce you s\nay, “I\n’\nm\n good,” your\n opponent\ns\n w\ni\nl\nl\n know\n \nt\nhat\n you have a s\neven, ei\nght\n, or\n m\naybe a ni\nne.\nA\n ni\nne, how\never\n, i\ns\n m\nor\ne di\nf\nf\ni\ncul\nt\n t\no pl\nay. I\nn s\nom\ne s\ni\nt\nuat\ni\nons\n, i\nt\n m\nay be okay\n \nt\no s\nt\nay pat\n w\ni\nt\nh a ni\nne, but\n i\nn gener\nal\n you w\nant\n t\no avoi\nd even pl\nayi\nng a r\nough\n \nni\nne. Y\nou’\nd be bet\nt\ner\n of\nf\n pl\naci\nng a hand l\ni\nke 9-\n8-\n7-\n6-\n4 i\nn t\nhe m\nuck t\nhan\n \nhopi\nng i\nt\n hol\nds\n up i\nn a m\nul\nt\ni\nw\nay pot\n. \nH\now\never\n, i\nf\n you hel\nd s\nom\net\nhi\nng l\ni\nke 9-\n7-\n4-\n3-\n2, you w\noul\nd have a dynam\ni\nt\ne\n \ndr\naw\n. Whi\nl\ne 4-\n5-\n6-\n7 i\ns\n onl\ny one car\nd f\nr\nom\n m\naki\nng a\n \ns\neven, onl\ny t\nhe val\nuabl\ne 2 w\ni\nl\nl\n hel\np you. I\nf\n you ar\ne i\nn a m\nul\nt\ni\nw\nay pot\n, t\nher\ne\n \nm\nay not\n even be a 2 l\nef\nt\n i\nn t\nhe deck t\no s\nave you!\n E\nven i\nf\n you ar\ne l\nucky\n \nenough t\no cat\nch a deuce, your\n hand i\ns\n f\nar\n f\nr\nom\n unbeat\nabl\ne. I\nf\n any ot\nher\n pl\nayer\n \nm\nakes\n hi\ns\n s\neven, t\nhe bes\nt\n you can do i\ns\n t\ni\ne. \nU\nnl\nes\ns\n you act\nual\nl\ny have a w\nheel\n you al\nw\nays\n w\nant\n t\no be heads\n-\nup. O\nf\n cour\ns\ne,\n \ni\nf\n you have a dr\naw\n l\ni\nke 2-\n3-\n4-\n7, you s\nhoul\nd w\nel\ncom\ne as\n m\nany pl\nayer\ns\n as\n \npos\ns\ni\nbl\ne. D\nr\naw\n t\no t\nhe 8-\n7 and puni\ns\nh t\nhem\n f\nor\n t\nhei\nr\n l\noos\ne pl\nay!\nPos\ni\nt\ni\non. Pos\ni\nt\ni\non i\ns\n ext\nr\nem\nel\ny i\nm\npor\nt\nant\n. A\ns\n a gener\nal\n r\nul\ne, w\nhen out\n of\n pos\ni\nt\ni\non you\n \nw\nant\n t\no be dr\naw\ni\nng t\no t\nhe nut\ns\n or\n as\n cl\nos\ne t\no t\nhe nut\ns\n as\n pos\ns\ni\nbl\ne. A\nl\nt\nhough 8-\n7-\n3-\n2 m\nay be a good dr\naw\n, i\nt\n’\ns\n f\nar\n f\nr\nom\n t\nhe nut\n dr\naw\n. M\nos\nt\n of\n m\ny opponent\ns\n have r\nead t\nhi\ns\n \nchapt\ner\n i\nn t\nhe or\ni\ngi\nnal\n Super\n/\nSys\nt\nem\n, and i\nf\n I\n pl\nayed t\nhat\n w\nay, I\n’\nd be t\noo\n \npr\nedi\nct\nabl\ne.\nY\nou don’\nt\n have t\no pl\nay exact\nl\ny t\nhe w\nay I\n des\ncr\ni\nbe i\nn t\nhi\ns\n chapt\ner\n. Y\nou’\nl\nl\n \npr\nobabl\ny w\nant\n t\no pi\nck your\n ow\nn s\nt\nyl\ne and m\nodi\nf\ny t\nhes\ne concept\ns\n t\no f\ni\nt\n t\nhe\n \ngam\nes\n you pl\nay. St\ni\nl\nl\n, i\nf\n you i\nncor\npor\nat\ne t\nhi\ns\n advi\nce, m\naki\nng i\nt\n t\nhe s\noul\n of\n \nyour\n s\nt\nr\nat\negy, t\nhe r\nes\nt\n w\ni\nl\nl\n f\nal\nl\n i\nn pl\nace.\nI\n’\nve added new\n t\nhought\ns\n and expanded s\nom\ne of\n t\nhe i\ndeas\n, but\n t\nhe cor\ne\n \nconcept\ns\n r\nem\nai\nn as\n val\ni\nd and as\n pr\nof\ni\nt\nabl\ne t\noday as\n ever\n. So, her\ne i\ns\n m\ny up-\nt\no-\ndat\ne advi\nce, bl\nendi\nng t\nhe pr\nevi\nous\n t\ni\nps\n and t\nhe t\nact\ni\ncs\n t\nhat\n w\ni\nl\nl\n al\nw\nays\n w\ni\nn\n \nat\n no-\nl\ni\nm\ni\nt\n hol\nd’\nem\n w\ni\nt\nh s\nom\ne new\n i\nns\ni\nght\ns\n I\n hope w\ni\nl\nl\n ear\nn you ext\nr\na\n \nm\noney. A\ns\n I\n’\nve al\nw\nays\n s\nai\nd, t\nhe ant\ne\n \ndet\ner\nm\ni\nnes\n how\n f\nas\nt\n you pl\nay i\nn any poker\n gam\ne. Si\nnce you’\nl\nl\n gener\nal\nl\ny pl\nay\n \ni\nn a nor\nm\nal\n or\n m\nedi\num\n ant\ne gam\nes\n, i\nf\n you pl\nay an aggr\nes\ns\ni\nve s\nt\nyl\ne of\n poker\n,\n \nyou’\nl\nl\n have t\nhe bes\nt\n of\n i\nt\n.\nT\nhat\n’\ns\n t\nhe w\nay I\n r\necom\nm\nend you pl\nay, and i\nt\n w\nor\nks\n. I\nt\n’\ns\n t\nr\nul\ny a gam\ne t\nhat\n r\nequi\nr\nes\n ver\ny s\npeci\nal\n t\nal\nent\ns\n i\nn\n \nor\nder\n t\no pl\nay i\nt\n at\n a w\nor\nl\nd-\ncl\nas\ns\n l\nevel\n.\nA\nbove al\nl\n el\ns\ne, no-\nl\ni\nm\ni\nt\n hol\nd’\nem\n i\ns\n a gam\ne w\nher\ne you have t\no be aggr\nes\ns\ni\nve\n—and you have t\no gam\nbl\ne. N\now\n you m\ni\nght\n \nw\nant\n t\no dr\naw\n at\n t\nhat\n bel\nl\ny-\nbus\nt\ner\n, t\nr\nyi\nng t\no cat\nch a 10 or\n m\nake a bi\ng pai\nr\n \n(\neven i\nn l\ni\nm\ni\nt\n, but\n m\nos\nt\nl\ny i\nn no-\nl\ni\nm\ni\nt\n)\n. Y\nou know\n i\nf\n you cat\nch t\nhat\n 10, you’\nl\nl\n \nhave a ci\nnch hand. B\nut\n i\nf\n you hel\nd a 6-\n5, you’\nd never\n dr\naw\n t\no i\nt\n w\ni\nt\nh t\nhat\n f\nl\nop\n \nbecaus\ne t\nher\ne’\nd be t\nw\no di\nf\nf\ner\nent\n s\nt\nr\nai\nght\ns\n t\nhat\n coul\nd beat\n you i\nf\n you cat\nch a 7,\n \nt\nhe 6-\n7-\n8-\n9-\n10 and t\nhe 7-\n8-\n9-\n10-\nJ\n. I\nf\n a m\nan m\nakes\n a s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n w\ni\nt\nh you, he’\ns\n \nei\nt\nher\n got\n you t\ni\ned or\n he’\ns\n got\n you beat\n. So, you never\n dr\naw\n t\no t\nhe dead-\nend\n \nof\n a s\ni\nngl\ne bel\nl\ny-\nbus\nt\ner\n.\nB\nef\nor\ne you deci\nde t\no dr\naw\n t\no a bel\nl\ny-\nbus\nt\ner\n, you al\ns\no w\nant\n t\no be r\neas\nonabl\ny\n \ncer\nt\nai\nn t\nhat\n your\n opponent\n i\ns\n goi\nng t\no gam\nbl\ne w\ni\nt\nh you i\nf\n you do m\nake i\nt\n. I\n \nm\nean, dr\naw\ni\nng t\no a bel\nl\ny-\nbus\nt\ner\n i\ns\n a good pl\nay, but\n onl\ny i\nf\n you can w\ni\nn a bi\ng\n \npot\n by m\naki\nng your\n l\nong s\nhot\n. L\net\n’\ns\n s\nay you’\nr\ne i\nn a gam\ne w\ni\nt\nh a\n \nhi\ngh-\nant\ne s\nt\nr\nuct\nur\ne, (\na s\nubj\nect\n I\n’\nl\nl\n cover\n i\nn gr\neat\ner\n det\nai\nl\n bel\now\n)\n and nat\nur\nal\nl\ny\n \never\nybody’\ns\n pl\nayi\nng r\neal\n f\nas\nt\n. Y\nou pl\nayed a J\n-\n9 and t\nhe f\nl\nop cam\ne A\n-\n9-\n8.\n \nN\nor\nm\nal\nl\ny, i\nf\n you got\n pl\nayed w\ni\nt\nh, you’\nd be ver\ny concer\nned about\n t\nhat\n ace and\n \nal\ns\no your\n ki\ncker\n. B\nut\n i\nn t\nhi\ns\n cas\ne, you’\nr\ne i\nn t\nhe pot\n w\ni\nt\nh a pl\nayer\n w\nho’\ns\n l\nos\ni\nng\n \nand, f\nr\nom\n w\nhat\n you’\nve s\neen, he’\ns\n pl\nayi\nng ver\ny badl\ny. Y\nou check on t\nhe f\nl\nop,\n \nand s\no does\n he.\nA\nl\nl\n of\n a s\nudden, you get\n a “f\neel\n” t\nhat\n al\nl\n he’\ns\n got\n i\ns\n t\nhe t\nhi\nr\nd pai\nr\n, a pai\nr\n of\n \nei\nght\ns\n. Si\nnce he checked, you f\neel\n he got\n s\nom\net\nhi\nng, a s\nm\nal\nl\n pi\nece of\n t\nhe f\nl\nop.\n \nH\ne di\ndn’\nt\n bet\n becaus\ne he w\nant\ns\n t\no get\n t\nhe hand s\nhow\nn-\ndow\nn. I\nf\n he had\n \nnot\nhi\nng he w\noul\nd’\nve bet\n t\no t\nr\ny t\no s\nt\neal\n t\nhe pot\n. A\nnd you know\n he does\nn’\nt\n \nhave an ace. Y\nou know\n t\nhe w\nor\ns\nt\n t\nhat\n can happen i\ns\n t\nhat\n he coul\nd al\ns\no have a\n \n9 and r\nun you dow\nn, chas\ne you. Wel\nl\n, w\nhat\n you w\nant\n i\ns\n f\nor\n hi\nm\n t\no r\nun you\n \ndow\nn w\ni\nt\nh an 8, w\nhi\nch i\ns\n w\nhat\n you r\neal\nl\ny t\nhi\nnk he has\n. \nB\nut\n you f\neel\n conf\ni\ndent\n you’\nr\ne not\n w\nr\nong. I\nf\n a r\nag f\nal\nl\ns\n of\nf\n on f\nour\nt\nh, you bet\n.\n \nY\nou know\n he’\ns\n goi\nng t\no cal\nl\n you, al\nm\nos\nt\n out\n of\n des\nper\nat\ni\non becaus\ne he’\ns\n \nl\nos\ni\nng. So you m\nake s\nom\ne m\noney on f\nour\nt\nh and al\ns\no on t\nhe end. Y\nou know\n \nhe’\ns\n not\n goi\nng t\no s\nhow\n you a hand unl\nes\ns\n he get\ns\n l\nucky and pai\nr\ns\n hi\ns\n ki\ncker\n.\nT\nhe ver\ny s\nur\npr\ni\ns\ni\nng t\nhi\nng about\n t\nhe pr\nevi\nous\n di\ns\ncus\ns\ni\non i\ns\n t\nhat\n t\nhe pl\nayer\n I\n \nw\nas\n r\nef\ner\nr\ni\nng t\no as\n on t\ni\nl\nt\n i\ns\n act\nual\nl\ny a ver\ny good pl\nayer\n. H\ne coul\nd even be\n \nw\nor\nl\nd-\ncl\nas\ns\n. O\nf\n cour\ns\ne, t\nhe\ns\nuper\n-\ns\nt\nar\ns\n of\n t\nhe poker\n w\nor\nl\nd—t\nhos\ne w\nho I\n pl\nay agai\nns\nt\n on a r\negul\nar\n bas\ni\ns\n—\nar\ne abl\ne t\no exer\nci\ns\ne f\nar\n m\nor\ne cont\nr\nol\n t\nhan t\nhe aver\nage pl\nayer\n. Y\net\n even a r\neal\n \ngood pl\nayer\n has\n m\nom\nent\ns\n w\nhen he’\ns\n pl\nayi\nng cons\ni\nder\nabl\ny of\nf\n hi\ns\n us\nual\n gam\ne.\n \nSo you have t\no be obs\ner\nvant\n and t\nake advant\nage of\n s\nuch oppor\nt\nuni\nt\ni\nes\n w\nhen\n \nt\nhey pr\nes\nent\n t\nhem\ns\nel\nves\n. Y\nou’\nl\nl\n have m\nany m\nor\ne oppor\nt\nuni\nt\ni\nes\n t\no do t\nhat\n \nagai\nns\nt\n t\nhe aver\nage pl\nayer\n s\ni\nm\npl\ny becaus\ne t\nhey l\nos\ne cont\nr\nol\n f\nar\n m\nor\ne of\nt\nen.\nC\nat\negor\ni\nzi\nng Y\nour\n O\npponent\ns\nI\nt\n i\ns\n al\ns\no ext\nr\nem\nel\ny i\nm\npor\nt\nant\n t\nhat\n you be abl\ne t\no as\ns\nes\ns\n t\nhe qual\ni\nt\ny of\n your\n \nopponent\ns\n’\n pl\nay. Y\nou have t\no pl\nay ver\ny di\nf\nf\ner\nent\nl\ny agai\nns\nt\n s\nt\nr\nong pl\nayer\ns\n \nt\nhan you do agai\nns\nt\n w\neaker\n ones\n. T\nhi\ns\n i\ns\n of\n cr\nuci\nal\n i\nm\npor\nt\nance i\nn no-\nl\ni\nm\ni\nt\n.\nShor\nt\nl\ny, I\n’\nm\n goi\nng t\no go i\nnt\no cons\ni\nder\nabl\ne det\nai\nl\n on t\nhi\ns\n i\nm\npor\nt\nant\n s\nubj\nect\n \nbecaus\ne I\n’\nve s\neen ver\ny good pl\nayer\ns\n f\nai\nl\n t\no adj\nus\nt\n t\nhei\nr\n s\nt\nr\nat\negy w\nhen t\nhey’\nr\ne\n \n347', metadata={'source': 'players/doyle_brunson/brunson_pdfs/super_system_2.pdf', 'page': 346}),

B\nut\n bef\nor\ne I\n get\n i\nnt\no t\nhe\n \ns\npeci\nf\ni\nc det\nai\nl\ns\n, I\n w\nant\n t\no gi\nve you t\nw\no gener\nal\n r\nul\nes\n t\no gui\nde you i\nn t\nhi\ns\n \nm\nat\nt\ner\n.\n(\n1)\n A\ngai\nns\nt\n a l\now\n-\ngr\nade pl\nayer\n:\n Y\nou s\ni\nm\npl\ny m\nake t\nhe obvi\nous\n pl\nay. T\nhat\n i\ns\n,\n \nyou don’\nt\n t\nr\ny t\no get\n f\nancy w\nhen you’\nr\ne i\nn a pot\n w\ni\nt\nh a w\neak pl\nayer\n. Y\nou don’\nt\n \nt\nr\ny t\no m\nake s\nubt\nl\ne m\noves\n t\nhat\n’\nl\nl\n be f\nar\n beyond hi\ns\n capaci\nt\ny t\no under\ns\nt\nand or\n \nappr\neci\nat\ne. I\nn a w\nor\nd, you out\npl\nay hi\nm\n.\n(\n2)\n A\ngai\nns\nt\n a hi\ngher\n-\ngr\nade pl\nayer\n (\ns\nom\neone w\nho coul\nd be t\nhi\nnki\nng al\nong t\nhe\n \ns\nam\ne l\ni\nnes\n as\n you)\n:\n Y\nou m\nus\nt\n m\ni\nx-\nup your\n pl\nay. Som\net\ni\nm\nes\n you m\nake an\n \nobvi\nous\n pl\nay agai\nns\nt\n a s\nt\nr\nong pl\nayer\n—as\n you al\nw\nays\n w\noul\nd agai\nns\nt\n a w\neak\n \npl\nayer\n—and ot\nher\n t\ni\nm\nes\n you go at\n i\nt\n anot\nher\n w\nay and m\nake a pl\nay t\nhat\n’\ns\n not\n \ns\no obvi\nous\n. M\nos\nt\n of\n t\nhe t\ni\nm\ne, you have t\no put\n a pl\nay on or\n out\n-\nm\naneuver\n a\n \ns\nt\nr\nong pl\nayer\n.\nI\nn a nut\ns\nhel\nl\n, t\nhat\n’\ns\n al\nl\n t\nher\ne i\ns\n t\no i\nt\n. A\nnd i\nt\n s\neem\ns\n s\ni\nm\npl\ne and l\nogi\ncal\n enough.\n \nT\nher\ne ar\ne even ver\ny good pl\nayer\ns\n w\nho know\n t\nhat\n t\nhat\n’\ns\n w\nhat\n t\nhey’\nr\ne\n \ns\nuppos\ned t\no do, but\n know\ni\nng s\nom\net\nhi\nng and bei\nng abl\ne t\no execut\ne i\nt\n ar\ne t\nw\no\n \ndi\nf\nf\ner\nent\n t\nhi\nngs\n. \nPl\nayi\nng A\ngai\nns\nt\n a Weak Pl\nayer\nT\nher\ne w\nas\n a par\nt\ni\ncul\nar\n pl\nayer\n w\nho ent\ner\ned a t\nour\nnam\nent\n f\nor\n t\nhe f\ni\nr\ns\nt\n t\ni\nm\ne and,\n \nal\nm\nos\nt\n i\nm\nm\nedi\nat\nel\ny, i\nt\n becam\ne obvi\nous\n t\nhat\n he w\nas\n a w\neak pl\nayer\n. H\ne w\nas\n \nt\nhe s\nupr\nem\ne exam\npl\ne of\n a cal\nl\ni\nng s\nt\nat\ni\non, a pl\nayer\n w\nho’\ns\n next\n t\no i\nm\npos\ns\ni\nbl\ne t\no\n \nbl\nuf\nf\n.\nE\nven t\nhough I\n had never\n pl\nayed agai\nns\nt\n hi\nm\n bef\nor\ne, i\nt\n di\ndn’\nt\n t\nake m\ne ver\ny\n \nl\nong t\no r\necogni\nze t\nhe t\nype of\n pl\nayer\n he w\nas\n. I\n’\nve pl\nayed w\ni\nt\nh t\nhous\nands\n j\nus\nt\n \nl\ni\nke hi\nm\n t\nhr\noughout\n m\ny car\neer\n. So I\n knew\n w\nhat\n t\no do w\nhen I\n w\nas\n i\nnvol\nved i\nn\n \na pot\n w\ni\nt\nh hi\nm\n. M\nor\ne pr\neci\ns\nel\ny, I\n knew\n w\nhat\n not\n t\no do. I\n w\nas\n not\n goi\nng t\no t\nr\ny\n \nt\no bl\nuf\nf\n hi\nm\n. N\not\n even once.\nI\n qui\nckl\ny deci\nded t\nhat\n i\nf\n I\n w\nas\n i\nn t\nhe pot\n w\ni\nt\nh hi\nm\n, I\n w\nas\n goi\nng t\no s\nhow\n hi\nm\n a\n \nhand. I\nf\n he had anyt\nhi\nng at\n al\nl\n he l\nooked ‘\nem\n up. A\ns\n I\n s\nai\nd,\n \nhe w\nas\n t\nhe ul\nt\ni\nm\nat\ne cal\nl\ni\nng s\nt\nat\ni\non. H\ne l\nooked enough of\n t\nhem\n up t\no f\ni\nni\ns\nh f\nar\n \nhi\ngher\n t\nhan he s\nhoul\nd have. H\ne w\nas\n pr\nobabl\ny about\n a 1000 t\no 1 dog t\no f\ni\nni\ns\nh\n \nas\n hi\ngh as\n he di\nd. T\nhe r\neas\non he di\nd w\nas\n s\ni\nm\npl\ny becaus\ne s\no m\nany pl\nayer\ns\n—\nand s\nom\ne of\n t\nhem\n ver\ny exper\ni\nenced—j\nus\nt\n handed hi\nm\n t\nhei\nr\n m\noney. T\nhey\n \nl\ni\nt\ner\nal\nl\ny gave i\nt\n aw\nay t\no hi\nm\n. \nWhat\n t\nhey s\nhoul\nd not\n have done i\ns\n t\nr\ny t\no bl\nuf\nf\n hi\nm\n. I\nt\n t\nakes\n an i\ndi\not\n, i\nn m\ny\n \nbook, t\no bl\nuf\nf\n at\n a m\nan w\nho you know\n i\ns\n goi\nng t\no cal\nl\n you. Y\nou s\ni\nm\npl\ny can’\nt\n \nbl\nuf\nf\n a bad pl\nayer\n becaus\ne a bad pl\nayer\n w\ni\nl\nl\n cal\nl\n w\nhen he’\ns\n got\n any ki\nnd of\n a\n \nhand and pas\ns\n w\nhen he does\nn’\nt\n. I\nt\n’\ns\n cl\near\n-\ncut\n. Y\nou don’\nt\n have t\no be an exper\nt\n \nps\nychol\nogi\ns\nt\n t\no f\ni\ngur\ne out\n w\nhat\n he’\ns\n doi\nng. A\nl\nl\n you have t\no know\n i\ns\n t\nhat\n i\nf\n \nhe’\ns\n i\nn t\nhe pot\n he’\ns\n got\n s\nom\net\nhi\nng. A\nnd you’\nr\ne not\n goi\nng t\no get\n hi\nm\n out\n of\n t\nhe\n \npot\n by t\nr\nyi\nng t\no bl\nuf\nf\n hi\nm\n.\nA\nbove al\nl\n, you don’\nt\n w\nant\n t\no gam\nbl\ne w\ni\nt\nh t\nhat\n ki\nnd of\n a pl\nayer\n. For\nget\n about\n \nt\nhat\n. Show\n hi\nm\n a hand. Y\nou do ver\ny f\nundam\nent\nal\n, even obvi\nous\n t\nhi\nngs\n \nagai\nns\nt\n a bad pl\nayer\n—no t\nr\ni\ncks\n, no s\nt\nr\nat\negi\nc pl\nay, not\nhi\nng f\nancy. Pl\nay\n \ns\nt\nr\nai\nght\nf\nor\nw\nar\nd poker\n agai\nns\nt\n a w\neak pl\nayer\n.\nFor\n exam\npl\ne, i\nf\n a w\neak pl\nayer\n r\nai\ns\ned t\nhe pot\n com\ni\nng i\nn, t\nhen checked i\nt\n on t\nhe\n \nf\nl\nop, and checked agai\nn on f\nour\nt\nh s\nt\nr\neet\n, I\n w\noul\nd aut\nom\nat\ni\ncal\nl\ny bet\n, r\negar\ndl\nes\ns\n \nof\n w\nhat\n I\n’\nve got\n, becaus\ne I\n’\nd know\n he does\nn’\nt\n have anyt\nhi\nng at\n al\nl\n. I\nt\n’\ns\n \ns\ni\nm\npl\ne t\no out\npl\nay hi\nm\n becaus\ne hi\ns\n act\ni\nons\n t\nel\nl\n m\ne w\nhet\nher\n he’\ns\n got\n s\nom\net\nhi\nng\n \nor\n not\n. T\nher\ne’\ns\n no m\nys\nt\ner\ny about\n i\nt\n.\nI\n coul\nd al\ns\no out\npl\nay hi\nm\n by adj\nus\nt\ni\nng m\ny s\nt\nyl\ne t\no hi\ns\n. For\n exam\npl\ne, I\n not\ned\n \nt\nhat\n I\n’\nm\n al\nw\nays\n s\nt\nabbi\nng ar\nound t\nr\nyi\nng t\no pi\nck up pot\ns\n. I\n coul\nd s\nt\ni\nl\nl\n do t\nhat\n \nw\ni\nt\nh a w\neak pl\nayer\n i\nn t\nhe pot\n, but\n I\n’\nd adj\nus\nt\n m\ny pl\nay becaus\ne he’\ns\n i\nn t\nher\ne.\n \nFor\n i\nns\nt\nance, I\n m\ni\nght\n r\nai\ns\ne hi\nm\n w\ni\nt\nhout\n l\nooki\nng at\n m\ny hand. N\now\n, her\ne com\nes\n \nt\nhe f\nl\nop and he checks\n. I\nf\n he checks\n agai\nn on f\nour\nt\nh and cal\nl\ns\n \nm\ne agai\nn, t\nhen I\n’\nd know\n I\n’\nm\n goi\nng t\no have t\no s\nhow\n hi\nm\n a hand on t\nhe end.\nI\nf\n I\n’\nm\n i\nn t\nhe pot\n w\ni\nt\nh a w\neak pl\nayer\n and I\n f\nl\nop a r\neal\n bi\ng hand, s\nay a s\net\n of\n \nt\nr\ni\nps\n, I\n w\noul\nd check i\nt\n becaus\ne I\n know\n t\nhat\n i\nf\n he’\nd had anyt\nhi\nng, he w\noul\nd\n \nhave bet\n, and I\n’\nd be abl\ne t\no br\neak hi\nm\n anyw\nay. N\nor\nm\nal\nl\ny, I\n don’\nt\n s\nl\now\n-\npl\nay\n \nt\nhat\n hand. I\n al\nw\nays\n l\nead w\ni\nt\nh i\nt\n. B\nut\n agai\nns\nt\n a w\neak pl\nayer\n, I\n w\noul\ndn’\nt\n m\ni\nnd\n \ngi\nvi\nng hi\nm\n a f\nr\nee car\nd i\nf\n he does\nn’\nt\n have anyt\nhi\nng, I\n w\nant\n hi\nm\n t\no i\nm\npr\nove hi\ns\n \nhand. I\n w\nant\n hi\nm\n t\no m\nake s\nom\net\nhi\nng s\no I\n can pos\ns\ni\nbl\ny br\neak hi\nm\n.\nI\nt\n’\ns\n m\nor\ne di\nf\nf\ni\ncul\nt\n t\no out\npl\nay a s\nt\nr\nong pl\nayer\n. Y\nou can’\nt\n cons\ni\ns\nt\nent\nl\ny do\n \ns\ni\nm\npl\ne t\nhi\nngs\n agai\nns\nt\n bet\nt\ner\n pl\nayer\ns\n;\n you’\nve got\n t\no put\n a pl\nay on s\nom\nebody\n \nw\nho know\ns\n w\nhat\n’\ns\n obvi\nous\n. A\nnd i\nf\n I\n s\nee hi\nm\n do s\nom\net\nhi\nng t\nhat\n’\ns\n obvi\nous\n,\n \nl\ni\nke I\n t\nhi\nnk he’\ns\n t\nr\nyi\nng t\no pi\nck up t\nhe pot\n, I\n’\nl\nl\n put\n a pl\nay on hi\nm\n and r\nai\ns\ne hi\nm\n \nw\ni\nt\nh not\nhi\nng becaus\ne he m\ni\nght\n t\nhr\now\n hi\ns\n hand aw\nay. \nSi\nnce a good pl\nayer\n w\ni\nl\nl\n under\ns\nt\nand t\nhe obvi\nous\n, I\n m\nus\nt\n t\nr\ny t\no decei\nve hi\nm\n.\n \nI\n’\nl\nl\n even put\n a pl\nay on m\nor\ne t\nhan one good pl\nayer\n. For\n exam\npl\ne, i\nf\n s\nom\neone\n \nbr\nought\n i\nt\n i\nn or\n r\nai\ns\ned i\nt\n i\nn an ear\nl\ny pos\ni\nt\ni\non and t\nhr\nee pl\nayer\ns\n j\nus\nt\n cal\nl\ned i\nt\n, I\n \nm\ni\nght\n m\nake a bi\ng r\nai\ns\ne w\ni\nt\nh not\nhi\nng, t\nr\nyi\nng t\no pi\nck up t\nhat\n pot\n.\nA\ngai\nns\nt\n a good pl\nayer\n, you’\nl\nl\n have a l\not\n m\nor\ne t\nool\ns\n t\no w\nor\nk w\ni\nt\nh and m\nany\n \ndi\nf\nf\ner\nent\n s\nt\nr\nat\negi\nes\n t\no us\ne. Y\nou’\nr\ne ef\nf\nect\ni\nvel\ny r\nes\nt\nr\ni\nct\ned t\no a pi\nckax and s\nhovel\n \nagai\nns\nt\n a w\neak pl\nayer\n. N\never\n f\nor\nget\n t\nhat\n. D\non’\nt\n t\nr\ny t\no devi\ns\ne el\nabor\nat\ne\n \ns\nt\nr\nat\negi\nes\n t\no us\ne agai\nns\nt\n a bad pl\nayer\n. T\nhey w\non’\nt\n w\nor\nk agai\nns\nt\n hi\nm\n. U\ns\ne\n \ns\nophi\ns\nt\ni\ncat\ned pl\nays\n agai\nns\nt\n a good pl\nayer\n. T\nhey’\nl\nl\n w\nor\nk agai\nns\nt\n hi\nm\n.\nA\nnot\nher\n poi\nnt\n you s\nhoul\nd not\ne about\n w\neak pl\nayer\ns\n i\ns\n t\nhat\n t\nhey com\ne i\nn\n \ns\never\nal\n var\ni\net\ni\nes\n. T\nhey’\nr\ne not\n al\nl\n l\ni\nke t\nhe one I\n des\ncr\ni\nbed above. Som\ne ar\ne t\nhe\n \ncom\npl\net\ne oppos\ni\nt\ne. T\nher\ne ar\ne s\nom\ne w\nho check good hands\n and bet\n bad hands\n.\n \nT\nhey l\ni\nke t\no bl\nuf\nf\n, and t\nhey do i\nt\n al\nm\nos\nt\n al\nl\n t\nhe t\ni\nm\ne. So, w\nhen you r\necogni\nze\n \na pl\nayer\n l\ni\nke t\nhat\n, you keep on checki\nng i\nt\n t\no hi\nm\n and l\net\n hi\nm\n bl\nuf\nf\n hi\ns\n m\noney\n \nof\nf\n t\no you.\nN\not\ne t\nhat\n I\n di\ndn’\nt\n s\nay t\no check-\nr\nai\ns\ne hi\nm\n. A\n \ns\nt\nr\nong no-\nl\ni\nm\ni\nt\n pl\nayer\n can keep s\nl\nappi\nng you ar\nound, j\nus\nt\n l\nean on you and\n \nkeep l\neani\nng on you unt\ni\nl\n you t\noppl\ne. O\nf\n cour\ns\ne, t\nhat\n coul\nd happen i\nn l\ni\nm\ni\nt\n \nt\noo, but\n agai\nn, not\n t\no t\nhe s\nam\ne degr\nee.\nT\nhe ver\ny bes\nt\n pl\nayer\ns\n I\n know\n ar\ne ext\nr\nem\nel\ny aggr\nes\ns\ni\nve pl\nayer\ns\n and t\nhat\n’\ns\n \nw\nhat\n m\nakes\n t\nhem\n gr\neat\n pl\nayer\ns\n. A\nnd I\n f\ni\nr\nm\nl\ny bel\ni\neve t\nhat\n’\ns\n w\nhat\n account\ns\n f\nor\n t\nhe\n \ndi\nf\nf\ner\nence bet\nw\neen a ver\ny good pl\nayer\n and a t\nr\nul\ny t\nop pl\nayer\n. B\nut\n at\n t\nhe f\ni\nr\ns\nt\n oppor\nt\nuni\nt\ny I\n get\n,\n \nI\n’\nm\n goi\nng t\no t\nake a s\nt\nand and put\n al\nl\n m\ny m\noney i\nn t\nhe pot\n.\nI\nt\n’\ns\n l\ni\nke t\nhat\n l\ni\nt\nt\nl\ne boy w\nho keeps\n s\nt\ni\ncki\nng hi\ns\n head up and keeps\n get\nt\ni\nng\n \ns\nl\napped al\nl\n t\nhe t\ni\nm\ne. Wel\nl\n, s\nooner\n or\n l\nat\ner\n he’\ns\n not\n goi\nng t\no s\nt\ni\nck hi\ns\n head up\n \nany m\nor\ne. So i\nf\n a guy keeps\n goi\nng on and on and keeps\n poundi\nng on m\ne, t\nhen\n \nm\ne and hi\nm\n ar\ne f\ni\nxi\nng t\no pl\nay a pot\n.\nL\ni\nke m\ne, al\nl\n t\nhe t\nop pl\nayer\ns\n know\n you have t\no be ext\nr\nem\nel\ny aggr\nes\ns\ni\nve t\no be a\n \ncons\ni\ns\nt\nent\n w\ni\nnner\n. Y\nou have t\no bet\n, bet\n, bet\n, al\nl\n t\nhe t\ni\nm\ne. T\nhey’\nr\ne\n \nw\neak. T\nhey s\ni\nt\n dow\nn and t\nr\ny t\no m\nake t\nhe nut\ns\n on you. T\nhat\n’\ns\n har\nd t\no do. For\n exam\npl\ne, i\nf\n i\nt\n cam\ne dow\nn t\no a\n \nt\nough s\ni\nt\nuat\ni\non on t\nhe end and a t\ni\nght\n pl\nayer\n had t\nw\no pai\nr\n but\n t\nher\ne’\ns\n a\n \npos\ns\ni\nbl\ne s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n out\n t\nher\ne, w\nel\nl\n, t\nhat\n t\ni\nght\n pl\nayer\n w\noul\nd pr\nobabl\ny check i\nt\n \nt\nr\nyi\nng t\no s\nhow\n t\nhe hands\n dow\nn. I\n w\nant\n t\no m\nake s\nom\ne m\noney on t\nhe end. I\n w\nant\n t\no get\n val\nue f\nor\n \nm\ny t\nw\no pai\nr\n. So I\n’\nd bet\n and t\nr\ny t\no s\nel\nl\n m\ny hand f\nor\n t\nhe m\nos\nt\n m\noney I\n t\nhought\n \nI\n coul\nd get\n. I\n never\n w\nas\n a t\ni\nght\n pl\nayer\n, even w\nhen I\n f\ni\nr\ns\nt\n s\nt\nar\nt\ned t\no pl\nay.\n \nE\nxper\ni\nence has\n t\naught\n m\ne a l\not\n. E\nar\nl\ny i\nn m\ny car\neer\n, I\n di\ndn’\nt\n know\n how\n t\no s\nt\nar\nt\n \nat\n a pot\n and qui\nt\n, l\ni\nke I\n do now\n.\nI\n don’\nt\n have t\no have t\nhe nut\ns\n t\no bet\n m\ny hand on t\nhe end. A\n m\nor\ne cons\ner\nvat\ni\nve\n \npl\nayer\n w\noul\nd check i\nt\n on t\nhe end, and he’\nl\nl\n get\n hi\ns\n check cal\nl\ned. So, I\n al\nw\nays\n t\nr\ny\n \nt\no m\nake t\nhe bet\n t\nhat\n put\ns\n hi\nm\n i\nn j\neopar\ndy, not\n m\ne. I\nf\n he’\ns\n r\ni\nght\n and I\n’\nm\n \nbl\nuf\nf\ni\nng, he’\ns\n goi\nng t\no m\nove i\nn w\ni\nt\nh hi\ns\n $20,000, and I\n’\nm\n not\n goi\nng t\no cal\nl\n \nhi\nm\n. So he’\nl\nl\n w\ni\nn $7,000. B\nut\n i\nf\n he’\ns\n w\nr\nong and I\n’\nve got\n a hand, he’\ns\n s\nt\ni\nl\nl\n \ngoi\nng t\no m\nove i\nn, but\n now\n he’\ns\n goi\nng t\no get\n cal\nl\ned. A\nnd he’\ns\n goi\nng t\no l\nos\ne\n \n$20,000. So he’\ns\n l\nayi\nng m\ne about\n 3 t\no l\n, hi\ns\n $20,000 t\no m\ny $7,000. I\n put\n t\nhe\n \ncom\nm\ni\nt\nm\nent\n on hi\nm\n. I\n m\nake hi\nm\n com\nm\ni\nt\n hi\nm\ns\nel\nf\n. I\n’\nm\n not\n com\nm\ni\nt\nt\ned no\n \nm\nat\nt\ner\n w\nhat\n he t\nhi\nnks\n. T\nhat\n’\ns\n t\nhe beaut\ny of\n i\nt\n. H\ne’\ns\n t\nhi\nnki\nng about\n m\ny bet\n and\n \nw\nonder\ni\nng how\n m\nuch m\nor\ne he’\ns\n goi\nng t\no have t\no put\n i\nn t\nher\ne.\nI\nt\n’\ns\n an ei\nt\nher\n/\nor\n s\ni\nt\nuat\ni\non. E\ni\nt\nher\n I\n’\nm\n bl\nuf\nf\ni\nng, or\n I\n’\nve got\n t\nhe nut\ns\n. A\nnd\n \nagai\nns\nt\n m\ne, he know\ns\n i\nt\n coul\nd cos\nt\n hi\nm\n $20,000—hi\ns\n w\nhol\ne s\nt\nack—unl\nes\ns\n he\n \nt\nhr\now\ns\n hi\ns\n hand aw\nay.\nA\nnd you’\nd be s\nur\npr\ni\ns\ned how\n m\nany t\ni\nm\nes\n t\nhey s\nay “T\nake i\nt\n D\noyl\ne,” “T\nake i\nt\n \nD\noyl\ne.” T\nhey j\nus\nt\n t\nhr\now\n t\nhei\nr\n hands\n aw\nay over\n and over\n and over\n agai\nn. I\n \nm\nean, even I\n’\nm\n s\nur\npr\ni\ns\ned. I\n t\nhi\nnk t\no m\nys\nel\nf\n, “Wel\nl\n, he can’\nt\n t\nhr\now\n t\nhi\ns\n one\n \naw\nay.” B\nut\n I\n bet\n anyw\nay. A\nnd t\nher\ne goes\n hi\ns\n hand—chunk!\n I\nt\n f\ni\nnal\nl\ny get\ns\n t\no\n \nbe m\nechani\ncal\n w\ni\nt\nh t\nhem\n. A\nnd I\n’\nve w\non anot\nher\n pot\n.\nI\n’\nve s\nt\nol\nen s\no m\nany pot\ns\n I\n can’\nt\n begi\nn t\no count\n t\nhem\n. A\nnd m\nos\nt\n of\n t\nhe t\ni\nm\ne,\n \nI\n’\nve act\nual\nl\ny had t\no f\nor\nce m\nys\nel\nf\n t\no bet\n. I\n’\nd be pl\nayi\nng al\nl\n ni\nght\n w\ni\nt\nhout\n one\n \ndecent\n hand. Y\net\n I\n’\nd w\ni\nn ever\ny pot\n becaus\ne I\n di\ndn’\nt\n bet\n i\nnt\no t\nhe nut\ns\n. I\nt\n goes\n \non and on l\ni\nke t\nhat\n. I\n pi\nck up a hand, and I\n’\nve got\n not\nhi\nng. T\nhe f\nl\nop com\nes\n \nout\n t\nher\ne, and I\n’\nve s\nt\ni\nl\nl\n got\n not\nhi\nng. So I\n ki\nnd of\n have t\no hi\nt\n m\nys\nel\nf\n t\no bet\n at\n i\nt\n,\n \nbecaus\ne t\nher\ne’\ns\n a guy I\n’\nve been poundi\nng on and poundi\nng on. A\nnd al\nl\n t\nhe\n \nt\ni\nm\ne, I\n’\nm\n t\nhi\nnki\nng, “H\now\n can he t\nhr\now\n hi\ns\n hand aw\nay t\nhi\ns\n t\ni\nm\ne?” B\nut\n I\n bet\n \nand aw\nay i\nt\n goes\n. C\nhunk!\n O\nne m\nor\ne t\ni\nm\ne.\nI\nf\n he t\nakes\n a s\nt\nand and r\nai\ns\nes\n m\ne, I\n go back t\no m\ny bas\ni\nc phi\nl\nos\nophy. I\nf\n I\n’\nve\n \ngot\n a hand, I\n’\nl\nl\n go w\ni\nt\nh i\nt\n, even t\nhough I\n know\n i\nt\n m\ni\nght\n be t\nhe w\nor\ns\nt\n hand.\nB\ny now\n, you s\nhoul\nd have a ver\ny good i\ndea of\n how\n I\n pl\nay no-\nl\ni\nm\ni\nt\n hol\nd’\nem\n. I\n \nhope t\nhi\ns\n s\nom\new\nhat\n l\nengt\nhy i\nnt\nr\noduct\ni\non gave you a s\nuf\nf\ni\nci\nent\n f\neel\n f\nor\n m\ny\n \ns\nt\nyl\ne of\n pl\nay, and I\n hope i\nt\n w\ni\nl\nl\n hel\np you t\no under\ns\nt\nand how\n I\n pl\nay s\npeci\nf\ni\nc\n \nhands\n i\nn var\ni\nous\n s\ni\nt\nuat\ni\nons\n. I\n’\nl\nl\n di\ns\ncus\ns\n t\nhos\ne s\nhor\nt\nl\ny.\nH\now\never\n, w\nhen you r\nead t\nhos\ne di\ns\ncus\ns\ni\nons\n you s\nhoul\nd r\neal\ni\nze i\nt\n’\ns\n qui\nt\ne\n \n357', metadata={'source': 'players/doyle_brunson/brunson_pdfs/super_system_2.pdf', 'page': 356}),

I\n m\nean, I\n’\nd be pl\nayi\nng s\no f\nas\nt\n and w\ni\nnni\nng s\no m\nany\n \nhands\n w\nhen I\n w\nas\n r\nus\nhi\nng t\nhat\n I\n’\nd l\ni\nt\ner\nal\nl\ny br\neak ever\ny pl\nayer\n i\nn t\nhe gam\ne.\n \nB\necaus\ne as\n you know\n, w\nhenever\n I\n hol\nd a bunch of\n hands\n, I\n us\nual\nl\ny get\n act\ni\non\n \non t\nhem\n.\nI\n’\nve never\n w\non a bunch of\n pot\ns\n w\nat\nchi\nng t\nhe ot\nher\n guys\n pl\nay. I\n know\n t\nhat\n \ns\nci\nent\ni\ns\nt\ns\n don’\nt\n bel\ni\neve i\nn r\nus\nhes\n, but\n s\nom\net\ni\nm\nes\n r\nus\nhes\n can m\nake you a\n \nf\nor\nt\nune. A\nl\nl\n you\n \nt\nr\ny t\no do agai\nns\nt\n a w\neak pl\nayer\n i\ns\n m\nake t\nhe bes\nt\n hand and t\nhen ext\nr\nact\n f\nr\nom\n \nhi\nm\n t\nhe l\nar\nges\nt\n am\nount\n of\n m\noney you can. J\nus\nt\n out\npl\nay hi\nm\n.\nH\nO\nW T\nO\n PL\nA\nY\n SPE\nC\nI\nFI\nC\n H\nA\nN\nD\nS\nR\nem\nem\nber\n, t\nhe r\necom\nm\nendat\ni\nons\n I\n m\nake bel\now\n ar\ne how\n you gener\nal\nl\ny\n \ns\nhoul\nd pl\nay t\nhe hands\n di\ns\ncus\ns\ned. T\nhat\n’\ns\n t\nhe w\nay I\n us\nual\nl\ny pl\nay t\nhem\n. B\nut\n you\n \ns\nhoul\nd never\n f\nal\nl\n i\nnt\no a pat\nt\ner\nn pl\nayi\nng poker\n. I\n don’\nt\n. I\n al\nw\nays\n var\ny m\ny pl\nay.\n \nI\n t\nr\ny t\no m\ni\nx i\nt\n up as\n m\nuch as\n I\n can. I\n never\n cons\ni\ns\nt\nent\nl\ny r\nepeat\n m\ny act\ni\non on\n \nany hand. I\n don’\nt\n pl\nay l\ni\nke a com\nput\ner\n t\nhat\n’\ns\n pr\nogr\nam\nm\ned t\no do t\nhe s\nam\ne\n \nr\nout\ni\nne over\n and over\n agai\nn. T\nhe hi\ngh qual\ni\nt\ny pl\nayer\ns\n I\n pl\nay agai\nns\nt\n on a\n \nr\negul\nar\n bas\ni\ns\n w\noul\nd eas\ni\nl\ny det\nect\n a pat\nt\ner\nn t\no m\ny pl\nay i\nf\n t\nher\ne w\ner\ne any. So I\n \nnever\n do t\nhe s\nam\ne t\nhi\nng w\ni\nt\nh t\nhe s\nam\ne hand f\nr\nom\n t\nhe s\nam\ne pos\ni\nt\ni\non agai\nns\nt\n \nt\nhe s\nam\ne pl\nayer\n. I\n’\nm\n al\nw\nays\n changi\nng s\npeeds\n dur\ni\nng t\nhe cour\ns\ne of\n a gam\ne.\nH\now\never\n, f\nor\n your\n pur\npos\nes\n, m\ny pl\nayi\nng r\necom\nm\nendat\ni\nons\n f\nor\n a par\nt\ni\ncul\nar\n \nhand ar\ne a good w\nay f\nor\n you t\no pl\nay t\nhem\n unt\ni\nl\n your\n opponent\ns\n l\near\nn your\n \ns\nt\nyl\ne. When t\nhey do, you s\nt\nar\nt\n s\nhi\nf\nt\ni\nng gear\ns\n, up and dow\nn cont\ni\nnuous\nl\ny, unt\ni\nl\n \nt\nher\ne i\ns\n no not\ni\nceabl\ne pat\nt\ner\nn.\nI\n’\nm\n goi\nng t\no br\neak t\nhe gam\ne dow\nn i\nnt\no f\nour\n m\naj\nor\n and ver\ny br\noad cat\negor\ni\nes\n \nas\n f\nol\nl\now\ns\n:\nI\n. Pai\nr\ns\nI\nI\n. Sm\nal\nl\n C\nonnect\ni\nng C\nar\nds\nI\nI\nI\n. B\nor\nder\nl\ni\nne H\nands\nI\nV\n. I\nf\n I\n got\n cal\nl\ned, I\n’\nd pr\noceed caut\ni\nous\nl\ny. I\n \nm\nean, w\nhen t\nhe next\n car\nd w\nas\n t\nur\nned, I\n’\nd check i\nt\n t\no hi\nm\n. I\nf\n he bet\n, m\naybe I\n’\nd\n \ncal\nl\n i\nt\n or\n m\naybe I\n w\noul\ndn’\nt\n. I\nt\n w\noul\nd depend on w\nhat\n I\n f\nel\nt\n t\nhat\n he had. I\n’\nd\n \nknow\n he’\ns\n got\n s\nom\net\nhi\nng t\nhat\n he l\ni\nkes\n.\nFor\n exam\npl\ne, i\nf\n t\nhe f\nl\nop i\ns\n 6-\n6-\n2 and I\n bet\n and he cal\nl\ns\n, he’\ns\n t\nel\nl\ni\nng m\ne he’\ns\n \ngot\n s\nom\ne ki\nnd of\n hand. H\ne’\ns\n pr\nobabl\ny got\n a pai\nr\n i\nn t\nhe pocket\n, anyw\nher\ne f\nr\nom\n \ns\nevens\n t\no t\nens\n, or\n el\ns\ne he’\ns\n got\n t\nhr\nee s\ni\nxes\n or\n t\nhr\nee deuces\n. So I\n’\nd us\ne m\ny\n \nj\nudgm\nent\n at\n t\nhat\n poi\nnt\n, and I\n’\nd be caut\ni\nous\n agai\nn.\nI\nf\n t\nher\ne w\ner\ne a coupl\ne of\n pl\nayer\ns\n i\nn t\nhe pot\n i\nn f\nr\nont\n of\n m\ne and one of\n t\nhem\n \nf\nl\nopped a s\net\n of\n s\ni\nxes\n, he’\nd pr\nobabl\ny check i\nt\n t\no m\ne. T\nhat\n’\ns\n w\nhat\n m\nos\nt\n pl\nayer\ns\n \ndo i\nn t\nhi\ns\n s\ni\nt\nuat\ni\non, check a s\net\n i\nnt\no t\nhe r\nai\ns\ner\n. B\nut\n as\n you know\n, t\nhat\n’\ns\n t\nhe\n \nw\nr\nong w\nay t\no pl\nay i\nt\n. A\n s\nt\nr\nong pl\nayer\n w\noul\nd know\n t\nhat\n t\nhe r\ni\nght\n t\nhi\nng t\no do i\ns\n \nl\nead i\nnt\no you.\nI\nf\n i\nt\n w\nas\n checked t\no m\ne and t\nher\ne w\nas\nn’\nt\n a s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n dr\naw\n on t\nhe boar\nd—s\nay\n \nt\nhe f\nl\nop w\nas\n 7-\n7-\n2—I\n m\ni\nght\n check i\nt\n as\n w\nel\nl\n and gi\nve a f\nr\nee car\nd. I\n’\nd do t\nhat\n \nf\nor\n t\nw\no r\neas\nons\n:\n(\n1)\n I\nf\n he di\ndn’\nt\n have a hand, I\n’\nd w\nant\n hi\nm\n t\no hel\np hi\ns\n hand enough t\no cont\ni\nnue\n \npl\nayi\nng. For\n exam\npl\ne, i\nf\n a j\nack or\n queen f\nel\nl\n of\nf\n on f\nour\nt\nh s\nt\nr\neet\n, i\nt\n m\ni\nght\n pai\nr\n \nhi\nm\n.\n(\n2)\n I\n’\nd w\nant\n t\no el\ni\nm\ni\nnat\ne t\nhe pos\ns\ni\nbi\nl\ni\nt\ny t\nhat\n I\n’\nd get\n br\noke i\nf\n he does\n have a 7.\n368', metadata={'source': 'players/doyle_brunson/brunson_pdfs/super_system_2.pdf', 'page': 367}),

I\nn br\ni\nef\n, you don’\nt\n gi\nve f\nr\nee\n \ncar\nds\n i\nf\n t\nhat\n f\nr\nee car\nd coul\nd br\neak you. I\nf\n t\nher\ne’\ns\n a pos\ns\ni\nbl\ne s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n or\n f\nl\nus\nh\n \ndr\naw\n on boar\nd, you don’\nt\n gi\nve a f\nr\nee car\nd.\nI\nf\n I\n had t\nw\no aces\n w\ni\nt\nh a 6-\n6-\nK\n f\nl\nop and i\nt\n w\nas\n checked t\no m\ne, I\n’\nd pr\nobabl\ny\n \ncheck i\nt\n back. I\nf\n he’\ns\n got\n a ki\nng, he’\ns\n goi\nng t\no pl\nay i\nt\n on f\nour\nt\nh s\nt\nr\neet\n, becaus\ne\n \nby checki\nng, you’\nve m\nade hi\nm\n t\nhi\nnk he’\ns\n got\n t\nhe bes\nt\n hand. Pl\nus\n, i\nf\n he does\n \nhave a 6, as\n bef\nor\ne, you m\ni\nght\n be abl\ne t\no hol\nd your\n l\nos\ns\nes\n t\no a m\ni\nni\nm\num\n. A\n \nf\nl\nop t\nhat\n’\ns\n6-\n6-\n5 i\ns\n a l\not\n di\nf\nf\ner\nent\n, becaus\ne t\nher\ne’\ns\n t\nhe pos\ns\ni\nbi\nl\ni\nt\ny of\n a s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n dr\naw\n.\nWhat\n i\nt\n al\nl\n boi\nl\ns\n dow\nn t\no i\ns\n t\nhat\n w\ni\nt\nh a pai\nr\n of\n aces\n or\n ki\nngs\n, you’\nr\ne w\nai\nt\ni\nng\n \nunt\ni\nl\n you get\n i\nnt\no w\nhat\n you t\nhi\nnk i\ns\n a f\navor\nabl\ne s\ni\nt\nuat\ni\non bef\nor\ne you r\neal\nl\ny\n \npl\nay a bi\ng pot\n. Y\nou’\nr\ne not\n l\nooki\nng t\no pl\nay a bi\ng pot\n i\nf\n t\nher\ne’\ns\n onl\ny a s\nm\nal\nl\n \nchance you’\nl\nl\n have t\nhe bes\nt\n of\n i\nt\n or\n one w\nher\ne you’\nr\ne a bi\ng under\ndog.\nI\nn gener\nal\n, w\ni\nt\nh t\nhos\ne bi\ng pai\nr\ns\n on t\nhe f\nl\nop, you pl\nay t\nhem\n a l\ni\nt\nt\nl\ne m\nor\ne\n \naggr\nes\ns\ni\nvel\ny f\nr\nom\n a l\nat\ne pos\ni\nt\ni\non t\nhan f\nr\nom\n an ear\nl\ny pos\ni\nt\ni\non, but\n you s\nhoul\nd\n \nbe aw\nar\ne t\nhat\n s\nom\neone m\ni\nght\n be checki\nng t\nhe nut\ns\n t\no you, s\nuch as\n t\nhr\nee s\ni\nxes\n \ni\nn t\nhe exam\npl\nes\n us\ned. Y\nou never\n w\nor\nr\ny about\n t\nhat\n. I\n’\nve hear\nd peopl\ne s\nay,\n \n“Wel\nl\n, I\n w\nas\n af\nr\nai\nd t\no bet\n becaus\ne I\n w\nas\n af\nr\nai\nd he’\nd r\nai\ns\ne m\ne.” N\never\n w\nor\nr\ny\n \nabout\n get\nt\ni\nng r\nai\ns\ned. Y\nou have t\no go ahead and pl\nay. I\nf\n i\nt\n happens\n, i\nt\n happens\n,\n \nand t\nhen you w\nor\nr\ny about\n i\nt\n. D\non’\nt\n cr\nos\ns\n t\nhat\n br\ni\ndge unt\ni\nl\n you com\ne t\no i\nt\n.\nY\nou can’\nt\n pl\nay w\ni\nnni\nng poker\n by pl\nayi\nng s\naf\ne al\nl\n t\nhe t\ni\nm\ne. Y\nou m\nus\nt\n t\nake\n \nchances\n. Y\nou m\nus\nt\n gam\nbl\ne. A\nnd you have t\no f\neel\n aggr\nes\ns\ni\nve t\no pl\nay\n \naggr\nes\ns\ni\nvel\ny. T\nhat\n’\ns\n m\ny s\nt\nyl\ne of\n poker\n. A\nnd i\nt\n’\ns\n a w\ni\nnni\nng s\nt\nyl\ne.\nI\n’\nve r\ne-\ns\nt\nat\ned m\ny gener\nal\n phi\nl\nos\nophy of\n pl\nay at\n t\nhi\ns\n poi\nnt\n becaus\ne I\n’\nm\n \ndi\ns\ncus\ns\ni\nng t\nhe pl\nay of\n a pai\nr\n of\n aces\n or\n ki\nngs\n i\nn t\nhe hol\ne. T\nhat\n i\ns\n, I\n pl\nay t\nhem\n caut\ni\nous\nl\ny.\n \nT\nhi\ns\n i\ns\n cont\nr\nar\ny t\no m\ny us\nual\n s\nt\nyl\ne of\n pl\nay and t\no t\nhe w\nay m\nos\nt\n peopl\ne pl\nay\n \nt\nhem\n. I\nn t\nhe l\nat\nt\ner\n \ncas\ne, as\n you’\nl\nl\n s\nee bel\now\n, I\n’\nm\n goi\nng t\no m\nake hi\nm\n pay t\no dr\naw\n t\no hi\ns\n hand.\nI\n al\ns\no pl\nay t\nw\no aces\n or\n ki\nngs\n s\nl\now\nl\ny i\nn t\nhe r\nar\ne i\nns\nt\nance t\nhat\n a s\net\n of\n t\nr\ni\nps\n \nf\nl\nops\n, s\nay t\nhr\nee s\nevens\n or\n t\nhr\nee j\nacks\n. B\nut\n t\nhi\ns\n t\ni\nm\ne I\n do i\nt\n f\nor\n s\nom\new\nhat\n \ndi\nf\nf\ner\nent\n r\neas\nons\n. I\nn t\nhi\ns\n cas\ne, I\n w\nant\n m\ny opponent\n i\nn t\nhe pot\n t\no i\nm\npr\nove hi\ns\n \nhand or\n cat\nch up w\ni\nt\nh m\ne. So I\n check i\nt\n, but\n j\nus\nt\n one t\ni\nm\ne. I\n w\nant\n t\no gi\nve hi\nm\n \na f\nr\nee car\nd s\no he can cat\nch a pai\nr\n or\n get\n a chance t\no bl\nuf\nf\n at\n i\nt\n. I\nt\n’\ns\n t\nough t\no\n \nw\ni\nn anyt\nhi\nng i\nn t\nhat\n s\npot\n by l\neadi\nng of\nf\n unl\nes\ns\n you cat\nch s\nom\nebody w\ni\nt\nh a\n \npai\nr\n i\nn t\nhe pocket\n.\nO\nf\n cour\ns\ne, t\nher\ne’\ns\n a s\nm\nal\nl\n chance you coul\nd r\nun i\nnt\no quads\n, but\n anyone w\nho\n \nm\nade t\nhat\n hand w\ni\nl\nl\n l\net\n you know\n i\nt\n by t\nhe w\nay he put\ns\n al\nl\n hi\ns\n m\noney i\nn t\nhe\n \npot\n. I\nt\n t\nakes\n exper\ni\nence t\no r\necogni\nze s\nom\net\nhi\nng l\ni\nke t\nhat\n, but\n i\nt\n’\ns\n j\nus\nt\n l\ni\nke any\n \not\nher\n s\ni\nt\nuat\ni\non w\nher\ne s\nom\nebody’\ns\n bet\nt\ni\nng t\nhe pur\ne nut\ns\n at\n you. Y\nou have t\no\n \nus\ne j\nudgm\nent\n t\no eval\nuat\ne i\nt\n. A\nf\nt\ner\n a w\nhi\nl\ne, you r\necogni\nze i\nt\n. A\ns\n al\nw\nays\n, i\nt\n \nboi\nl\ns\n dow\nn t\no r\neadi\nng peopl\ne.\nT\nhe one s\ni\nt\nuat\ni\non w\nher\ne I\n s\nt\nand t\no l\nos\ne a ver\ny bi\ng pot\n w\ni\nt\nh a pai\nr\n of\n aces\n or\n \nki\nngs\n i\ns\n w\nhen t\nher\ne ar\ne t\nw\no t\no a s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n or\n f\nl\nus\nh on t\nhe f\nl\nop. For\n exam\npl\ne,\n \ns\nay t\nher\ne’\ns\n a J\n-\n10-\n2 out\n t\nher\ne. I\nf\n s\nom\nebody bet\n at\n m\ne, I\n’\nd m\nove i\nn a l\not\n of\n \nchi\nps\n. I\n coul\nd w\ni\nn t\nhe pot\n r\ni\nght\n t\nher\ne. I\nf\n not\n, m\ny opponent\n i\ns\n r\neal\nl\ny goi\nng t\no\n \npay t\no dr\naw\n t\no hi\ns\n hand. I\nf\n I\n w\ner\ne f\ni\nr\ns\nt\n t\no act\n, I\n’\nd check, hopi\nng I\n’\nd get\n t\nhe\n \nchance t\no r\nai\ns\ne i\nt\n. T\nhi\ns\n i\ns\n one of\n t\nhe f\new\n t\ni\nm\nes\n I\n check-\nr\nai\ns\ne.\nI\nf\n I\n get\n cal\nl\ned, I\n’\nl\nl\n pr\nobabl\ny put\n m\ny opponent\n on a s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n or\n f\nl\nus\nh dr\naw\n. O\nf\n \ncour\ns\ne, on f\nour\nt\nh s\nt\nr\neet\n I\n’\nl\nl\n go ahead and bet\n agai\nn i\nf\n a m\neani\nngl\nes\ns\n car\nd or\n \nbl\nank f\nal\nl\ns\n. A\ngai\nn, t\nhi\ns\n i\nnvol\nves\n a l\not\n of\n good j\nudgm\nent\n, becaus\ne m\ny\n \nopponent\n m\ni\nght\n have been f\nor\nt\nunat\ne enough t\no m\nake s\nom\ne ki\nnd of\n hand t\nhat\n \nw\noul\nd beat\n m\ny t\nw\no aces\n, s\nuch as\n j\nacks\n and t\nens\n. I\nn t\nhi\ns\n s\ni\nt\nuat\ni\non, I\n’\nd know\n i\nf\n m\ny bi\ng pai\nr\n w\nas\n beat\n, es\npeci\nal\nl\ny i\nf\n I\n \nhad r\nai\ns\ned w\ni\nt\nh m\ny hand f\nr\nom\n an ear\nl\ny pos\ni\nt\ni\non bef\nor\ne t\nhe f\nl\nop. A\nl\nl\n good\n \nhol\nd’\nem\n pl\nayer\ns\n w\noul\nd i\nnt\ner\npr\net\n t\nhat\n as\n a s\ni\ngn of\n s\nt\nr\nengt\nh. I\n m\nean, t\nhe f\ni\nr\ns\nt\n \nt\nhi\nng you us\nual\nl\ny gi\nve a m\nan, es\npeci\nal\nl\ny a w\neaker\n pl\nayer\n, cr\nedi\nt\n f\nor\n w\nhen he\n \nr\nai\ns\nes\n i\ns\n a bi\ng pai\nr\n. So i\nf\n i\nt\n com\nes\n a\n10-\n6-\n5 and I\n had r\nai\ns\ned f\nr\nom\n an ear\nl\ny pos\ni\nt\ni\non, t\nhe ot\nher\n pl\nayer\ns\n w\ni\nl\nl\n t\nhi\nnk\n \nt\nhat\n I\n have a s\nt\nr\nong hand, pos\ns\ni\nbl\ny a bi\ng pai\nr\n, w\nhi\nch I\n’\nve got\n. T\nhen w\nhen I\n bet\n \non t\nhe f\nl\nop and get\n r\nai\ns\ned by s\nom\nebody i\nn a l\nat\ne pos\ni\nt\ni\non, i\nt\n get\ns\n back t\no\n \neval\nuat\ni\nng peopl\ne agai\nn. Y\nou’\nve j\nus\nt\n got\n t\no know\n your\n pl\nayer\ns\n. H\ne’\ns\n \nr\nepr\nes\nent\ni\nng t\no you t\nhat\n he can beat\n a bi\ng pai\nr\n. I\nf\n he’\ns\n a good, s\nol\ni\nd-\nt\nype\n \npl\nayer\n, w\nhat\n el\ns\ne can he have bes\ni\ndes\n a s\net\n of\n t\nr\ni\nps\n or\n pos\ns\ni\nbl\ny t\nw\no pai\nr\n? So\n \nyou m\nake up your\n m\ni\nnd r\ni\nght\n t\nher\ne w\nhet\nher\n or\n not\n t\no go ahead w\ni\nt\nh your\n t\nw\no\n \naces\n or\n t\nw\no ki\nngs\n.\nO\nf\n cour\ns\ne, i\nt\n’\ns\n pos\ns\ni\nbl\ne t\nhat\n he has\n a pai\nr\n of\n queens\n or\n j\nacks\n i\nn a back pos\ni\nt\ni\non\n \nand di\ndn’\nt\n r\nai\ns\ne you bef\nor\ne t\nhe f\nl\nop, but\n t\nhat\n now\n on t\nhe f\nl\nop he’\ns\n deci\nded t\no\n \nt\nes\nt\n you, becaus\ne he’\ns\n got\n an over\npai\nr\n. Y\nou m\ni\nght\n w\nant\n t\no cal\nl\n hi\ns\n r\nai\ns\ne one\n \nt\ni\nm\ne i\nf\n i\nt\n’\ns\n not\n t\noo bi\ng a bet\n. T\nhe next\n t\ni\nm\ne, check i\nt\n t\no hi\nm\n and s\nee w\nhat\n he\n \ndoes\n. I\nf\n he bet\ns\n agai\nn, he’\ns\n us\nual\nl\ny t\nher\ne.\nPl\nayi\nng w\ni\nt\nh H\nel\np on t\nhe Fl\nop. U\np t\no now\n, I\n’\nve di\ns\ncus\ns\ned how\n I\n’\nd pl\nay a pai\nr\n \nof\n aces\n or\n ki\nngs\n on t\nhe f\nl\nop as\ns\num\ni\nng I\n di\ndn’\nt\n f\nl\nop anyt\nhi\nng t\nhat\n hel\nped m\ny\n \nhand. N\now\n I\n’\nl\nl\n di\ns\ncus\ns\n t\nhe s\ni\nt\nuat\ni\nons\n w\nher\ne I\n get\n s\nom\ne hel\np.\nI\nf\n I\n f\nl\nop a s\net\n, I\n never\n s\nl\now\n-\npl\nay i\nt\n. T\nher\ne i\ns\n one except\ni\non t\no t\nhi\ns\n r\nul\ne, w\nhi\nch\n \nI\n’\nl\nl\n di\ns\ncus\ns\n bel\now\n. B\nut\n f\nor\n t\nhe m\nos\nt\n par\nt\n, I\n al\nm\nos\nt\n al\nw\nays\n com\ne r\ni\nght\n out\n and\n \nbet\n, and I\n don’\nt\n m\nake j\nus\nt\n a nom\ni\nnal\n bet\n. I\n m\nake an ext\nr\na-\nl\nar\nge bet\n becaus\ne\n \nyou’\nl\nl\n onl\ny w\ni\nn a bi\ng pot\n i\nf\n an opponent\n f\nl\nops\n s\nom\net\nhi\nng w\ni\nt\nh you, put\ns\n you\n \non a bl\nuf\nf\n, or\n t\nr\ni\nes\n t\no r\nun you dow\nn. So, I\n r\neal\nl\ny com\ne out\n s\nm\noki\nn’\n r\ni\nght\n t\nher\ne.\nE\nar\nl\ni\ner\n, I\n s\nai\nd t\nhat\n w\nhen you have a pai\nr\n of\n aces\n and a s\ni\nngl\ne ace f\nl\nops\n,\n \nt\nher\ne’\nl\nl\n al\nw\nays\n be t\nhe pos\ns\ni\nbi\nl\ni\nt\ny t\nhat\n t\nhe next\n car\nd of\nf\n w\ni\nl\nl\n m\nake s\nom\neone a\n \ns\nt\nr\nai\nght\n. Y\nou can’\nt\n w\nor\nr\ny about\n i\nt\n \nbecaus\ne you don’\nt\n know\n w\nhi\nch s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n i\nt\n i\ns\n, i\nf\n i\nt\n w\nas\n m\nade at\n al\nl\n. I\nf\n \ns\nom\neone bet\n, I\n’\nd cal\nl\n i\nt\n, t\nhi\nnki\nng t\nhat\n I\n’\nm\n pr\nobabl\ny beat\n but\n t\nr\nyi\nng t\no m\nake a\n \nf\nul\nl\n. I\n m\nean, I\n w\noul\ndn’\nt\n know\n f\nor\n s\nur\ne t\nhat\n I\n w\nas\n beat\n, but\n I\n’\nd cal\nl\n know\ni\nng\n \nt\nher\ne w\nas\n a s\nt\nr\nong pos\ns\ni\nbi\nl\ni\nt\ny I\n w\nas\n. A\nnd I\n’\nd cal\nl\n a pr\net\nt\ny bi\ng bet\n.\nI\nf\n t\nhe m\nan m\noved al\nl\n-\ni\nn on m\ne i\nn t\nhat\n s\npot\n, I\n’\nd pr\nobabl\ny gi\nve hi\nm\n cr\nedi\nt\n f\nor\n \nt\nhe f\nl\nus\nh. T\nhen w\nhet\nher\n or\n not\n t\no cal\nl\n i\ns\n a m\nat\nt\ner\n of\n s\ni\nm\npl\ne m\nat\nhem\nat\ni\ncs\n. T\nen\n \ncar\nds\n out\n of\n t\nhe f\nor\nt\ny-\nf\ni\nve l\nef\nt\n w\noul\nd hel\np m\ny hand, as\ns\num\ni\nng t\nhe l\nas\nt\n ace i\ns\n \ns\nt\ni\nl\nl\n i\nn t\nhe deck, as\n ar\ne t\nhr\nee each of\n t\nhe ot\nher\n t\nhr\nee car\nds\n on t\nhe boar\nd t\nhat\n \ncoul\nd pai\nr\n and m\nake m\ny f\nul\nl\n. T\nhat\n m\neans\n i\nt\n’\ns\n 35 t\no 10, or\n 3 t\no 1, t\nhat\n I\n w\non’\nt\n \ni\nm\npr\nove m\ny hand. I\nf\n t\nhe pot\n’\ns\n l\nayi\nng m\ne m\nor\ne t\nhan 3 t\no 1, I\n’\nd cal\nl\n. I\nf\n not\n, I\n’\nd\n \nt\nhr\now\n m\ny hand aw\nay.\nO\nf\n cour\ns\ne, t\nhat\n f\nor\nm\nul\na onl\ny appl\ni\nes\n w\nhen you f\neel\n ver\ny s\nt\nr\nongl\ny t\nhat\n your\n \nopponent\n has\n t\nhe f\nl\nus\nh m\nade. I\nf\n you t\nhi\nnk you coul\nd have t\nhe hand w\nr\nong\n \nand your\n opponent\n m\ni\nght\n have t\nhe s\necond s\net\n of\n t\nr\ni\nps\n or\n s\nom\ne ot\nher\n hand,\n \nt\nhen you m\ni\nght\n cal\nl\n i\nf\n t\nhe pot\n w\nas\n l\nayi\nng you l\nes\ns\n odds\n. Y\nou coul\nd accept\n a\n \ns\nm\nal\nl\ner\n pr\ni\nce becaus\ne you have s\nom\ne doubt\ns\n.\nSo m\nuch depends\n on your\n j\nudgm\nent\n i\nn s\ni\nt\nuat\ni\nons\n l\ni\nke t\nhat\n. T\nhi\ns\n i\ns\n es\npeci\nal\nl\ny\n \nt\nr\nue on t\nhe end. I\nf\n I\n di\ndn’\nt\n m\nake m\ny f\nul\nl\n t\nher\ne and I\n w\nas\n f\nor\nced t\no cal\nl\n anot\nher\n \nbet\n, i\nt\n w\noul\nd be com\npl\net\nel\ny up t\no m\ny j\nudgm\nent\n.\nWhen I\n di\ns\ncus\ns\ned how\n I\n’\nd pl\nay m\ny bi\ng pai\nr\n w\nhen I\n f\nl\nopped a f\nul\nl\n, I\n s\nai\nd t\nhat\n \nI\n’\nd al\nm\nos\nt\n al\nw\nays\n check i\nt\n. I\n’\nd m\nake an except\ni\non, t\nhough, i\nf\n t\nw\no of\n t\nhe car\nds\n \non t\nhe f\nl\nop w\ner\ne s\nui\nt\ned, or\n m\naybe even t\nw\no t\no a s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n. Whenever\n you’\nve got\n a f\nul\nl\n and a t\nhr\nee-\nf\nl\nus\nh com\nes\n, i\nt\n’\ns\n exact\nl\ny\n \nt\nhe s\ni\nt\nuat\ni\non you’\nr\ne l\nooki\nng f\nor\n. E\nxact\nl\ny w\nhat\n I\n’\nd do depends\n on\n \nw\nhi\nch car\nd w\nas\n pai\nr\ned and w\nhet\nher\n I\n had bet\n on t\nhe f\nl\nop and on f\nour\nt\nh. B\nut\n i\nf\n you know\n your\n \nopponent\n, i\nt\n does\n m\nake i\nt\n eas\ni\ner\n. I\nf\n t\nhe s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n or\n f\nl\nus\nh i\ns\n m\nade on f\nour\nt\nh and\n \nf\ni\nf\nt\nh s\nt\nr\neet\ns\n, a backdoor\n j\nob, t\nhen you m\nay w\nant\n t\no r\necons\nt\nr\nuct\n t\nhe pl\nay of\n t\nhe\n \nent\ni\nr\ne hand and t\nr\ny t\no det\ner\nm\ni\nne w\nhet\nher\n t\nhat\n par\nt\ni\ncul\nar\n pl\nayer\n w\noul\nd have\n \ngone as\n f\nar\n as\n he di\nd t\no m\nake t\nhe hand. O\nf\n cour\ns\ne, a l\not\n of\n t\ni\nm\nes\n a pl\nayer\n w\ni\nl\nl\n \nl\ni\nt\ner\nal\nl\ny back i\nnt\no a hand l\ni\nke t\nhat\n. Y\nou’\nd have t\no go back t\no\n \nw\nhat\n you or\ni\ngi\nnal\nl\ny f\nel\nt\n your\n opponent\n w\nas\n dr\naw\ni\nng at\n on t\nhe f\nl\nop and on\n \nf\nour\nt\nh s\nt\nr\neet\n. I\nf\n you t\nhought\n he m\nade w\nhat\n he w\nas\n dr\naw\ni\nng at\n on t\nhe l\nas\nt\n car\nd,\n \nw\nel\nl\n, obvi\nous\nl\ny, you’\nd check i\nt\n, w\nhet\nher\n you w\ner\ne f\ni\nr\ns\nt\n or\n l\nas\nt\n t\no act\n. I\nf\n you\n \nw\ner\ne f\ni\nr\ns\nt\n and you t\nhought\n he w\nas\n dr\naw\ni\nng at\n a hand and com\npl\net\nel\ny m\ni\ns\ns\ned\n \ni\nt\n, you’\nd s\nt\ni\nl\nl\n check. T\nher\ne ar\ne\n \nt\ni\nm\nes\n w\nhen you know\n s\nom\nebody m\nus\nt\n have f\nl\nopped s\nom\net\nhi\nng. So you j\nus\nt\n gi\nve i\nt\n up.\nI\nf\n I\n get\n s\nom\ne hel\np on t\nhe f\nl\nop by cat\nchi\nng an ace or\n a ki\nng, I\n’\nd m\nake a\n \nr\neas\nonabl\ne bet\n at\n t\nhe pot\n f\nr\nom\n any pos\ni\nt\ni\non. T\nhe onl\ny t\ni\nm\ne I\n m\ni\nght\n check-\nr\nai\ns\ne\n \ni\nn t\nhi\ns\n s\ni\nt\nuat\ni\non i\ns\n w\nhen I\n had cal\nl\ned i\nn a m\ni\nddl\ne pos\ni\nt\ni\non bef\nor\ne t\nhe f\nl\nop and\n \nt\nhe or\ni\ngi\nnal\n r\nai\ns\ner\n bef\nor\ne t\nhe f\nl\nop w\nas\n behi\nnd m\ne. When s\nom\neone pl\nays\n back\n \nat\n m\ne i\nn t\nhi\ns\n s\ni\nt\nuat\ni\non I\n’\nl\nl\n ei\nt\nher\n m\nove i\nn or\n r\nel\neas\ne m\ny hand, dependi\nng on\n \nw\nhat\n f\nl\nopped. I\nn or\nder\n f\nor\n m\ne t\no m\nove i\nn I\n’\nd have t\no t\nhi\nnk m\ny opponent\n w\nas\n \ndr\naw\ni\nng t\no hi\ns\n hand. For\n exam\npl\ne, i\nf\n t\nhe f\nl\nop cam\ne A\n? 10? 9?, I\n’\nd put\n hi\nm\n on\n \na f\nl\nus\nh dr\naw\n or\n m\naybe a s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n dr\naw\n, and I\n’\nd m\nove i\nn. O\nf\n cour\ns\ne, i\nf\n m\ny\n \nopponent\n f\nl\nopped t\nhr\nee ni\nnes\n, he’\nd be i\nn an i\ndeal\n pos\ni\nt\ni\non t\no w\ni\nn a l\not\n of\n \nm\noney. I\nt\n w\noul\nd l\nook t\no m\ne l\ni\nke he w\nas\n dr\naw\ni\nng at\n a s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n, f\nl\nus\nh, or\n bot\nh,\n \nand i\nf\n he w\nas\n l\nucky enough t\no have f\nl\nopped a s\net\n, w\nel\nl\n, t\nher\ne’\ns\n not\nhi\nng\n \nm\nagi\ncal\n I\n coul\nd do. I\n’\nd j\nus\nt\n have t\no go ahead and pay hi\nm\n of\nf\n.\nO\nn t\nhe ot\nher\n hand, i\nf\n i\nt\n cam\ne of\nf\n r\nagged, l\ni\nke a K\n? 8? 2?, I\n m\ni\nght\n r\nel\neas\ne m\ny\n \nA\n-\nK\n, t\nhi\nnki\nng t\nhat\n he pos\ns\ni\nbl\ny f\nl\nopped a s\net\n.\nI\nf\n a pai\nr\n of\n aces\n or\n ki\nngs\n f\nl\nopped, gi\nvi\nng m\ne t\nr\ni\nps\n, and t\nhe ot\nher\n car\nd i\ns\n not\n \none t\nhat\n’\nl\nl\n gi\nve s\nom\neone a s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n or\n f\nl\nus\nh dr\naw\n, I\n m\ni\nght\n check-\nr\nai\ns\ne. B\nut\n I\n \npr\nobabl\ny w\noul\ndn’\nt\n becaus\ne I\n l\ni\nke t\no l\nead w\ni\nt\nh i\nt\n. I\nf\n I\n bet\n, I\n coul\nd cat\nch a m\nan\n \nw\ni\nt\nh a pai\nr\n of\n queens\n or\n j\nacks\n, and he m\ni\nght\n acci\ndent\nal\nl\ny pay m\ne of\nf\n. T\nhey do.\n \nT\nhey’\nr\ne cons\ni\nder\nabl\ny bet\nt\ner\n t\nhan an aver\nage hand. B\nut\n f\nor\n t\nhe r\neas\non I\n j\nus\nt\n \nm\nent\ni\noned, I\n s\nel\ndom\n r\nai\ns\ne back w\ni\nt\nh a pai\nr\n of\n queens\n f\nr\nom\n any pos\ni\nt\ni\non. B\nut\n I\n \nw\ni\nl\nl\n r\nai\ns\ne t\nhe bl\ni\nnd a r\neas\nonabl\ne am\nount\n w\ni\nt\nh t\nw\no queens\n f\nr\nom\n any pos\ni\nt\ni\non i\nf\n \nnobody el\ns\ne r\nai\ns\ned i\nn f\nr\nont\n of\n m\ne.\nI\nn a m\ni\nddl\ne pos\ni\nt\ni\non, i\nf\n s\nom\nebody r\nai\ns\ned i\nn f\nr\nont\n of\n m\ne I\n’\nd j\nus\nt\n cal\nl\n, as\n I\n \nw\noul\nd w\ni\nt\nh any pai\nr\n. I\n w\noul\ndn’\nt\n \nr\ner\nai\ns\ne, except\n i\nn t\nhe s\ni\nt\nuat\ni\non m\nent\ni\noned above.\nI\n al\ns\no pl\nay t\nw\no queens\n ver\ny s\nl\now\n on t\nhe f\nl\nop, hopi\nng t\no cat\nch a t\nhi\nr\nd queen. I\nf\n \nei\nt\nher\n an ace or\n a ki\nng com\nes\n on t\nhe f\nl\nop, I\n’\nd pl\nay t\nhe hand as\n s\nl\now\nl\ny as\n \npos\ns\ni\nbl\ne. I\nf\n s\nom\neone bet\ns\n w\ni\nt\nh any aut\nhor\ni\nt\ny, I\n’\nd pr\nobabl\ny gi\nve hi\nm\n t\nhe pot\n.\n \nA\ns\n l\nong as\n an ace or\n ki\nng does\nn’\nt\n f\nal\nl\n, I\n’\nd pl\nay t\nw\no queens\n al\nm\nos\nt\n exact\nl\ny t\nhe\n \nw\nay I\n’\nd pl\nay t\nw\no aces\n or\n t\nw\no ki\nngs\n, and t\nhat\n i\nncl\nudes\n t\nhe pl\nay on f\nour\nt\nh and\n \nf\ni\nf\nt\nh s\nt\nr\neet\ns\n. \nI\nn addi\nt\ni\non t\no t\nhe t\ni\nm\nes\n w\nhen an ace or\n ki\nng f\nl\nops\n, I\n’\nd pl\nay queens\n di\nf\nf\ner\nent\nl\ny\n \nf\nr\nom\n t\nw\no aces\n or\n ki\nngs\n w\nhen t\nher\ne’\ns\n a f\nl\nus\nh dr\naw\n on t\nhe f\nl\nop. I\nn t\nhat\n cas\ne, I\n \nw\noul\ndn’\nt\n be eager\n t\no get\n al\nl\n m\ny m\noney i\nn. So r\ni\nght\n t\nher\ne, you can s\nee t\nhe s\nt\nr\nengt\nh of\n bei\nng t\nhe r\nai\ns\ner\n.\n \nH\ne m\nade m\ne l\nay dow\nn m\ny hand. I\n pr\nobabl\ny\n \nw\non’\nt\n r\nai\ns\ne w\ni\nt\nh t\nhi\ns\n ki\nnd of\n hand becaus\ne I\n don’\nt\n w\nant\n t\no get\n s\nhut\n out\n of\n t\nhe\n \npot\n. I\nf\n I\n r\nai\ns\ne and s\nom\nebody el\ns\ne r\ner\nai\ns\nes\n, I\n pr\nobabl\ny w\non’\nt\n be abl\ne t\no pl\nay i\nt\n.\n \nO\nr\n i\nf\n I\n have t\no cal\nl\n a doubl\ne-\nr\nai\ns\ne col\nd, I\n pr\nobabl\ny w\non’\nt\n be abl\ne t\no pl\nay i\nt\n \nt\nher\ne ei\nt\nher\n. T\nher\ne ar\ne al\nw\nays\n except\ni\nons\n, but\n i\nn gener\nal\n, I\n pl\nay t\nhe hand i\nn\n \nor\nder\n t\no get\n a f\nl\nop w\ni\nt\nh i\nt\n.\nFor\n t\nhe m\nos\nt\n par\nt\n, you don’\nt\n w\nant\n t\no put\n a w\nhol\ne l\not\n of\n m\noney i\nn t\nhe pot\n w\ni\nt\nh\n \ns\nm\nal\nl\n connect\ni\nng car\nds\n bef\nor\ne t\nhe f\nl\nop. I\nt\n’\ns\n bes\nt\n t\no t\nake a l\not\n of\n f\nl\nops\n w\ni\nt\nh\n \nt\nhes\ne hands\n. Y\nou w\nant\n t\no get\n a f\nl\nop, hopi\nng t\no m\nake a l\ni\nt\nt\nl\ne s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n, a l\ni\nt\nt\nl\ne\n \ns\net\n of\n t\nr\ni\nps\n, a l\ni\nt\nt\nl\ne t\nw\no pai\nr\n, and s\no on.\nWi\nt\nh any t\nw\no car\nds\n t\no a s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n f\nl\nus\nh, connect\ned or\n not\n—except\n f\nor\n t\nhe t\nop\n \nand bot\nt\nom\n car\nds\n of\n a s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n-\nf\nl\nus\nh, s\nuch as\n t\nhe 8? 4? or\n J\n? 7?—I\n’\nd com\ne i\nn\n \nf\nr\nom\n any pos\ni\nt\ni\non. I\nn a l\nat\ne pos\ni\nt\ni\non, I\n’\nd r\nai\ns\ne w\ni\nt\nh t\nhem\n. When I\n com\ne i\nn\n \nw\ni\nt\nh t\nhi\ns\n hand i\nn an ear\nl\ny or\n m\ni\nddl\ne pos\ni\nt\ni\non I\n’\nm\n r\neal\nl\ny l\nooki\nng t\no get\n r\nai\ns\ned.\n \nI\nn f\nact\n, I\n’\nm\n hopi\nng s\nom\neone has\n a bi\ng pai\nr\n i\nn t\nhe hol\ne and r\nai\ns\nes\n behi\nnd m\ne.\n \nT\nhen I\n can put\n a r\nel\nat\ni\nvel\ny s\nm\nal\nl\n am\nount\n of\n addi\nt\ni\nonal\n m\noney i\nn t\nhe pot\n, and\n \ni\nf\n I\n get\n a f\nl\nop, I\n can br\neak hi\nm\n.\nT\nhe beaut\ni\nf\nul\n par\nt\n about\n havi\nng t\nhe s\nm\nal\nl\n connect\ni\nng car\nds\n i\ns\n t\nhat\n i\nf\n I\n don’\nt\n \nget\n any hel\np, I\n t\nhr\now\n t\nhem\n aw\nay. I\nf\n t\nhe f\nl\nop com\nes\n 9-\n9-\n2, f\nor\n exam\npl\ne, I\n don’\nt\n \nget\n i\nnvol\nved w\ni\nt\nh a 7-\n6. I\n’\nm\n t\nhr\nough.\nN\nor\nm\nal\nl\ny, I\n w\noul\ndn’\nt\n w\nant\n t\no get\n m\nor\ne t\nhan 5 per\ncent\n, m\naybe 10 per\ncent\n, of\n \nm\ny m\noney i\nnvol\nved bef\nor\ne t\nhe f\nl\nop w\ni\nt\nh t\nhi\ns\n t\nype of\n hand. I\n not\ned t\nhat\n I\n gener\nal\nl\ny j\nus\nt\n cal\nl\n. B\nut\n i\nf\n t\nhe t\nem\npo of\n t\nhe\n \ngam\ne w\ner\ne j\nus\nt\n r\ni\nght\n, I\n’\nd r\nai\ns\ne i\nn an ear\nl\ny or\n m\ni\nddl\ne pos\ni\nt\ni\non.\nFor\n exam\npl\ne, i\nf\n I\n w\ner\ne w\ni\nnni\nng a l\not\n of\n pot\ns\n, I\n’\nd do i\nt\n. I\n s\nai\nd t\nhat\n I\n us\nual\nl\ny\n \npl\nay t\nhe next\n pot\n af\nt\ner\n I\n w\ni\nn a pot\n, r\negar\ndl\nes\ns\n of\n w\nhat\n pos\ni\nt\ni\non I\n’\nm\n i\nn. A\nnd\n \nw\nhen I\n pl\nay t\nhat\n pot\n, I\n us\nual\nl\ny r\nai\ns\ne i\nt\n. A\nl\ns\no, i\nf\n t\nhe gam\ne had t\ni\nght\nened dow\nn\n \nt\no t\nhe poi\nnt\n w\nher\ne ever\nybody w\nas\n pl\nayi\nng t\nhe nut\ns\n, I\n’\nd s\nhoot\n i\nt\n up w\ni\nt\nh a\n \ncoupl\ne of\n s\nm\nal\nl\n connect\ni\nng car\nds\n.\nO\nf\n cour\ns\ne, you al\nw\nays\n t\nr\ny t\no keep f\nr\nom\n get\nt\ni\nng r\ner\nai\ns\ned w\ni\nt\nh t\nhat\n hand. So,\n \nt\nhe i\ndeal\n s\ni\nt\nuat\ni\non i\ns\n w\nhen you t\nhi\nnk your\n m\nus\ncl\ne w\ni\nl\nl\n keep anyone f\nr\nom\n \npl\nayi\nng back and w\ni\nl\nl\n m\nake your\n opponent\ns\n t\nhi\nnk you’\nve pr\nobabl\ny got\n bi\ng\n \ncar\nds\n or\n a bi\ng pai\nr\n.\nI\n r\nai\ns\ne w\ni\nt\nh t\nhi\ns\n hand i\nn a l\nat\ne pos\ni\nt\ni\non becaus\ne I\n don’\nt\n t\nhi\nnk I\n’\nl\nl\n get\n r\ner\nai\ns\ned.\n \nA\nl\ns\no, s\ni\nnce nobody’\ns\n r\nai\ns\ned i\nn f\nr\nont\n of\n m\ne, I\n’\nl\nl\n be abl\ne t\no us\ne s\nom\ne decept\ni\non.\n \nI\n us\nual\nl\ny don’\nt\n r\nai\ns\ne i\nn an ear\nl\ny pos\ni\nt\ni\non becaus\ne I\n’\nd have t\no go t\nhr\nough s\ni\nx or\n \ns\neven pl\nayer\ns\n w\ni\nt\nhout\n get\nt\ni\nng r\ner\nai\ns\ned. Wi\nt\nh a l\not\n of\n t\nop pl\nayer\ns\n i\nn t\nhe gam\ne,\n \nt\nhat\n’\ns\n not\n l\ni\nkel\ny. A\nl\ns\no, I\n l\ni\nke t\no be i\nn t\nhe l\nead, and i\nf\n I\n m\nake s\nom\net\nhi\nng w\ni\nt\nh\n \ni\nt\n, I\n can t\nake char\nge. So w\ni\nt\nh pl\nayer\ns\n behi\nnd m\ne, I\n us\nual\nl\ny cal\nl\n w\ni\nt\nh i\nt\n.\nI\nn t\nhi\ns\n s\ni\nt\nuat\ni\non, I\n don’\nt\n have t\no m\nai\nnt\nai\nn m\ny t\nabl\ne i\nm\nage by bet\nt\ni\nng on t\nhe\n \nf\nl\nop w\nhen I\n’\nm\n t\nhe r\nai\ns\ner\n. I\nf\n I\n j\nus\nt\n cal\nl\ned bef\nor\ne t\nhe f\nl\nop and s\nom\nebody el\ns\ne\n \nr\nai\ns\ned, I\n ver\ny s\nel\ndom\n t\nr\ny t\no pi\nck up t\nhe pot\n or\n bl\nuf\nf\n i\nnt\no t\nhe r\nai\ns\ner\n. T\nhe r\nai\ns\ner\n \ncom\nm\nands\n r\nes\npect\n. So w\nhen I\n m\ni\ns\ns\n t\nhat\n hand com\npl\net\nel\ny and s\nom\nebody el\ns\ne\n \nr\nai\ns\ned i\nt\n, w\nel\nl\n, i\nt\n’\ns\n hi\ns\n pot\n. T\nhat\n’\ns\n w\nhy I\n gener\nal\nl\ny l\ni\nke t\no be t\nhe r\nai\ns\ner\n.\nI\n don’\nt\n l\ni\nke t\no r\nai\ns\ne w\ni\nt\nh s\nm\nal\nl\n connect\ni\nng car\nds\n becaus\ne w\nhen s\nom\nebody has\n \nt\nhe hand I\n w\nant\n hi\nm\n t\no have, s\nuch as\n a bi\ng pai\nr\n, he’\ns\n goi\nng t\no r\nai\ns\ne m\ne back.\n \nT\nhat\n’\ns\n one m\nor\ne r\neas\non I\n us\nual\nl\ny l\ni\nm\np-\ni\nn w\ni\nt\nh t\nhem\n. I\nt\n happens\n al\nl\n t\nhe t\ni\nm\ne i\nn a s\nm\nal\nl\n gam\ne.\n \nA\nnd w\nhen I\n’\nve got\n a 7-\n6 or\n a 9-\n8 and s\nom\neone bet\ns\n t\nhe r\nes\nt\n of\n hi\ns\n m\noney at\n \nm\ne, I\n can’\nt\n cal\nl\n i\nt\n. I\nn t\nhat\n cas\ne, t\nhe pot\n i\ns\n hi\ns\n. I\n’\nd know\n m\ny opponent\n \nhas\n s\nom\net\nhi\nng, and w\nhen I\n’\nve got\n not\nhi\nng w\ni\nt\nh t\nhi\ns\n ki\nnd of\n hand, I\n’\nm\n us\nual\nl\ny\n \nnot\n goi\nng t\no t\nr\ny t\no m\nake any gr\neat\n pl\nay, al\nt\nhough occas\ni\nonal\nl\ny I\n w\ni\nl\nl\n bl\nuf\nf\n at\n \ni\nt\n.\nI\nf\n I\n w\nas\n a cal\nl\ner\n bef\nor\ne t\nhe f\nl\nop i\nn a m\ni\nddl\ne or\n l\nat\ne pos\ni\nt\ni\non and i\nt\n w\nas\n \nchecked t\no m\ne on t\nhe f\nl\nop, I\n’\nd check al\nong. A\ns\n l\nong as\n I\n di\ndn’\nt\n m\nake\n \nanyt\nhi\nng, i\nt\n w\noul\nd pr\nobabl\ny have t\no be checked t\no m\ne t\nw\ni\nce, on t\nhe f\nl\nop and\n \nf\nour\nt\nh s\nt\nr\neet\n, bef\nor\ne I\n’\nd m\nake a bet\n, w\nhi\nch w\noul\nd be a bl\nuf\nf\n.\nO\nf\n cour\ns\ne, i\nf\n I\n had r\nai\ns\ned i\nt\n bef\nor\ne t\nhe f\nl\nop f\nr\nom\n a l\nat\ne pos\ni\nt\ni\non, I\n’\nd al\nm\nos\nt\n \nal\nw\nays\n bet\n, par\nt\ni\ncul\nar\nl\ny i\nf\n i\nt\n w\nas\n checked ar\nound t\no m\ne. I\n’\nd bet\n even i\nf\n t\nhe\n \nf\nl\nop w\nas\n A\n? A\n? K\n?, as\n not\ned bef\nor\ne, and i\nt\n w\nas\n pr\nobabl\ne t\nhat\n one of\n m\ny\n \nopponent\ns\n had an ace. I\n’\nd do i\nt\n becaus\ne I\n don’\nt\n w\nant\n m\ny opponent\ns\n t\no get\n out\n \nof\n t\nhe habi\nt\n of\n checki\nng t\no m\ne. Si\nnce I\n w\nas\n t\nhe r\nai\ns\ner\n t\nhey expect\n m\ne t\no bet\n.\n \nSo I\n go ahead and m\nake a cour\nt\nes\ny bet\n f\nor\n t\nhem\n. When I\n m\nake t\nhat\n bet\n, I\n’\nm\n \nt\nr\nyi\nng t\no do t\nw\no t\nhi\nngs\n:\n(\n1)\n Wi\nn t\nhe pot\n r\ni\nght\n t\nher\ne. A\nnd I\n w\ni\nl\nl\n m\nany a t\ni\nm\ne becaus\ne m\ny opponent\ns\n get\n \ni\nnt\no t\nhe habi\nt\n of\n t\nhr\now\ni\nng t\nhei\nr\n hands\n aw\nay.\n(\n2)\n M\nai\nnt\nai\nn m\ny aggr\nes\ns\ni\nve i\nm\nage. A\ns\n l\nong as\n I\n do, t\nhey’\nl\nl\n cont\ni\nnue t\no check\n \ni\nt\n t\no m\ne.\nT\nhat\n’\ns\n t\nhe w\nay I\n pi\nck up al\nl\n t\nhe pot\ns\n I\n do. O\nf\n cour\ns\ne, i\nf\n I\n get\n check-\nr\nai\ns\ned, I\n’\nm\n \nout\n i\nm\nm\nedi\nat\nel\ny. T\nhat\n’\ns\n t\nhe r\ni\ns\nk I\n t\nake. B\nut\n a guy r\neal\nl\ny has\n t\no have a hand\n \nbef\nor\ne he’\nl\nl\n put\n a pl\nay l\ni\nke t\nhat\n on m\ne. So w\nhen he does\n, I\n l\net\n hi\nm\n have t\nhe\n \npot\n. I\nf\n I\n \nt\nhought\n he had a m\nade hand—r\negar\ndl\nes\ns\n of\n how\n w\neak I\n t\nhought\n i\nt\n w\nas\n, even\n \nas\n w\neak as\n t\nhe t\nhi\nr\nd pai\nr\n—I\n w\noul\ndn’\nt\n t\nr\ny t\no m\nake hi\nm\n t\nhr\now\n aw\nay hi\ns\n hand\n \non f\nour\nt\nh i\nf\n he cal\nl\ned m\ne on t\nhe f\nl\nop and had, t\nher\nef\nor\ne, al\nr\neady com\nm\ni\nt\nt\ned\n \nhi\nm\ns\nel\nf\n t\no t\nhe pot\n. For\n exam\npl\ne, i\nf\n I\n w\nas\n com\npl\net\nel\ny convi\nnced a guy w\nas\n t\nr\nyi\nng t\no t\nake t\nhe\n \npot\n aw\nay f\nr\nom\n m\ne, I\n’\nd r\ne-\npl\nay at\n hi\nm\n. I\nf\n I\n’\nm\n s\nt\ni\nl\nl\n \nbet\nt\ni\nng at\n t\nhe pot\n, I\n’\nd have t\no cont\ni\nnue becaus\ne i\nt\n’\ns\n al\nm\nos\nt\n i\nm\npos\ns\ni\nbl\ne f\nor\n m\ne\n \nt\no w\ni\nn i\nn a s\nhow\ndow\nn. So, even i\nf\n I\n had been a cal\nl\ner\n up t\no t\nhi\ns\n poi\nnt\n,\n \nt\nher\ne’\ns\n a good chance I\n’\nd t\nake t\nhe l\nead and bet\n w\nhen t\nhe 6 hi\nt\n. A\nnd even\n \nt\nhough t\nhe r\nai\ns\ner\n s\nhoul\nd s\nee t\nhat\n I\n m\ni\nght\n have t\nhr\nee s\ni\nxes\n, he m\ni\nght\n al\ns\no t\nhi\nnk\n \nI\n am\n j\nus\nt\n r\nepr\nes\nent\ni\nng t\nhem\n. I\nf\n you di\ndn’\nt\n have a 6 i\nn t\nhe hol\ne, t\nhi\ns\n w\noul\nd be a\n \nver\ny good oppor\nt\nuni\nt\ny t\no bl\nuf\nf\n at\n t\nhe pot\n.\nFai\nr\n Fl\nop\nN\now\n I\n’\nl\nl\n di\ns\ncus\ns\n how\n I\n’\nd pl\nay t\nhat\n 7? 6? i\nf\n I\n got\n w\nhat\n I\n’\nd cal\nl\n a f\nai\nr\n or\n \nm\noder\nat\nel\ny hel\npf\nul\n f\nl\nop—any t\nhr\nee car\nds\n t\nhat\n gave m\ne t\nhe t\nop pai\nr\n, an open-\nend s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n dr\naw\n, or\n a f\nl\nus\nh dr\naw\n. \nI\n pl\nay f\nl\nus\nh dr\naw\ns\n ext\nr\nem\nel\ny s\nl\now\n becaus\ne t\nhey’\nr\ne s\no obvi\nous\n. When t\nw\no of\n \nt\nhe s\nam\ne s\nui\nt\n f\nl\nop, I\n s\nee s\no m\nany pl\nayer\ns\n w\nho ar\ne dr\naw\ni\nng t\no a f\nl\nus\nh m\nove i\nn\n \non a guy af\nt\ner\n he bet\ns\n. O\nccas\ni\nonal\nl\ny, I\n do i\nt\n t\noo, becaus\ne m\ny phi\nl\nos\nophy i\ns\n t\no\n \npr\not\nect\n m\ny m\noney and bet\n w\nhenever\n I\n can. B\nut\n i\nt\n’\ns\n us\nual\nl\ny a ver\ny obvi\nous\n \npl\nay.
