I\nf\n I\n get\n t\nhat\n \ns\nt\nr\nai\nght\n dr\naw\n, w\nel\nl\n, I\n’\nm\n r\neady now\n. I\n m\nean, r\neal\nl\ny r\neady. T\nhe bat\nt\nl\ne i\ns\n on. I\nf\n I\n \nw\nas\n t\nhe or\ni\ngi\nnal\n r\nai\ns\ner\n, of\n cour\ns\ne, I\n’\nd bet\n on t\nhe f\nl\nop. I\nf\n I\n got\n r\nai\ns\ned, I\n’\nd pl\nay\n \nback and m\nove al\nl\n m\ny chi\nps\n i\nn. I\nf\n s\nom\nebody bet\n i\nn f\nr\nont\n of\n m\ne, I\n’\nd r\nai\ns\ne ‘\nem\n.\nI\nf\n I\n w\nas\nn’\nt\n t\nhe or\ni\ngi\nnal\n r\nai\ns\ner\n, I\n’\nd check-\nr\nai\ns\ne. I\nf\n t\nhe guy w\nho r\nai\ns\ned i\nt\n bef\nor\ne\n \nt\nhe f\nl\nop bet\n af\nt\ner\n I\n checked, I\n’\nd r\nai\ns\ne w\ni\nt\nh m\nos\nt\n or\n al\nl\n of\n m\ny chi\nps\n. I\n m\nean, w\nhat\n’\ns\n i\nt\n w\nor\nt\nh? T\nhe concl\nus\ni\non\n \nI\n us\nual\nl\ny r\neach i\ns\n t\nhat\n i\nt\n’\ns\n not\n w\nor\nt\nh ver\ny m\nuch. I\nf\n I\n r\neal\nl\ny t\nhi\nnk he’\ns\n got\n a 7\n \nt\nhen I\n know\n t\nhe bes\nt\n I\n coul\nd hope f\nor\n i\ns\n a t\ni\ne. O\nf\n cour\ns\ne, I\n’\nm\n t\nal\nki\nng about\n a\n \ngood pl\nayer\n, and i\nt\n’\ns\n m\nuch m\nor\ne l\ni\nkel\ny he’\ns\n got\n m\ne beat\n. H\ne’\ns\n pr\nobabl\ny i\nn\n \nt\nher\ne w\ni\nt\nh a 7 and a hi\ngher\n car\nd t\nhat\n he coul\nd’\nve f\nl\nopped a s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n w\ni\nt\nh, s\nuch\n \nas\n an 8-\n7, 9-\n7, or\n 10-\n7. A\nnot\nher\n pos\ns\ni\nbi\nl\ni\nt\ny i\ns\n t\nhat\n he’\ns\n got\n a hi\ngh car\nd, s\nuch\n \nas\n an ace or\n ki\nng, t\nhat\n’\ns\n s\nui\nt\ned. H\ne m\ni\nght\n have a 7-\n6, l\ni\nke I\n do, or\n a 7-\n5, t\nhe\n \nonl\ny l\ni\nkel\ny hand I\n coul\nd beat\n. B\nut\n i\nt\n’\ns\n al\nm\nos\nt\n i\nnconcei\nvabl\ne t\nhat\n he’\ns\n i\nn t\nher\ne\n \nw\ni\nt\nh a 7-\n4, 7-\n3, or\n 7-\n2, al\nt\nhough t\nhi\ns\n l\nas\nt\n one w\noul\nd gi\nve hi\nm\n a f\nul\nl\n.\nSo w\nhen I\n got\n dow\nn i\nnt\no t\nhe hand and I\n gave hi\nm\n cr\nedi\nt\n f\nor\n t\nhe ot\nher\n 7\n \nbecaus\ne he w\nas\n s\nhow\ni\nng a w\nhol\ne l\not\n of\n s\npeed, I\n coul\ndn’\nt\n cont\ni\nnue pl\nayi\nng m\ny\n \n7 w\ni\nt\nh a s\nm\nal\nl\n connect\ni\nng car\nd. A\nnd I\n’\nd r\nel\neas\ne t\nhat\n s\net\n qui\nt\ne r\neadi\nl\ny. For\n exam\npl\ne, s\nay I\n r\nai\ns\ned w\ni\nt\nh t\nhe hand bef\nor\ne t\nhe f\nl\nop, and\n \never\nybody checks\n i\nt\n t\no m\ne on t\nhe f\nl\nop. I\nn t\nhi\ns\n s\ni\nt\nuat\ni\non, I\n m\ni\nght\n go ahead w\ni\nt\nh m\ny hand,\n \nf\ni\ngur\ni\nng t\nhat\n t\nhe guy i\ns\n t\nr\nyi\nng t\no s\nhut\n m\ne out\n. T\nr\nue, you can’\nt\n \nal\nw\nays\n as\ns\num\ne t\nhat\n, but\n i\nt\n’\ns\n al\nw\nays\n i\nn t\nhe back of\n your\n m\ni\nnd. So, i\nf\n you’\nve\n \ngot\n A\n-\nQ\n, A\n-\nJ\n, or\n A\n-\n10, and you’\nr\ne up agai\nns\nt\n A\n-\nA\n, K\n-\nK\n, or\n A\n-\nK\n, you’\nve got\n \na t\ner\nr\ni\nbl\ne hand.\nI\nt\n’\ns\n ext\nr\nem\nel\ny har\nd t\no w\ni\nn a bi\ng pot\n w\ni\nt\nh t\nhes\ne hands\n w\nhen you’\nve cal\nl\ned a\n \nr\nai\ns\ne. T\nhey’\nr\ne def\ni\nni\nt\nel\ny t\nr\noubl\ne hands\n. Y\nou’\nr\ne m\nuch m\nor\ne l\ni\nkel\ny t\no l\nos\ne a bi\ng\n \npot\n w\ni\nt\nh t\nhem\n t\nhan you ar\ne t\no w\ni\nn a bi\ng pot\n. E\nven w\nhen I\n m\nake a pai\nr\n w\ni\nt\nh\n \nt\nhem\n on t\nhe f\nl\nop, I\n pl\nay t\nhem\n ext\nr\nem\nel\ny caut\ni\nous\nl\ny, or\n about\n t\nhe s\nam\ne w\nay I\n’\nd\n \npl\nay a pai\nr\n of\n aces\n or\n ki\nngs\n i\nn t\nhe pocket\n.\nFor\n exam\npl\ne, i\nf\n I\n pl\nayed a K\n-\nQ\n of\nf\ns\nui\nt\n and t\nhe boar\nd cam\ne\nK\n-\n4-\n2, I\n’\nd be i\nn a l\not\n of\n t\nr\noubl\ne i\nf\n t\nhe r\nai\ns\ner\n’\ns\n got\n one of\n t\nhe t\nhr\nee bi\ng hands\n I\n \nt\nhi\nnk he m\ni\nght\n have. H\ne’\nd have t\nw\no aces\n, t\nhr\nee ki\nngs\n, or\n a pai\nr\n of\n ki\nngs\n, l\ni\nke\n \nm\ne, but\n he’\nd al\ns\no have an ace ki\ncker\n.\nO\nr\n, i\nf\n I\n pl\nayed a 9-\n8 and t\nhe f\nl\nop w\nas\n Q\n-\nJ\n-\n10, I\n s\nt\ni\nl\nl\n w\noul\ndn’\nt\n be t\noo exci\nt\ned\n \nabout\n m\ny hand. A\nl\nt\nhough I\n f\nl\nopped a s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n, i\nt\n’\ns\n t\nhe i\ngnor\nant\n end of\n t\nhe\n \ns\nt\nr\nai\nght\n. I\nn addi\nt\ni\non, i\nt\n i\ns\n vul\nner\nabl\ne t\no t\nhe hi\ngh end of\n t\nhe s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n, w\nhi\nch\n \nw\noul\nd be m\nade up by a ver\ny s\nt\nr\nong hand t\nhat\n ever\nybody pl\nays\n, A\n-\nK\n.\nSom\net\nhi\nng el\ns\ne you have t\no t\nhi\nnk about\n w\ni\nt\nh t\nhe t\nr\noubl\ne hands\n i\ns\n t\nhat\n w\nhen\n \nyou f\nl\nop a s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n dr\naw\n, i\nt\n’\ns\n not\n as\n eas\ny t\no pi\nck up pot\ns\n w\ni\nt\nh t\nhem\n as\n i\nt\n i\ns\n \nw\ni\nt\nh ot\nher\n, s\nt\nr\nonger\n hands\n. Y\nou’\nl\nl\n r\nem\nem\nber\n t\nhat\n w\nhen I\n f\nl\nop a s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n dr\naw\n \nw\ni\nt\nh s\nm\nal\nl\n connect\ni\nng car\nds\n, I\n pl\nay m\ny hand r\neal\n f\nas\nt\n becaus\ne I\n have t\nw\no\n \ns\nhot\ns\n t\no w\ni\nn t\nhe pot\n. A\nnd, i\nf\n I\n do get\n \ncal\nl\ned, I\n’\nve s\nt\ni\nl\nl\n got\n a s\necond s\nhot\n t\no w\ni\nn i\nt\n i\nf\n I\n m\nake m\ny s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n.\nB\nut\n l\net\n’\ns\n s\nay I\n’\nm\n hol\ndi\nng K\n-\nQ\n and t\nhe f\nl\nop com\nes\n J\n-\n10-\n5, gi\nvi\nng m\ne a s\nt\nr\nai\nght\n \ndr\naw\n. A\ns\n I\n al\nr\neady m\nent\ni\noned, you\n \nhave t\no be abl\ne t\no change gear\ns\n i\nn t\nhi\ns\n s\ni\nt\nuat\ni\non. Y\nou s\nhoul\nd pl\nay i\nn t\nhe s\nam\ne\n \nbas\ni\nc s\nt\nyl\ne—aggr\nes\ns\ni\nve—but\n you s\nhoul\nd r\neal\ni\nze t\nhat\n al\nl\n t\nhe hands\n i\nncr\neas\ne i\nn\n \nval\nue. T\nhi\ns\n i\ns\n par\nt\ni\ncul\nar\nl\ny t\nr\nue of\n t\nhe bi\ng car\nds\n. A\nnd, i\nn a s\nhor\nt\nhanded gam\ne,\n \nal\nl\n t\nhe t\nr\noubl\ne hands\n becom\ne pl\nayabl\ne f\nr\nom\n al\nm\nos\nt\n any pos\ni\nt\ni\non. \nI\nn a s\nhor\nt\nhanded gam\ne, pos\ni\nt\ni\non i\ns\n pr\nobabl\ny t\nhe m\nos\nt\n i\nm\npor\nt\nant\n t\nhi\nng. T\nhe\n \nr\neas\non i\ns\n t\nhat\n you get\n t\no l\nook at\n m\nor\ne car\nds\n and have t\no pl\nay m\nor\ne hands\n t\nhan\n \nyou w\noul\nd i\nn a r\ni\nng gam\ne. Y\nou pl\nay your\n pos\ni\nt\ni\non m\nor\ne t\nhan your\n car\nds\n i\nn a\n \ns\nhor\nt\nhanded gam\ne.\nFor\n exam\npl\ne, w\nhen your\n gam\ne get\ns\n dow\nn t\no f\nour\n-\nhanded pl\nay, you need a\n \nbet\nt\ner\n hand i\nn t\nhe f\ni\nr\ns\nt\n t\nw\no pos\ni\nt\ni\nons\n t\nhan you need i\nn t\nhe l\nas\nt\n t\nw\no. When you\n \nr\nai\ns\ne on t\nhe but\nt\non, t\nhe ot\nher\n m\nan has\n t\no act\n f\ni\nr\ns\nt\n, and t\nhat\n put\ns\n hi\nm\n at\n a bi\ng\n \ndi\ns\nadvant\nage. When t\nhe ot\nher\n m\nan has\n t\no act\n on hi\ns\n hand f\ni\nr\ns\nt\n, i\nt\n’\ns\n a gr\neat\n \nequal\ni\nzer\n. \nSo i\nn a s\nhor\nt\nhanded gam\ne you’\nd pl\nay your\n pos\ni\nt\ni\non us\ni\nng t\nhe s\nam\ne t\nheor\ni\nes\n \nyou w\noul\nd i\nn a f\nul\nl\n gam\ne, but\n keep i\nn m\ni\nnd t\nhat\n t\nhe val\nues\n of\n t\nhe hands\n go up\n \na f\new\n not\nches\n. I\nf\n \nhe had know\nn t\nhat\n one day he w\noul\nd be t\nhe cat\nal\nys\nt\n f\nor\n t\nr\nans\nf\nor\nm\ni\nng t\nhe\n \ngam\ne i\nnt\no a t\nel\nevi\ns\ned s\npor\nt\ns\n phenom\nenon, he l\ni\nkel\ny w\noul\nd have pai\nd m\nor\ne\n \nat\nt\nent\ni\non. \nWhen a chi\nl\ndhood f\nr\ni\nend as\nked St\neve, an aw\nar\nd-\nw\ni\nnni\nng f\ni\nl\nm\n and t\nel\nevi\ns\ni\non\n \npr\noducer\n, t\no di\nr\nect\n and pr\noduce a one-\nhour\n poker\n docum\nent\nar\ny f\nor\n t\nhe\n \nD\ni\ns\ncover\ny C\nhannel\n, i\nt\n opened hi\ns\n eyes\n t\no t\nhe poker\n w\nor\nl\nd and i\nnt\nr\noduced hi\nm\n \nt\no t\nhe r\nem\nar\nkabl\ne gam\ne of\n no-\nl\ni\nm\ni\nt\n T\nexas\n hol\nd‘\nem\n. H\ni\ns\n af\nf\ni\nni\nt\ny f\nor\n t\nhe gam\ne\n \nand t\nhe know\nl\nedge he gai\nned decons\nt\nr\nuct\ni\nng t\nhe gam\ne f\nor\n pr\nes\nent\nat\ni\non t\no a\n \nw\ni\nder\n audi\nence hel\nped St\neve w\ni\nn t\nhe f\ni\nr\ns\nt\n poker\n t\nour\nnam\nent\n he ever\n ent\ner\ned. \nSt\neve’\ns\n f\nor\nes\ni\nght\n and l\nove f\nor\n t\nhe gam\ne l\ned hi\nm\n t\no w\nr\ni\nt\ne a bus\ni\nnes\ns\n pl\nan f\nor\n \nt\nhe Wor\nl\nd Poker\n T\nour\n. Si\nnce t\nhat\n t\ni\nm\ne, he has\n di\nr\nect\ned and pr\noduced\n \nhundr\neds\n of\n hour\ns\n of\n poker\n t\nour\nnam\nent\ns\n and gam\ne-\npl\nay f\nor\n t\nel\nevi\ns\ni\non. N\no one\n \ni\nn t\nhe poker\n w\nor\nl\nd has\n s\npent\n m\nor\ne t\ni\nm\ne i\nnt\ner\nvi\new\ni\nng t\nhe gr\neat\n pl\nayer\ns\n and\n \ndel\nvi\nng i\nnt\no t\nhe s\nubt\nl\net\ni\nes\n t\nhat\n m\nake t\nhe gam\ne bot\nh s\ni\nm\npl\ne and i\nnf\ni\nni\nt\nel\ny\n \ncom\npl\nex. H\ni\ns\n out\ns\ni\nde per\ns\npect\ni\nve, t\noget\nher\n w\ni\nt\nh hi\ns\n know\nl\nedge of\n poker\n i\nn\n \ngener\nal\n and t\nour\nnam\nent\n s\nt\nr\nat\negy i\nn par\nt\ni\ncul\nar\n, have m\nade hi\nm\n one of\n t\nhe gr\neat\n \ns\nt\nudent\ns\n of\n t\nhe gam\ne. A\nnd t\nhe poker\n w\nor\nl\nd w\ni\nl\nl\n never\n be qui\nt\ne be t\nhe s\nam\ne.\nWor\nl\nd Poker\n T\nour\nby St\neven L\ni\nps\ncom\nb\nI\nN\nT\nR\nO\nD\nU\nC\nT\nI\nO\nN\nB\ny nat\nur\ne, poker\n has\n no def\ni\nned begi\nnni\nng or\n end. A\ns\n M\noj\no N\ni\nxon once put\n \ni\nt\n, “T\nhe bes\nt\n t\nhi\nng about\n t\nhe gam\ne i\ns\n t\nhat\n you can’\nt\n l\nos\ne. A\ns\n l\nong as\n you s\nt\ni\nl\nl\n \npl\nay, t\nhe w\nor\ns\ne you can be i\ns\n behi\nnd.” L\ni\nt\nt\nl\ne t\nhi\nngs\n l\ni\nke s\nl\neep, f\nam\ni\nl\ny, and\n \nm\nedi\ncal\n neces\ns\ni\nt\ni\nes\n m\nay s\nl\now\n t\nhe gam\ne dow\nn f\nr\nom\n t\ni\nm\ne t\no t\ni\nm\ne, but\n ever\ny\n \npoker\n pl\nayer\n know\ns\n i\nf\n a gam\ne br\neaks\n, t\nher\ne’\ns\n al\nw\nays\n anot\nher\n one on t\nhe\n \nhor\ni\nzon.\nPoker\n pl\nayer\ns\n ar\ne t\nhe m\nos\nt\n com\npet\ni\nt\ni\nve bei\nngs\n on t\nhe pl\nanet\n, s\no i\nt\n i\ns\n no\n \n415', metadata={'source': 'players/doyle_brunson/brunson_pdfs/super_system_2.pdf', 'page': 414}),

T\nhe new\n ki\nng-\nof\n-\nt\nhe-\nhi\nl\nl\n, s\nur\nvi\nval\n-\nof\n-\nt\nhe-\nf\ni\nt\nt\nes\nt\n, ever\ny-\nm\nan-\nf\nor\n-\nhi\nm\ns\nel\nf\n br\nand of\n poker\n has\n becom\ne know\nn as\n \nt\nour\nnam\nent\n poker\n.\nT\nH\nE\n O\nR\nI\nG\nI\nN\nS O\nF\nT\nO\nU\nR\nN\nA\nM\nE\nN\nT\n PO\nK\nE\nR\nA\ns\n f\nar\n as\n anyone can t\nel\nl\n, t\nhe f\ni\nr\ns\nt\n poker\n t\nour\nnam\nent\n w\nas\n hel\nd i\nn t\nhe s\npr\ni\nng of\n \n1969 at\n t\nhe H\nol\ni\nday I\nnn i\nn R\neno, N\nevada. O\nne of\n t\nhe pi\nt\n bos\ns\nes\n t\nhr\new\n w\nhat\n \nhe cal\nl\ned a T\nexas\n G\nam\nbl\ner\ns\n C\nonvent\ni\non, i\nnvi\nt\ni\nng w\neal\nt\nhy T\nexans\n t\no R\neno t\no\n \npl\nay poker\n. L\negends\n l\ni\nke J\nack St\nr\naus\n, C\nr\nandal\nl\n A\nddi\nngt\non, D\noyl\ne B\nr\nuns\non,\n \nB\nenny B\ni\nni\non and hi\ns\n s\non J\nack B\ni\nni\non at\nt\nended.\nK\nnow\nn f\nor\n hi\ns\n abi\nl\ni\nt\ny t\no r\necogni\nze and expl\noi\nt\n m\nar\nket\ni\nng oppor\nt\nuni\nt\ni\nes\n,\n \nB\nenny B\ni\nni\non s\nt\naged a s\ni\nm\ni\nl\nar\n event\n at\n hi\ns\n cas\ni\nno i\nn dow\nnt\now\nn L\nas\n V\negas\n t\nhe\n \nnext\n year\n. H\ne cal\nl\ned i\nt\n t\nhe Wor\nl\nd Ser\ni\nes\n of\n Poker\n and i\nnvi\nt\ned w\nhat\n he\n \nper\ncei\nved t\no be t\nhe bes\nt\n poker\n pl\nayer\ns\n. B\nut\n \ngi\nven t\nhe uncer\nt\nai\nn s\nt\nat\ne of\n poker\n near\n t\nhe end of\n 2001, i\nt\n w\nas\n t\nr\nul\ny\n \nr\nem\nar\nkabl\ne t\nhat\n L\nyl\ne and hi\ns\n com\npany, L\nakes\n E\nnt\ner\nt\nai\nnm\nent\n, pl\nedged\n \nm\ni\nl\nl\ni\nons\n of\n dol\nl\nar\ns\n t\no hel\np l\naunch t\nhe w\nor\nl\nd’\ns\n f\ni\nr\ns\nt\n poker\n l\neague.\nPO\nK\nE\nR\n O\nN\n T\nE\nL\nE\nV\nI\nSI\nO\nN\nFr\nom\n 2000 t\no 2001, I\n pi\nt\nched t\nel\nevi\ns\ned poker\n t\no any br\noadcas\nt\ner\n I\n i\nm\nagi\nned\n \nm\ni\nght\n ai\nr\n t\nhe gam\ne, i\nncl\nudi\nng m\nos\nt\n of\n t\nhe ent\ni\nt\ni\nes\n now\n r\naci\nng t\no get\n i\nnt\no t\nhe\n \nact\n. T\nhei\nr\n s\nkept\ni\nci\ns\nm\n \nw\nas\n w\nel\nl\n f\nounded.\nPoker\n had been br\noadcas\nt\n on t\nel\nevi\ns\ni\non f\nor\n s\nom\ne t\ni\nm\ne. T\nhe pr\nogr\nam\ns\n r\nan as\n \nf\ni\nl\nl\ner\n i\nn undes\ni\nr\nabl\ne t\ni\nm\ne s\nl\not\ns\n and s\ner\nved as\n a cons\nt\nant\n r\nem\ni\nnder\n t\no al\nl\n \nbr\noadcas\nt\ner\ns\n t\nhat\n ni\nne guys\n s\ni\nt\nt\ni\nng ar\nound a t\nabl\ne pl\nayi\nng poker\n i\ns\n not\n \ni\nnher\nent\nl\ny i\nnt\ner\nes\nt\ni\nng t\no w\nat\nch.\nI\nt\n w\nas\n not\n unt\ni\nl\n 1999 t\nhat\n a poker\n t\nour\nnam\nent\n w\nas\n f\ni\nl\nm\ned w\ni\nt\nhout\n a cas\ni\nno\n \nhavi\nng t\no f\noot\n t\nhe bi\nl\nl\n. T\nhat\n year\n M\nar\nk H\ni\nckm\nan, a chi\nl\ndhood f\nr\ni\nend, dr\naf\nt\ned\n \nm\ne t\no di\nr\nect\n and pr\noduce a D\ni\ns\ncover\ny C\nhannel\n docum\nent\nar\ny ent\ni\nt\nl\ned “O\nn t\nhe\n \nI\nns\ni\nde of\n t\nhe Wor\nl\nd Ser\ni\nes\n of\n Poker\n.” T\nhe docum\nent\nar\ny i\nnt\nr\noduced t\nhe poker\n \nw\nor\nl\nd t\no a w\ni\nder\n audi\nence and r\nat\ned w\nel\nl\n enough f\nor\n t\nhe D\ni\ns\ncover\ny N\net\nw\nor\nks\n \nt\no f\ni\nl\nm\n t\nhe event\n t\nhe f\nol\nl\now\ni\nng t\nw\no year\ns\n. \nB\nut\n not\nhi\nng coul\nd have pr\nepar\ned t\nhe poker\n com\nm\nuni\nt\ny or\n t\nel\nevi\ns\ni\non\n \nbr\noadcas\nt\ner\ns\n f\nor\n w\nhat\n happened w\nhen t\nhe Wor\nl\nd Poker\n T\nour\n ai\nr\ned i\nt\ns\n f\ni\nr\ns\nt\n \ns\neas\non.\nT\nE\nL\nE\nV\nI\nSE\nD\n PO\nK\nE\nR\n A\nN\nD\n T\nH\nE\nB\nI\nR\nT\nH\n O\nF T\nH\nE\n WO\nR\nL\nD\n PO\nK\nE\nR\n T\nO\nU\nR\nT\nhe Wor\nl\nd Poker\n T\nour\n, L\n.L\n.C\n., opened i\nt\ns\n door\ns\n on Febr\nuar\ny 25, 2002, and\n \nqui\nckl\ny s\ni\ngned a w\nho’\ns\n w\nho of\n hi\ngh-\ncl\nas\ns\n des\nt\ni\nnat\ni\non cas\ni\nnos\n as\ns\noci\nat\ned w\ni\nt\nh\n \npoker\n t\no excl\nus\ni\nve, l\nong-\nt\ner\nm\n deal\ns\n. Wi\nt\nh no br\noadcas\nt\n or\n cabl\ne net\nw\nor\nk deal\n \ni\nn pl\nace, t\nhe WPT\n pr\nom\ni\ns\ned t\nhat\n, i\nf\n neces\ns\nar\ny, i\nt\n w\noul\nd buy t\nel\nevi\ns\ni\non ai\nr\nt\ni\nm\ne\n \ni\nn or\nder\n t\no pr\nove t\nhat\n t\nher\ne w\nas\n a m\nar\nket\n f\nor\n t\nel\nevi\ns\ned poker\n. \nT\nhe Wor\nl\nd Ser\ni\nes\n of\n Poker\n decl\ni\nned t\no j\noi\nn t\nhe T\nour\n des\npi\nt\ne t\nhe f\nact\n t\nhat\n no\n \nbr\noadcas\nt\ner\n had pl\nans\n t\no f\ni\nl\nm\n i\nt\ns\n t\nour\nnam\nent\n i\nn 2002. Few\n peopl\ne r\neal\ni\nze t\nhat\n,\n \nat\n t\nhe t\ni\nm\ne, E\nSPN\n had not\n br\noadcas\nt\n t\nhe WSO\nP f\nor\n t\nhr\nee year\ns\n. A\nnd, as\n f\nar\n as\n \nI\n can t\nel\nl\n, no net\nw\nor\nk had pl\nans\n t\no s\nhoot\n t\nhe WSO\nP t\nhat\n year\n. \nI\nn f\nact\n, t\nw\no w\neeks\n bef\nor\ne t\nhe Wor\nl\nd Ser\ni\nes\n m\nai\nn event\n w\ne r\necei\nved a cal\nl\n \nf\nr\nom\n T\nex Whi\nt\ns\non, w\nho w\nas\n r\nunni\nng t\nhe WSO\nP f\nor\n B\necky B\ni\nni\non-\nB\nehnen.\n \nH\ne as\nked i\nf\n w\ne coul\nd hel\np hi\nm\n f\ni\nl\nm\n t\nhe f\ni\nnal\n t\nabl\ne of\n t\nhe WSO\nP—w\ni\nt\nhout\n \nj\noi\nni\nng t\nhe Wor\nl\nd Poker\n T\nour\n. T\nhe f\ni\nr\ns\nt\n WPT\n event\n w\nas\n about\n t\no t\nake pl\nace at\n \nB\nel\nl\nagi\no, s\no t\ni\nm\ne s\ni\nm\npl\ny di\nd not\n al\nl\now\n us\n t\no hel\np. T\nhey t\nend t\no s\nee t\nhe cont\nes\nt\n as\n a s\ner\ni\nes\n of\n hands\n l\neadi\nng t\no an\n \ni\nnevi\nt\nabl\ne concl\nus\ni\non—you w\ni\nn or\n you l\nos\ne. T\nhat\n does\nn’\nt\n even begi\nn t\no\n \ncapt\nur\ne i\nt\n. A\n poker\n t\nour\nnam\nent\n i\ns\n a l\ni\nvi\nng, br\neat\nhi\nng, or\ngani\nc event\n. Y\nou m\nay get\n exci\nt\ned w\nhen you\n \nknock out\n C\nhi\np R\nees\ne, but\n I\n as\ns\nur\ne you, none of\n us\n w\ni\nl\nl\n even w\nant\n t\no hear\n t\nhe\n \ns\nt\nor\ny next\n w\neek. What\n m\nat\nt\ner\ns\n i\ns\n t\nhe t\nour\nnam\nent\n i\nt\ns\nel\nf\n—and your\n pl\nace i\nn i\nt\n.\n \nY\nour\n onl\ny goal\n i\ns\n t\no never\n f\ni\nnd your\ns\nel\nf\n w\ni\nt\nhout\n chi\nps\n i\nn f\nr\nont\n of\n you. Y\nou need t\no under\ns\nt\nand t\nhe\n \nt\nour\nnam\nent\n s\nt\nr\nuct\nur\ne, f\neel\n t\nhe ebb and f\nl\now\n of\n t\nhe event\n and r\necogni\nze t\nhe\n \ncr\ni\nt\ni\ncal\n m\nom\nent\ns\n t\nhat\n det\ner\nm\ni\nne your\n pl\nace i\nn t\nhat\n t\nour\nnam\nent\n.
